name: Secluded Intown Treehouse
description: AIRBNB'S #1 'MOST WISHED-FOR LISTING WORLDWIDE!'

reviews.author: Amy
reviews.description: Spectacular treehouse that you would never expect is so close to everything! Peter and Katie's place is simply magical... If you are lucky enough to have rain, the rain on the tin roof makes it even better!

reviews.author: Jen
reviews.description:
The treehouse could not have lived up to our expectations more. Of course being the 'most wished for' destination, the expectations were pretty high. I think what no one can really explain is the way this place makes you feel. My fiancé and I really enjoyed being removed from the outside world for a little while and its hard to put into words how wonderful it was to connect with each other without distractions. 

We have stayed in some 'secluded' locations in the past and the hardest thing was finding a place to eat or ordering take out. Because this treehouse is located right in ATL (I know hard to believe and trust me, you will have no idea you are in the city of ATL once you arrive to the treehouse) it was so easy to order pizza, get breakfast and even find things to do. But trust us, you want to spend as much time at he treehouse as you can- you WILL miss it when you get back home. 

Peter had the best coffee waiting for us each morning and loved being greeted by his perfect little cat Haskel and dog Daisy. Peter you are a great guy, thanks so much for sharing this place with us.

reviews.author: Carrie
reviews.description: The treehouse was perfect! Peter went above and beyond to make our stay wonderful.

reviews.author: Kristin
reviews.description:
This place is exactly how everyone describes it, MAGICAL! I have done quite a bit of traveling and have never found a place like this one. It feels like you are in the most beautiful place in the middle of nowhere. The treehouse is the kind you would see on HGTV, Joanna Gaines would be proud. It is the perfect place to find peace, privacy and experience nature at it's finest.

The icing on top, is the host Peter is an absolute gem. He was so kind and made the stay even more special.

Would recommend this to everyone I know and will most definitely be back in the future.

This is the place people dream of.

reviews.author: Isaias
reviews.description: Awesome place to spend quite and calm time. Just be open for this great place to give you what you need. It can give you experiences, adventure, knowledge, calm, peace, smiles and everything to make your time just marvelous.

reviews.author: Jennifer
reviews.description: Staying in the treehouse was a 'one-of-a-kind' experience! This phenomenal place has the best of both worlds....fantastic location just 10 mins from downtown Atlanta while having a secluded feel of sleeping outdoors under the stars. Peter is a kind and generous host who ensures your stay is memorable and relaxing. This was one of our favorite weekend getaways of all time! Highly recommend!

reviews.author: Cynthia
reviews.description: What can I say to describe this place?  I felt comfort and peace the moment I stepped inside.  I came alone because I'm a widow and was hoping I wouldn't regret it but I didn't feel alone.  I (EMAIL HIDDEN)ing from a big city I so needed this.  It showed me that with the everyday loud, constantly rushing world of mine to cover my pain of loosing my husband is not good for me.  Being alone is not always a bad thing.  God has set this path for me and I now need to embrace what my life is now.  This treehouse has given me the peace I have been starving for.  Thanks Peter

name: A Pirate's Life For Me - Houseboat!
description: Featured on Tiny House Hunters, but far from tiny! Stays comfortable and warm in winter months and refreshingly cool in the summer.  This floating abode was gutted & completely rebuilt using reclaimed materials, sweat, & love. You'll find her spacious, comfortable, & peaceful. The location of this boat is for people looking for tranquil, private, and quiet getaway. Enjoy coffee & cocktails on the large deck overlooking the harbor.

reviews.author: Casey
reviews.description: This houseboat is a must rent! Secluded and very quiet with amazing views!

reviews.author: Jill
reviews.description: Pirate's Life was spectacular from the time of arrival until departure. It feels small when you first walk in but it is easy to navigate and does feel spacious after you settle in.  Be sure to get on the rooftop deck around sunset, you might be lucky enough to see dolphins frolicking nearby. There isn't much to say, this place is great and is exactly as advertised!

reviews.author: Tara
reviews.description: This was my second time staying in Justin's houseboat. Loved. Loved. Loved. Looking forward to staying again in the near future.

reviews.author: Marcia
reviews.description: We loved our stay on the boat!  My husband and I stayed with our two young children.  Despite the boat being small, it felt spacious and room enough for all of us.  Being outside the boat was tricky with our toddler (he could easily walk under the railings around the edge) but we figured that when we chose this place.  There is a beautiful view of the water and the bridge with gorgeous moon rises at night and sometimes dolphins swimming by.  It was really cool to be on a houseboat so close to downtown and we would certainly do it again!

reviews.author: Brad
reviews.description:
The house boat and marina are a short drive or uber to most of what's 'happening' in Charleston, but the arrival area and docks themselves could use some sprucing up a bit.

The listing describes the boat as having a comfortable temperature year-round but it was super-hot in the bedroom (June) and the only assistance offered was to maneuver miniature fans around and have it blow air from the ground up in front of the poorly placed AC unit in the bedroom.

DEFINITELY NOT WORTH OVER $300/night. Neither my wife nor I could sleep in the bedroom because of the sweltering heat and smell of sewage that always sleeps from the bathroom. For $300+ per night, the sleeping area should be priority number one for the hosts to fix.

reviews.author: Courtnie
reviews.description: Such a cute houseboat!  It was such a fun experience in a beautiful city.

reviews.author: Brooks
reviews.description: Justin's boat house is the only place you need to stay when visiting Charleston. That really could be the review. But I'll elaborate... Everything was as advertised... The views are perfect... Even in the heat of the south, the ac keeps the entire boat feeling great. You're not too far from all of the peninsula east side spots (East Bay, etc)... Will def stay here again.

name: YURT Farm GOATS Hot Tub STARS !Swim Pool! ROMANCE
description: Cair Paravel Farmstead transports you into another realm. Come experience living in a round structure filled with amenities- fully equipped kitchen, deep tub, heating and AC, shared hot tub and seasonal salt water pool. Great for couples, friends, and families. A ten minute hike gets you into Shenandoah National Park Back Country or explore our 58 acres on numerous walking trails. Visit Charlottesville,historical sites, explore caves, or play in rivers in central Virginia.

reviews.author: BjandAndrea
reviews.description: Fantastic hosts, salt water pool, Woods Walk with wild berries, fire pit, high quality food available for purchase, and all-around peaceful place.

reviews.author: Emily
reviews.description: Most beautiful trip we have been on! We can't wait to build our own yurt home this year!

reviews.author: Theresa
reviews.description: We loved our stay at the yurt. Whitt and Martha were great hosts. We brought along our two year old daughter and they had a pack n play and left some toys out which was nice. Martha baked and left some cookies for us which was also a nice treat. We suggest ordering the fresh produce from them and the baked goods from Martha for your stay.

reviews.author: Erika
reviews.description: We had a wonderful stay at the yurt. Checking in and out was easy, as were all their instructions for our stay. As four 'foodies,' we greatly appreciated the well-stocked kitchen! When we realized we had forgotten a blender, Whitt and Martha were more than happy to share theirs. They were both very responsive and communicative in advance and during our stay. We loved the hot tub and pool, and only wish the sun would've come out a little more than it did so we could have made more use of them. The yurt was very clean, well stocked with linens, toiletries, games and movies. We would love to come and stay again, for longer next time! Highly recommend. Thank you, Whitt and Martha!

reviews.author: Tim
reviews.description: My wife and I had come here four and a half years ago for our honeymoon and decided to return for our babymoon. We again enjoyed the secluded environment and greenness and birdsong surrounding us. Both the pool and hot tub were well maintained, and we availed ourselves of both. We were surprised by some nice treats from their kitchen, which was generous. We're very glad we could make it back there.

reviews.author: Cassie
reviews.description: The yurt is amazing! The location is great- not too far from Standardsville. The yurt is well designed and decorated. The downstairs has a bed and futon and the upstairs also has two places to sleep. The bathroom is large and stocked with essentials (shampoo, conditioner, shower gel, blow dryer). On the property there is walking trail, the farm, a pool and hot tub. Whitt and Martha were super friendly and easy to communicate. We will definitely be back again. I would highly recommend!

reviews.author: Tania
reviews.description: Whitt and Martha were wonderful hosts and the yurt was so magical. The fire pit was lovely night and the deck was perfect for morning coffee. This place was perfect for our girls weekend! I would recommend this place for anyone who enjoys the tranquility of nature but still close enough to historical sites and wineries!

name: East Nashville Cozy & Cute Cottage!
description: A cozy & clean renovated cottage in South Inglewood with private entrance. One bedroom, one bathroom cottage w/ a nice patio and backyard. Plenty of street parking. We'd love to help make your Nashville trip perfect!

reviews.author: Tzur
reviews.description: Julian was very kind and responsive. The place was great and Julian recommendations made our stay in Nashville much more pleasant.

reviews.author: Lissy
reviews.description: Wish I could have stayed here longer! Perfect place to stay while on the road. Very spacious esp. the bathroom. Clean and comfy. Love the decor and Julian made checking in and out so simple and convenient. Also went to downtown Nashville in minutes and the Uber was under $5! It was great. My friend and my cats and I had a perfect stay!!

reviews.author: Blake
reviews.description: We had a great stay! Location is great and hosts are very nice and helpful! Would stay here again!

reviews.author: Gabriela
reviews.description: Nice comfy place.

reviews.author: Elizabeth
reviews.description: super convenient comfortable place. meticulously appointed. julian gave me great suggestions about what to do and where to eat. a+

reviews.author: Jailyn
reviews.description: This place was exactly as listed. Close to many attractions, clean, and decorated well. Communication with the host was quick and easy and no hassle with checking in or out. Highly recommended!

reviews.author: Jamie
reviews.description: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Julian's place. The guest house was clean, spacious, and comfortable. Just a short drive or $7 Uber to downtown and lots of restaurants and amenities close by. Julian was a great host with excellent communication.

name: Luxurious Condo near CN Tower
description: Enjoy the luxurious condo living and the stunning city & lake view in the heart of Toronto with FREE PARKING. Right next to CN Tower, Rogers Center, TIFF, and ACC. 55” TV with cable and Netflix, Gym, hot yoga, squash, hot tub, 25M lap pool, steam rooms, spa, BBQ and outdoor lounge.

reviews.author: Gretchen
reviews.description: Condo was spacious enough for two people...we probably could've even had our two kids with us and would have been fine with space. Sleek, modern, aesthetic. Close to waterfront and public transit. Host was very helpful, provided detailed instructions, and checked in a couple times. Would definitely stay here again!!

reviews.author: Tina
reviews.description:
Great place to stay if you want to be in walking distance to everything. Pool was nice to swim laps in. 
Instructions were easy to follow. The mattress was just like I have at home. I would recommend this place in a heartbeat. :)

reviews.author: Mengxue
reviews.description: My favourite part about Alper's place is the great location. It's close to the lake and great food.

reviews.author: Donna
reviews.description: Great location and the restaurant at this development was a great surprise!

reviews.author: Lauren
reviews.description: Location is amazing, super central and surrounded by everything you need. The view is stunning, and the apartment is clean and modern. Block is busy but two silent nights sleep where wonderful!

reviews.author: Peter
reviews.description: My wife and I were in town for a concert and Alper's place was perfect for us. It's close to everything and there's a dozen or so bars/restaurants only a couple of minutes (walking) away. The condo was clean and the building was exactly as advertised. Zero complaints.

reviews.author: Elisabeth
reviews.description: Alper is an amazing host. He is extremely responsive, detailed, and very open to providing recommendations for local eats and cocktails!

name: Garden Suite Efficiency
description: Private, independent garden suite with its own separate entrance through a lushly planted and sunny courtyard garden.   Restored detail and character abounds, with period Deco furniture and accents.

reviews.author: Paul
reviews.description:
Comfortable and unique experience Paul and ZAck were very helpful and easy to work woth. They gave a lot of tips and advice
Heartily recommend. The apartment is an easy ride away from sitescand also possible to walk to capitol inside of 20 minutes

reviews.author: Kathryn
reviews.description: Loved staying here! Location was great. Paul was very friendly and accommodating. He gave us many great tips on places to go, and also gave us his parking spot!! Room was beautifully decorated and comfortable. I would highly recommend!

reviews.author: Gregorio
reviews.description: Paul and Zach are amazing hosts. They made my stay very comfortable and inviting. The only negative... the room is so comfortable that I never wanted to leave. Thank you guys for being wonderful hosts. Hope to visit again soon.

reviews.author: Jeremy
reviews.description:
I feel like I could write a book about our (tragically) one-night stay at Paul's Bloomingdale oasis. For a review, however, perhaps a more succinct approach will do. Paul is a host among hosts, and his space is one of the most welcoming and beautiful places that I have ever spent a night in. Honestly, I'm not sure with which to be more impressed with -- the room or the hospitality! Photos of the space give you a good impression, but seeing it in person made me smile from ear to ear. Warm, cozy and perfectly inviting, the space is definitely intimate but more than accommodating  enough for a stay of one night or several.

Paul and his partner have masterfully created both an interior and garden that made me want to stay much longer than we did -- we've even started talking about coming back to DC just to stay there again! A big part of the appeal is his dedication to true hospitality. Welcoming us at our car and introducing us to the apartment, he even had drawn out a map of the neighborhood and drafted a list of his favorite joints, and walked us through both. At breakfast, we ran into him at the local cafe, and it seemed like everyone knew his name -- trust his recommendations. Even down to his clear love and inherent dedication to the people and history of the area, Paul is pushing to the boundaries of hospitality, in the most beautiful of ways.

reviews.author: Roy
reviews.description: Had a great stay. Beautiful place.

reviews.author: Claire
reviews.description: Wonderful garden and delightfully decorated interior. Paul was a fantastic host, will definitely stay here again next time we come to D.C.!

reviews.author: Hope
reviews.description: Paul and Zach were fantastic hosts! Upon arrival Paul met us outside and showed us to the apartment. They had a map of the area drawn out as well as a comprehensive list of all the great local spots which was extremely helpful. Its about a 15 min walk to the closest metro but my boyfriend and I mostly used uber/lyft (approx. $6-8 to all the major sites during out time there). The apartment is very small but the homey touches (coffee, tea, bottled water, juice, etc) and the thoughtful decorations made it feel like home. For my boyfriend and myself it was the perfect getaway weekend! We definitely recommend staying here!

name: Underground Hygge
description: This inspired dwelling nestled right into the breathtaking Columbia River Gorge mountainside. Reverently framed by the iconic round doorway, the wondrous views will entrance your imagination and inspire an unforgettable journey. Every nook of this little habitation will warm your sole, every cranny will charm your expedition of repose. Up the pathway, tucked into the earth, an unbelievable adventure awaits!

reviews.author: Amanda
reviews.description: We went to the Hobbit Hole for our 2nd anniversary and it was better than we expected! The view during the day is amazing and the view at night with the full bed of stars was unbelievable! Kristie put so much detail into the place it was perfect! The drive up there was a little nerve racking but so worth it!! I would recommend this place to anyone! LOTR fans or not would love it so much! Perfect get away!!

reviews.author: Estrella
reviews.description: Amazing place that truly delivers on the expectations.  The beauty, the creativity of the Hobbit Hole are unreal.  It is remote and quiet.  You will not forget your stay.

reviews.author: Jill
reviews.description: The Hobbit Inn is magical! It is so much more than the pictures could ever convey.

reviews.author: Kendal
reviews.description:
This hillside getaway was absolutely perfect. The views were phenomenal and all of the hobbit details were amazing and so enjoyable. We only stayed one night and wish we could have stayed forever. We were absolutely thrilled to be able to bring our fur baby on this adventure as well. 

True to the Hobbit Hole style - complete comfort.

reviews.author: Megan
reviews.description: This was a magical stay. The Hobbit Inn provides breathtaking views, scenic charm, and comforts for all. The deer and birds around aren't shy, and the fire place is cozy when the dark sets in. I'm already looking forward to coming back soon!

reviews.author: Haig
reviews.description: If you're a fan,this is a must. Otherwise, the view is worth the hike. Totally loved the stay although one night enough. Don't know if Gandalf's cart would survive the road in or if his old bones could handle the climb so should be warned to pack light

reviews.author: Amber
reviews.description: What a dream! This place checked all the boxes for me. We visited in June as two adults and one medium sized dog. Orondo is simply stunning and the property has incredible mountain and water views. The house itself blew me away - such fantastic attention to detail (for fans and non fans alike) and just a perfectly peaceful, comfortable stay. The bed and fireplace are fantastic. We did not make use of the tub or the woodworking table but appreciated both and all of the little hygge touches! Mostly we sat out on the porch and watched that stunning view - wow! Things to be mindful of: there is no kitchen (pack or pick up en route), power is limited (don't plan to have everything running at once), pack light (the place is cozy and the walk to the front door is steep), and check your pup for ticks if you're traipsing through the wildflowers on the east side of the Cascades :) I would recommend this spot to anyone - reward yourself and book it!

name: Unique Cob Cottage
description: Featured in numerous books on natural building, our cottage is a welcoming and cozy retreat hand sculpted of local, sustainable natural materials located on a lovely acreage with sheep, gardens and orchards.

reviews.author: Frances
reviews.description: This cottage is amazing! Pictures cannot give it true justice. Alexis and Manny are kind, caring, and knowledgeable. Mayne Island is breathtaking as well. This cottage is an amazing experience in itself. Give it a try!

reviews.author: Jordan
reviews.description: We had an incredible stay at the Cob. There are not enough words to describe how peaceful, relaxing, and thoroughly enjoyable our stay was. We were greeted after a long journey to lovely homemade banana bread, and savored the taste of local eggs/milk/granola. We woke up to their sheep hanging out outside our front door! Mayne Island is also fantastic, we had great meals at the The Groove, Bennett Bay Bistro, and Farm Gate, enjoyed kayaking through Kayaking Gulf Islands, and just biked and hiked around the island. Thank you to our wonderful hosts for sharing this experience!

reviews.author: Susan
reviews.description: This is a unique experience, perfect for anyone who appreciates simplicity, peace and beauty.  The welcome you'll receive is unsurpassable.  Enjoy!

reviews.author: Lind
reviews.description: Unique, magical and perfect for us

reviews.author: Sandra
reviews.description: Everything was just as the pictures described! A perfect spot for a couple to spend a few days and get away. We didn't do many activities on the island because it was a little cold and rainy, but we did go to the Japanese Garden (highly recommend - it happened to be sunny when we were there and we spent an hour alone in the garden). We also ate at one of the restaurants 'downtown' - can't remember the name, but it looked like a big white house and had a deck out front for outdoor seating. The food was great and locally sourced. Overall, wonderful experience!

reviews.author: Julie
reviews.description: Cottage was just what we expected, but island was quieter than we expected.  There were only a few eating establishments, but awesome hiking trails in the middle of the island.  Thanks again Alexis for sharing paradise with us.

reviews.author: Lana
reviews.description:
Ever since we booked this lovely cottage a few months ago we couldn't wait to come here!!! When we finally arrived I completely fell in love with this place! It's even more beautiful in person! Alexis is an amazing host - very friendly and helped us with the questions we had about the island and local food. She had delicious bread/milk/eggs/oatmeal/coffee for us! I loved the fresh flowers and plants all throughout the cottage. They add a lovely touch to this earthy cob :) I can go on and on about all the beautiful details - pottery/dishes/plants/pillows/blankets/rugs but you just need go see for yourself :) 
Caution: If your style is rustic/boho/country/farm house - you won't want to leave this place... ;)

name: Cabin #3 - Alfie the A-Frame
description: Airbnb's fourth 'Most-WishListed' property across all of Canada, our beautiful loft cabin has incredible views of the Sechelt Inlet and gets all the afternoon sun. The beach is a three minute walk downhill, and our community is very quiet as it sits at the end of the road. Why not come and relax for a few days?

reviews.author: Shi Lin
reviews.description:
We loved our little get away at Gary and Jen's cute little cabin. The place is cosy, but we thought it was plenty of room for the 3 of us on our girls trip; moreover, it was the perfect break from the business of the city. 

  The bed in the loft was soft, the little fireplace kept the place toasty, and the claw tub was a nice touch. Canoeing in the complimentary canoe was the highlight of our trip and tons of fun. We'll be back... maybe we will try out the lily pad next time for the hot tub. Thanks Gary and Jen for a great vacation retreat.

reviews.author: Sarah
reviews.description:
My daughter and I were welcomed beautifully, it was such a  wonderful stay with everything and more than we expected . I can't think anyone would not enjoy their stay , just look at the visitors book ! 
Enjoy

reviews.author: Natalie
reviews.description: Had a perfect weekend getaway at the Alfie A-frame cabin. The pictures shown were awesome but it's even better in person. They've had some fun/trendy furniture and decorative upgrades since the last Airbnb photos were taken so that was a nice surprise. It was super cozy and we didn't want to leave! We definitely want to come back again!

reviews.author: Jennifer
reviews.description: Looking for a cute, cozy little cabin in the woods with view of the ocean on the Sundshine Coast? This is it - great self contained unit north of Sechelt.  Gary and Jen provided lots of great suggestions and were very responsive to our inquiries and were super flexible.  Great for a weekend and comfortably accommodates two.

reviews.author: Catherine
reviews.description: We loved our time at Alfie - such a beautiful location! The canoeing was amazing, and we were cozy and comfortable in the lovely cabin.

reviews.author: Gillian
reviews.description: Fantastic stay at Alfie the A Frame! The cabin is cute and cozy and has everything we needed for a weekend getaway. The location is perfect - only a short stroll down to the water.

reviews.author: Arturo
reviews.description: This cabin is perfect and amazing. It had everything we needed and it was in the perfect location close to everything. The host were amazing and gave us our privacy but were also very quick with a respons when ever we had a question for them. I recommend this 100%

name: Heart of Downtown/English Bay views
description: This is a fantastic space in the heart of downtown Vancouver!  The location is ideal as there are copious amounts of restaurants, shops and things to do within walking distance.  The condo itself has huge windows with plenty of natural light to enjoy the views.

reviews.author: Ken
reviews.description: We chose Christine's apartment as our first Airbnb based on the rave reviews from previous guests.  Our stay was wonderful... The apartment is absolutely 'as presented' on the Airbnb site and Christine is a pleasure to deal with.

reviews.author: Michael
reviews.description: Christine's apartment is immaculate in a great locAtion. CHristine was a wonderful host meeting us off an evening flight and settling us in. Would recommend this apartment to others without hesitation

reviews.author: Richard
reviews.description: Excellent place. Really central and Christine is very helpful.

reviews.author: Tessa
reviews.description: We had such a wonderful in this perfectly located apartment with an amazong view. Lots of restaurants and bars nearby. Christine was always reachable. Definitely would go there again

reviews.author: Michelle
reviews.description: This condo is on the 20th floor of a very secure building. Beautiful views and sunsets!! Well stocked with everything you need. Close to everything!! IGA grocery store next door. Convenient parking pass. Within walking distance to shops and restaurants. Comfortable bed and sofa!!

reviews.author: Breanna
reviews.description: Amazing host, amazing location, amazing view, amazing comfort. Can't go wrong with this place. Would recommend to all.

reviews.author: Andrea
reviews.description: Great apartment, perfectly located in downtown Vancouver. We had an awesome time.

name: Modern New Private Room Downtown Water/Sunset View
description: Private bedroom in new condo, prime location downtown Vancouver. Corner suite with wrap around balcony, with views of English Bay and False Creek (sunset view). Minutes away from shopping and restaurants (2 min walk to Nordstrom). Short walking distance from live sports venues, Queen Elizabeth Theatre, Orpheum Concert Hall, and two Skytrain stations including a direct line from the airport. Easy access to Vancouver Convention Centre in less than 10 minutes using public bus or skytrain.

reviews.author: Maike
reviews.description: We enjoyed our short stay at Xiao's place very much. She and her fiancé Basile are very friendly and welcoming people. And Fitz is a curious and lovable little fellow. They have a well equipped and clean home and the view from their apartment over downton is just amazing. If they ever come to Europe, we would love to meet them again.

reviews.author: Rachana
reviews.description: Xiao and Basil were amazing hosts! They were super accommodating and provided a very clean room/bathroom. Fitz, the dog, was a great bonus!

reviews.author: Anna
reviews.description: Xiao and Basile were the perfect hosts and very welcoming towards us. Their apartment is in a great location in downtown Vancouver and has some amazing views from the 38th Floor balcony!

reviews.author: Kate
reviews.description:
Xiao's place is a perfectly situated apartment in downtown Vancouver. Xiao keeps it spotlessly clean. The accommodation allows for your own bathroom which is great. From the flats balcony you get a decent view of the downtown area and beyond. Some of Vancouver's other highlights such as Gastown, Yaletown and Canada Place are all in a nice walking distance. Xiao had provided a list of recommended eateries which we duly visited one of and it was delicious. 

You'll love Fitz too, just keep your door shut as he loves to venture in! 

Thank you Xiao for allowing us to stay in your apartment. It was just perfect for what we needed.

reviews.author: Ashley
reviews.description: Fantastic stay! Xiao was pleasant and very accommodating. It was easily one of my best experiences with Airbnb! Location is within walking distance from many restaurants, bars, and landmarks. I would highly recommend staying here.

reviews.author: Andrew
reviews.description: Very convenient location and the views from the apartment are outstanding. Amenities were accurately described - you'll have a private bathroom and a nice view from your room. Xiao and her roommate were very friendly and accommodating - had good recommendations on where to eat. Highly recommended.

reviews.author: Leslie
reviews.description: This is a great location and wonderful and helpful hosts.

name: Saul Zaik Treehouse!
description: 'This is Officially the Coolest Treehouse in the World' -Condé Nast Traveler

reviews.author: Nicole
reviews.description: Lance was laid back and a very generous host. Staying at his place was a once in a lifetime experience for us. Everything was immaculate and exactly as described. I'm still dreaming about the view.

reviews.author: Shea
reviews.description: The views, the views, the views! A magical landscape to see, to wake up to, and to go to bed to! We recommend you sit out on the main level porch at night- prop your feet up, and just chill. Take in the sounds, the cool breeze, the beautiful skyline and the nature surrounding you. A great space to relax and zone out.

reviews.author: Jordan
reviews.description: Really recommend this place. The house is beautiful and the views from it are even better (the road up is pretty twisty though!). Lance is a great host, really friendly and hospitable, and Bukowski the cat will be your new best friend right away.

reviews.author: Stephanie
reviews.description: Amazing views in an awesome historic treehouse. Lance is a great host. 10 min drive from downtown Portland.

reviews.author: Anthony
reviews.description: Lance's place is quite spectacular. No other Airbnb is going to offer you views like this of Portland. Lots of great recommendations, clean, well communicated. I'd classify this under a 'treat yourself' Airbnb!

reviews.author: Natalie
reviews.description:
Lance is a fabulous host! Really gives you privacy- but very accessible by text. The cat & conversation made our stay VERY homey...which we loved. 
A bonus for us was the firm matress, soft sheets & fluffy towels! 

The curvy neighborhood road is insane & makes coming & going interesting...but the views are worth it!

reviews.author: Susanne
reviews.description: This is a unique house, with truly spectacular views of the Portland skyline and the surrounding forest. Lance is an easy going host and his cat is extremely friendly. The accommodations themselves are simple; overall this rental worked perfectly for us as a base to explore Portland. Recommended.

name: Cottage in the Heart of Ballard
description: A  cozy cottage behind a lovely Victorian house. It has a 3/4 bath (shower). The cottage has a brick patio and a large trellis covered with roses and grape vines set in an English Garden. Also, see our equally nice 'Victorian in the Heart of Ballard' rental:  https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/20928

reviews.author: Lauren
reviews.description: Brad and Liz's was great! It's located in a cute, quiet neighborhood not far from Ballard's excellent shops, restaurants, bars, etc. Liz's art throughout the place was gorgeous, too.

reviews.author: Tonya
reviews.description: The place was perfect.  Very cutsey and artsy. I enjoyed talking to Liz about gardening. You could not go wrong staying at the cottage.

reviews.author: Noel
reviews.description: Great location for enjoying the Ballard/Fremont districts of Seattle. The cottage/studio and surrounding garden was a wonderful place to chill out after a busy day touring the sites. The cottage was well equipped with everything we needed and Brad & Liz were available in the main house if we had any questions. We would definitely stay here again if it is available on our next trip to Seattle.

reviews.author: Eric
reviews.description: Great place in a quiet yet easily walkable part of town. Would stay here again in a heartbeat!

reviews.author: Anand
reviews.description: Brad and Liz are great hosts hence we had a comfortable and pleasant stay. Loved the art works!

reviews.author: Jason
reviews.description: Great little cottage, enjoyed our stay there. Would stay there again in a heartbeat.

reviews.author: Teena
reviews.description: The grounds were beautiful and the studio space was perfect for us.

name: Dherdi's Accommodation
description: Our place is close to the city centre and good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers. We are open to short or long term stays. The room has a single bed, a large closet, a dresser with full size mirror. The washroom and kitchen are shared with other guests. Guests have access to free  Wi- Fi  Clean linens, bedding and towels are provided.

reviews.author: Richard
reviews.description: This was an interesting experience. The property is a ground-level apartment on a main street in Thompson. No frills but apartment is VERY clean. You share with a gentleman who lives there. His English is limited but he is very friendly and helpful. Location is  convenient to stores, airport, restaurants. Would recommend highly!

reviews.author: William
reviews.description: It's just livable basement, cuz there are not too many choices in Thompson.

reviews.author: Charlotte
reviews.description:
It was ok. Hosts were very friendly and welcoming. 
Location is great, easy to go downtown by walk.

reviews.author: Rachael
reviews.description: Great big room and lovely family. I had a private bathroom and a mini fridge in the room. Definitely recommend staying here.

reviews.author: Bee (Birgit)
reviews.description: It was nice to stay at Preet's place. I would stay there again. Thanks

name: Dherdi's  Bed & Breakfast
description: WELCOME drink & bowl of  FRESH FRUITS upon arrival & CONTINENTAL BREAKFAST before  departure among the amenities of the hospitality at  DHERDI'S  BED & BREAKFAST  AT THOMPSON (MB).

reviews.author: Kelly
reviews.description: Had a great stay! Would definitely stay again if passing through Thompson. Bedroom was nice and private in the basement, with its own bathroom. My time spent there was lovely. Very accommodating. Friendly. Clean. Received tea and cookies upon arrival, as well as an omelette with toast for breakfast! Exceeded my expectations. Thank you.

reviews.author: Jill
reviews.description: Preet and his family are very welcoming and cheerful. The home is very clean and tidy, and his wife's cooking is excellent. However, one must navigate a staircase from the main floor hallway to the suite in the basement. This was our first B & B stay and we weren't sure what to expect. I would recommend Preet's place as a comfortable and economical alternative to a hotel stay.

reviews.author: Bogdan
reviews.description: Good place for stay in Thompson, Preet is a nice and honest host.

reviews.author: Daryl
reviews.description: Wonderful place, wonderful family. Thanks for marking my stay so enjoyable.

reviews.author: Badri
reviews.description: The host and his family were very warm and cheerful. They helped us in every way possible. Preet's wife is a master chef of Punjabi culinary. If i visit Thompson again, I will surely stay in Preet's place.

reviews.author: Hermel
reviews.description: I would stay here again  very friendly people

reviews.author: Rohit
reviews.description: They were really nice to us and They Provided us with what they said in their description. I would like to live there.

name: Melgurd Lake - Fishing Cabin - Fly in only
description: This is a fly in only cabin on Melgurd Lake.  The fishing is unreal, unlike anything you have ever experienced. Walleye, Northern Pike and Perch are the main fish you will find.  We have a 14 ft Lund boat and a 16 ft Lund boat that are all equipped with swivel seats for your comfort.

name: Comfortable Suite by the Lake
description: Our suite is located a few short blocks from the Air Ronge Marina, Northlands College Campus and the Montreal River and its beautiful hiking trail.  It is newly finished and glowing.  We are excited to host business travellers and adventurers alike and to introduce them to the beauty the north has to offer.

reviews.author: Theresa
reviews.description: This is a beautiful suite with every detail attended to meticulously. Exceptional hosts who went above and beyond to be sure we enjoyed our stay. Highly recommended if you plan to visit LaRonge and area.

reviews.author: Anna
reviews.description: The space is large, well-equipped and comfortable.  There was even eggs and coffee and other foods for us.  Beautiful shower, good taste and very personable and attentive host

reviews.author: Daniel
reviews.description: We had a great time at this place. Steven and Melissa were always very kind and helpfull. I would definitly recommend their place to all kind of travellers.

name: Private Bedroom with Double Bed
description: Stay in a very clean, private. and affordable accommodation in private 3 bedroom, two story Condo home.  There are three bedrooms, two washrooms, washer & dryer, internet, cable TV, outside BBQ, linen, pillows, towels.  Everything you need to relax!

reviews.author: Morgan
reviews.description: Charlene was a fantastic host. Great home, private and clean. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.author: Tyler
reviews.description: Was in town for one night and great place to stay. Charlene was a great host along with clean and accommodating house. Would stay again if in La Ronge.

reviews.author: Julee
reviews.description: Charlene was such an awesome host! She made me feel extremely. Shes very friendly, I had a blast with her. She's really helpful when recommending places to check out around La Ronge. I would definitely recommend staying here!

reviews.author: Marc-Antoine
reviews.description: Charlene makes it easy for you. Regardless of your question, she will be always quick to respond and help you. The welcoming aspect of the stay is already felt when you chat with her before coming to her place. She also dedicated herself to recommending some key parts of her area. It's enlightening for someone that is not from the locality. Definitely a person you want to meet :)

reviews.author: Kira
reviews.description: Charlene is a great host.  She is warm and welcoming!  I stayed with her for 2 weeks and right from the beginning it felt like we had been room mates for months!  Her place is beautiful, her cat is adorable and she has so much knowledge of the area.  I highly recommend this accommodation.

reviews.author: Jessica
reviews.description:
Charlene was a FANTASTIC host! She bent over backwards to make sure that we had a good stay. When things came up, she was very communicative and gave us a heads up - she always kept us in the loop. 

Upon arrival, she gave us a quick tour then pretty much left us to our own devices while always making herself available to us if we needed it. Charlene was very accommodating and I would certainly recommend staying with her. 

The common areas were very clean, and she gave us free use of her kitchen. This was one of my favorite places to stay, and if I am ever up in La Ronge again, I wouldn't hesitate to book with her again!

reviews.author: Rick
reviews.description: I had a comfortable two night stay. Charlene was a very gracious host, giving me full access to her home. I barely saw her other than when I arrived. It was conveniently located, just two blocks off the highway. I would definitely stay again and recommend it to other travellers.

name: Room mate needed.
description: The perfect place to rent for a single student or professional who is seeking a temporary place to call home while staying in the Pas for school or work experience.

name: A Cozy Home in Stanley Mission
description: My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, and families (with kids).

name: lakefront modern cabin in Candle Lake
description: Our Lake Front cabin was built to entertain. Come and experience 2200 feet of living area, walkout patio, on the ground level, living room upstairs and entertainment room downstairs. This cabin offers spectacular views of the lake. There’s nothing like sitting on the deck and enjoying your morning coffee, or relaxing at the end of the day with a glass of wine. We expect our guests to relax, get comfortable, and enjoy this home away from home.

name: Romantic Cabana with view
description: Located in the coffee region, in the Andean mountains of Colombia, South America, a charming cabana made from bamboo, with a great view and a 'sendero' or pathway through the bamboo forest which criss-crosses our 5 acre organic farm, leading down to a stream.  A place to relax and commune with nature.

reviews.author: Marcus
reviews.description:
For city people like us this place was just the perfect antidote!
A beautifully designed cabin with views of lush tropical scenery on all sides, outdoor shower and bath, cats and dogs, friendly farmers, delicious 'real' Colombian meals , super friendly people (Yudy, her daughter and the chef) who looked after us and made us feel at home.
Right in the middle of nowhere but still very close to airport and the next city Armenia this place is truly a little paradise. 
Get away from it all and stay for a few nights, you will feel relaxed and happy!

reviews.author: Aja
reviews.description: This place is perfect if you want to get away and clear your mind. The view and cabana are absolutely beautiful! Everyone is so kind and I felt welcomed. Breakfast every morning was great! I also did a tour that Yudy set up (coffee farm tour) which was a great experience especially if you are a coffee drinker. I am for sure coming back!

reviews.author: Daniela
reviews.description: Amazing place and amazing hosts! Yudi, Natalia and Adiela are the best! Will defiantly come back!

reviews.author: Martin
reviews.description: Romantic secluded place with a Wonderful outdoor shower. They arranged for hernando to pick us up at the airport from there the rest was history! He showed us around all his favourite places, including restaurants, and drove us to nearby salento for amazing hikes! We also did a great coffee tour. Recommend for a couple travelling ! Hermando is the man. Yudy and Victoria also great hosts. Breakfasts every morning was delisioso

reviews.author: Zac
reviews.description: Yudy & Victoria offered us a wonderful private & cozy countryside experience in Colombia. The cabana is as beautiful as in the pictures. Falling asleep and waking up to the sounds of insects and birds was a real treat. Communication was excellent - Victoria provided us with details of the nearby attractions and Yudy helped us to book them once we arrived. Yudy's delightful neighbor, Hernando, helped transport us around for a nominal fee. Would love to return again soon.

reviews.author: Constanza
reviews.description:
My husband and I stayed at Yudy and Victoria´s for a little birthday getaway. This place is absolute heaven, from the beauty of the space to the sounds you´ll be surrounded by. Nature is in full bloom all around and the mornings are specially spectacular with amazing bird sightings, sounds, ah and the lighting. Incredible place, and Yudy is the sweetest host!
It is very secluded and far from the town center so keep that in mind for getting there. I highly recommend this slice of heaven to all peace and nature lovers.

reviews.author: Andras
reviews.description: perfect cabaña for two people to enjoy nature and peace of one of colombia's nicest regions! great food and magnificient landscape. it's a bit far away from the city, so you have to take a cab but it is totally worth it! thank you Yudy and Victoria

name: Exceptional property private beach
description: The house is located in a beautiful natural park, fully enclosed, supervised by a couple of 'caseiros' (caretaker and gardener)

reviews.author: Jackie
reviews.description: Fantastic visit to Casa Praia.location is beautiful,neri and neia are very helpful and kind.We did have a problem with Portuguese which was totally our fault, but got by with our phrase book! Area is great, but w were told not to walk any where .We are used to walking and felt a bit cut off..but we hired a car, and found some great restaurants.

reviews.author: Alison
reviews.description: The couple who take care of the area are the most wonderful people. Kind, helpful and welcoming. The house has splendid views and is quite isolated. Expect to take the car for everything. Very helpful people in Andrade supermarket and good food in Palmas at Raizes. I wouldn't call it young child friendly.

reviews.author: Mark
reviews.description: Amazing views.

reviews.author: Luis
reviews.description: Great place! Cannot say anything maore than just a great experience in a wonderful place. Love the house. Love the private beach. Love the area and thr weather. Just perfect!

reviews.author: Eric
reviews.description:
The place is fantastic and worth it but a lot to do to improve communication.
There was no Brazilian phone number available to help to find the place, which made us lose around two hours to find it. And when arrived the keeper of the land wasn't expecting us.
No basics in the kitchen, so we had to buy like everything. We left some and I hope others will be allowed to enjoy it.
And wifi not working.
Hope it will get better better because the place is worth it.

reviews.author: Felipe
reviews.description: This is the second time my wife and friends spend some time at the Beach House of dreams! Wonderfull place, nature and hosts!

reviews.author: Daniel
reviews.description:
The stay was perfect in every way.
Anthony is very attentive to explain all the questions that may arise before the stay.
In the property, the caretakers/'caseiros' are very receptive and friendly people. The house is beautiful, exactly - and even more beautiful, I would say - like the photos. Fully equipped with everything you could need. The parking is very convenient too.
I strongly recommend to everyone who want to relax, surrounded by a beautiful architecture and cinematic view. :-)

name: Valpo Romantic Suite in family home
description: Beautiful suite with bedroom, bathroom, balcony and a veranda overlooking the bay and the hills of Valparaiso. This suite is on the third floor of a restored house that is more than 100 years old and was built with red wood from Oregon and chilean oak at the beginning of the 20th century. It is a family home that include 4 generations and diferent nationalities.

reviews.author: Kristin
reviews.description: The place is beautiful! Would definitely stay again. It's further from the downtown as it's on a hill but there are walkable restaurants. The views are definitely the best part. Make it to the room for sunset!

reviews.author: Shelynn
reviews.description: I spent two nights in the Suite Mirador. I was traveling alone, but the whole family (I met Rubén, Meli y la dueña de la casa) was welcoming and made me feel at ease. Breakfast was delicious, the space tranquil and with a wonderful view. I would recommend to anyone looking to find peace in Valpo. Muchas gracias por una buena experiencia!

reviews.author: Iris
reviews.description: We had a great stay at Suite Mirador. The view from the house is amazing! The owners are very friendly and were always there to help us. The touristical area is easily reachable by bus or by a nice walk via Artilleria, from which you will have a great view on the harbour and the city. The only point for improvement could be the cleanliness, since you will share the house with two (beautiful!) cats who won't hesitate to leave their hairs and odor. We would definitly recommend staying in Suite Mirador!

reviews.author: Gina
reviews.description: There was a lack of communication with the host but overall, the location was close to public transit and sites.

reviews.author: Hendrik
reviews.description: very nice Appartment and very nice people!

reviews.author: Patricia
reviews.description: The room is as beautiful as in the pictures. Lina, the landlady is absolutely lovely and happy to help. Our only big problem was that the room was infested of mosquitos during the night, we couldn't sleep more than a couple of hours with the light on and we ended up leaving super early in the morning totally frustrated.

reviews.author: Hop
reviews.description: Great place with a view! Everyone is so nice, great breakfasts too!

name: STUDIO 52. PRÉDIO FAMOSO CENTRO SP
description: A modern, cozy and fully equipped apartment in a FAMOUS ART DECÓ Building (1942 Architecture prize). Very well located in São Paulo Historical Downtown - in the heart of the largest city in Brazil. Near of Metro, commerce and Sightseeing places.

reviews.author: Tara
reviews.description:
Great flat and view 
Thank you !

reviews.author: Marcela
reviews.description: Alexandre is a great host. The flat was clean and very cozy in a vintage style. The view from the balcony is amazing typical from São Paulo city, lots of interesting buildings around and some green area. During the night, the sound of the City doesn't disturb at all. I truly recommend this place in the heart of São Paulo.

reviews.author: YoungSook
reviews.description: It was the best home. Nice modern apartment with fully equipped kitchen. Loved the terrace. It was very nice location where about 10-15 walk away to Mercado municipal, bom ritero, downtown, se cathedral. We love this apartment and he gave us all the answers we asked. :)

reviews.author: Chad
reviews.description: Great place. Economical and excellent for the savvy traveler. Internet was very fast and if your creative with some weights you can get a good calesthetic workout in on the pool deck. Close to a market district which is nice. Coffee shop right beside the entrance of the building. Convenient.

reviews.author: Yoel
reviews.description: Alexandre is a great host. The apartment is well located in the downtown area and is fully equipped with all the amenities needed for you to enjoy the biggest city in Latin America, Sao Paulo. 100% recommended.

reviews.author: Jonas
reviews.description:
Alexandre was more than welcoming, giving us instructions before arriving and meeting us despite coming late at night. Unfortunately we had to cancel our last two nights stay and it was all good with them.

The place is nice and clean in a very special building, balcony space and views are great. Just positive vibes!

reviews.author: Line Sofie
reviews.description: Alexandre was extremely welcoming in the arrival process and during our stay. He gave us good tips and even helped us ordering pizza :)

name: Fairytale Cottage w/ 8 Waterfalls
description: Privacy, tranquility and nature, 45km from BH. Eight private waterfalls are just minutes away. The condominium is private and has very few houses and lots of nature!

reviews.author: Hugues
reviews.description:
Amazing Place! The House is perfect and cozy, The Location is scenic and secluded, a perfect way to reconnect again with nature. The hiking trails to the 8 amazing waterfalls were super easy and safe. and lastly Lucas was a great host! Very communicative from the beginning to end. I would highly recommend this Gem to anyone.. Thanks again Lucas for making this trip a memorable one.

P.S The Mango's are Delicious!!

reviews.author: Ken
reviews.description: Lucas was very accurate with his discripitions. We were in contact which helped.

reviews.author: Fabiano
reviews.description: Lucas was an extremely hospitable host. He went above and beyond for us as we spent 4 days in his beautiful home on the mountainside. We arrived to a basket of chocolates and were pleased to find a well cared for home decorated with great taste and a beautiful property. I would highly recommend this stay as a romantic getaway or a quick weekend trip with friends. Lucas will make sure you have anything you need to have the best weekend away from all of society's craziness.

reviews.author: Sian
reviews.description:
Lucas was a great host! We booked this and went straight on a road trip through Minas Gerais and wasn't near computers. Lucas went out of his way to contact us. He called us to explain where the house was and even suggested a plan for our stay. We were thrilled with his suggestions.

The house it's self is magical!! It's exactly like the photos and we had so much fun cooking on the aga. This house looks like something out of a fairytale and the surrounding landscape is also unbelievably beautiful. 

We walked to some near by waterfalls and they were breathtaking. They are part of the condominium and are only for residents, for the two days that we were there we had them all to ourselves! Amazing!! 

I'll be telling the stories of our stay here for years to come!!

reviews.author: Talita
reviews.description: Casa super aconchegante, organizada, com detalhes encantadores. Lugar privilegiado próximo as cachoeiras, um pedaço do paraíso. Tudo muito lindo! Ótima comunicação com o anfitrião, muito atencioso! Recomendo muito e já quero voltar!

reviews.author: Mônica
reviews.description: A casa é realmente uma joia! Extremamente fiel às fotos e em uma localização mais afastada e longe da loucura urbana. Perfeito para recarregar energias. As cachoeiras também são maravilhosas e as trilhas relativamente fáceis. Ficamos muito satisfeitos com tudo e o Lucas sempre prestativo e comunicativo. Obrigada!

reviews.author: Andrea
reviews.description: A casa é como nas fotos...rústica e acolhedora! O Lucas é muito atencioso e um ótimo anfitrião mesmo que à distância! Ótimo local para curtir um final de semana com uma turma de amigos!;)

name: Best place with ocean view - 2 bdrm
description: Beautiful 2 bedroom in the best location of the Praia da Costa beach. Stunning views and a very complete leisure area, will transform your stay into an unforgettable experience. Cozy and equiped with everything you need to enjoy the best Vila Velha.

reviews.author: Mary
reviews.description:
Absoultely wonderful!

Great location -- across the street from some of the best beaches in the State.

Would highly recommend to anyone living/vacationing in Vitória!

reviews.author: Adam
reviews.description: Great location. The apartment is right across from the beach. Within waking distance, they're are some nice bakeries where and stores where you can get food. There are two malls close by - maybe a 5 minute ride by uber or taxi. The apartment was very clean. I would recommend this place to someone!

reviews.author: Tony
reviews.description:
Fantastic!

Just GO!

Eduardo is on top and the place is simply too of the line!

reviews.author: Ette
reviews.description: Excelente localização, no melhor da Praia da Costa (a melhor de Vila Velha). Prédio bom, apartamento bom. O único problema é que o apartamento não estava bem limpo - os armários cheiravam a mofo, muitas gavetas estavam sujas, a roupa de cama de um dos quartos parecia suja também. De resto, o Eduardo se prontificou (mesmo à distância) a nos ajudar no que fosse possível para resolver os probleminhas que surgiram. Eu ficaria lá novamente, e recomendaria para amigos, com a única ressalva de pediria ao Eduardo que redobrasse a atenção com o pessoal da limpeza.

reviews.author: Felipe
reviews.description: The apartment itself was incredible and it had an amazing location with an incredible view of the ocean. The apartment is literally across the st from the beach. Having lived in this city before i can honestly say it could not have been in a better location. Eduardo was also very helpful and wanted to make sure we had everything we needed. I would absolutely recommend it to a friend!

reviews.author: Ethna
reviews.description: We had a welcome text from Eduardo shortly after arrival. The listings were accurate. The apartment itself is spacious and the location is lovely, looking out on the beach and the beautiful islands. The massive ships in the distance look great against the skyline. The air-conditioning in the bedrooms was very much appreciated. The beach lifestyle was an experience! People are on the beach from early morning: swimming, relaxing, exercising, doing yoga. walking the dog, selling coconut water...... And at night time there is even more activity. It seems everyone comes out to eat and chat and generally relax. It was great to have an apartment so close to all the activity!

name: Casinha da Vila
description: Situada uma vila bucólica em bairro tranquilo (Auto do Cascalho) próximo ao centro histórico,  6 minutos da praça central (900m), com fácil acesso também à cachoeiras e a Serra de São de São José, uma gostosa rede na varanda com uma vista apraziível, além de jardim exclusivo dos hospedes

reviews.author: Angelica
reviews.description: Stayed over a holiday weekend. All of us (2 couples) liked the place, which is exactly as shown in the photos. All the basic appliances available and the house is small, at the end of a cul-de-sac in a residential area, but really cute, with local architectural features with a very enjoyable outdoor space. Walkable from town centre but a fair 20min on foot up and down hill. Gustavo lives nearby and was available to all our queries. Overall a pleasant stay and would recommend Gustavo and his place when staying in Tiradentes for its good value and a quirky local experience.

reviews.author: Holly
reviews.description: Beautiful home. Very peaceful. A bit far from the town center compared to other places, but it's a great walk. A great place to relax and unwind.

reviews.author: Pedro
reviews.description: The host canceled this reservation 33 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

reviews.author: Sascha
reviews.description: Slightly uphill from Tiradentes' center, this house is set in a lovely, quiet and private courtyard. And what a house it is. Well appointed, with a fully equipped kitchen, beautiful veranda with not one but two hammocks (no fights!) and peaceful vibe it had everything we needed in one pretty place.

reviews.author: Maja
reviews.description: Just a wonderful place to stay!! This unique little house is  very tastefully furnished and decorated and even much cuter than shown in the pictures, we would have liked to stay a few more days. We did not meet Gustavo himself as he was not in town but everything was very well organised and the very friendly neighbour helped us with any questions we had.

reviews.author: Claudio
reviews.description:
When we saw the house, the first thing we said is: we wish we would have booked the place for the entire vacations.  You think your far into the mountains, yet you are at walking distance of the historic town in a safe and enchanting neighborhood. The view is wonderful, you even have an hammock to relax. That and paradise must be very similar; my daughters and I were enchanted. The stores can close so you think you are sleeping in a cave with complete darkness and silence. Yet with all the comfort of a modern house. The photos do not give justice to the beauty of the place!!

Also, Gustavo is a wonderful and kind guest. One thing you need to be sure is to study the map and the location of the house before arriving…obvious but I was relying on my GPS wish was not a good idea! We got lost but we phone Gustavo and he went to meet us downtown to show us the way.  He made us feel like it was our own house. We would definitely recommend this place and would like to rent it for two weeks next time. 

Muito obrigado Gustavo.

reviews.author: Nick
reviews.description: Gustavo's house is very comfortable and we enjoyed our stay.  It is located  in a quiet area up the hill from the bus station and easy to walk into town. There is a great Brazilian restaurant, Kitanda, on the corner of the street. Contact before and during the stay was easy, Gustavo lives really close by, and the exchange of keys was easy. We would definitely stay here again.

name: Little house, a 'feel at home' apt
description: Welcome! I set up my apartment with all the love & care to make anyone feel at home. Opened in 2016 is a brand new apt with rustic touch. A cozy place, 2.3km to the city center with views of the mountains. Parking space, kitchen & relaxing livingroom

reviews.author: Michael
reviews.description: Friendly host. Very helpful. Wonderful stay!

reviews.author: Frank
reviews.description: The App was well organized and bigger as expected. wifi did not work well. A bit weak and depending on the neighbour. In the evening some noise from the neighbors. In general very good.

reviews.author: Olivier
reviews.description:
Elisa and her family royally accommodated us in their apartment where we felt like home.
The apartment  is brand new and very well arranged.
We were three and it was very comfortable with two rooms and two bathrooms.
There is a superb sight on the town of Poços de Caldas and the night the statue of Christ shines with far on the mountain.
Thanks to you and to our friends the stay with Poços was a pleasure.
Oh! Minas Gerais  Quem te conhece Não esquece jamais 
Merci

reviews.author: Julia
reviews.description:
- É uma casa muito legal, espaço bem cuidado e acolhedor, com uma ótima vista para as montanhas(de vários ângulos), com suporte muito legal da Cristina,  fica próximo do centro, então é bom ir de carro, tem uma padaria e mercado perto o que facilita muito a reposição e principalmente a compra de quaisquer itens. 
- A cidade é muito legal com diversos pontos turísticos tendo como o mais distante a cerca de 20 minutos da casa, talvez o único problema seja alguns lugares para estacionar.
Super recomendo o espaço, tudo que está nas imagens você encontra de fato no apartamento. A cidade é incrível, assim que voltar a visitar a cidade é com este apartamento que vou me hospedar!

reviews.author: Maico
reviews.description: Ótima apartamento, bem localizado idêntico as fotos muito bonito.

reviews.author: Felipe Augusto
reviews.description: Apartamento muito bem mobiliado e organizado.  Lugar próximo ao centro e de fácil (URL HIDDEN) certeza voltaríamos novamente! Recomendo.

reviews.author: Jeferson
reviews.description: Você se sentirá num hotel 5 estrelas! Parabéns a nossa anfitriã!

name: Comfort and location in Salvador!
description: Well located apartment in Salvador, Barra's Neighborhoods. Near the best beaches, restaurants, bars, malls and night life!

reviews.author: Rodrigo
reviews.description: The host canceled this reservation 248 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

reviews.author: Andrei
reviews.description:
Lauro's Apartment is very nice, clean and well equipped. The location is very good and safe, close to the beach and to some shops. 

Would happily book again.

reviews.author: Thomas
reviews.description:
Lauro was a great host waiting for me to arrive on my late in the evening flight. He made it very clear that any he was there if I needed any help and checked up on me after a few days by mail to know I was adjusting well. 
The apartment is perfect. Clean, modern and finished to the last with beach towels and even a Nespresso machine! 
The location is excellent situated 5 minutes from the best city beach and in a relatively quiet area. 
I would very much recommend this place to anyone. 
Thomas

reviews.author: John
reviews.description: We had a fantastic week at Lauro's apartment. He and his mother greeted us and showed us everything in the apartment. It was spotlessly clean and very well equipped. The fridge was also stocked with lots of goodies for us, which was very thoughtful, and much appreciated. The apartment is very comfortable and has a great little balcony (no view, but still a nice place to sit). The air conditioning works well, and the wifi was good. The location of the apartment is excellent, close to shops and a couple of minutes walk from beautiful beaches. It felt very safe to us. it was easy to get Ubers to reach any parts of the city we wanted to visit. All in all, we really enjoyed our stay here, and found Lauro a wonderful host. He frequently checked by text that we had all we needed, and sent lots of very useful suggestions for place to visit or eat out. Thoroughly recommended!!

reviews.author: Rerison
reviews.description: Second time I stay here. Don't need to say more. Pity I didn't get same welcome as the first time with cheese bread on the table but can't complain as I was there just for 2 days. Would I go back? Yes. Would I recommend it? Yes.

reviews.author: Andre
reviews.description:
If you are looking for a place close to all amenities this is the place to go.
Beach - 2 blocks away
2 Supermarkets - less than a block away and 1 block away.
Ice cream shop - 2 blocks away
Restaurants - 2 blocks away
Lauro is a great host he even rushed to bring the keys when we arrived earlier than our original time and gave us a ride to the supermarket.
The wifi both in the apartment and the pool area is very good.
This place has a great location with everything you might need around you including banks and live music. 
If you have any issues Lauro will answer your messages and will fix it for you, he is the best.
I'm very happy with my stay at this condo.

reviews.author: Topher
reviews.description:
Lauro was very accommodating and helpful during our stay. Because our Portuguese was very limited, we really appreciated that he made himself available to answer questions about suggestions of what to see and how to book travel arrangements like tickets for ferry rides. The websites were difficult to navigate, so his assistance was invaluable. 

The home was well equipped and the photos did a good job showing what it looks like. He even went out of his way to leave some snacks and sundries to welcome us. The apartment is very secure, quiet, and private. It's very close to a supermarket and is in walking distance to a hub of local beachside activity.

As a gay couple, we found the neighborhood welcoming, safe, and fun. Salvador was wonderful, and we hope to be back soon.

name: Paz e conforto em Arraial D'Ajuda
description: Linda e charmosa casa de praia localizada em região super privilegiada da vila, perto do burburinho e, ao mesmo tempo, muito tranquila, reservada e silenciosa. Ideal para descansar com família e para viagem romântica de casais. Situada a 5 minutos de caminhada até a praia e o centrinho comercial (Rua do Mucugê).

reviews.author: Brian
reviews.description:
Maria Clara's house is just a dream -  to the point that my architect brother was delighted by the design, built and decoration. Surrounded by a beautiful garden, comfortable inside and out and fully equipped, it's a perfect place for a holiday in Arraial d'Ajuda. Beaches are nearby (although not walking distance) and the main street it some 10-15 minutes walk away. 

Maria Clara and her helper Rosali were extremely helpful throughout, and communication was great before and during the stay.

The one suggestion for improvement I could make is the installation of wi-fi. Mobile phone signal is good, but roaming charges can be prohibitive in Brazil and getting a local SIM card is far from trivial for foreigners: most providers require registering with a Brazilian identity card and doing it with the passport is not straightforward. 

I would definitely recommend this place and would stay again many times.

reviews.author: Fred
reviews.description:
A estadia na casa da Maria Clara foi ótima! A casa é ainda mais bonita ao vivo e atendeu perfeitamente às nossas necessidades. A localização é muito boa, numa rua pouco movimentada e segura. Uma caminhada curta leva à praia e à rua do Mucugê. Também fica ao lado da estrada que dá acesso a outras praias da região.
A comunicação com Maria Clara foi muito fácil, e a Roseli, que mora na casa ao lado no mesmo terreno, também esteve o tempo todo à disposição para tirar dúvidas.
Recomendo fortemente a estadia na casa da Maria Clara para quem planeja uma estadia com conforto e com liberdade para preparar pequenas refeições.

reviews.author: Jorge
reviews.description: El lugar es muy bonito, exacto  como se ven en las fotos. Ideal para una estadía romántica o de relax! Roseli fue maravillosa, estuvo siempre atenta en todo lo que nos pudo ayudar! Gracias

reviews.author: Christian
reviews.description: Nossa estadia foi maravilhosa! A casa é muito bonita  com um belo jardim e muitos pássaros a cantar! Ótima para relaxar e se desconectar do corre corre do dia a dia. A casa estava limpíssima com todos os ítens em ordem e as fotos batem com o local. Localizada entre a praia e o centrinho, acessível a pé em no máximo 10 minutos. Super recomendo.

reviews.author: Lito
reviews.description: La casa de Maria Clara es exactamente como se muestra en el aviso publicado. Es absolutamente original y funcional en su diseño. Se encuentra rodeada de un cuidado jardin que se mezcla con la naturaleza propia del lugar. Su ubicacion es privilegiada y el entorno totalmente seguro. La recomiendo ampliamente.

reviews.author: Juliana
reviews.description:
Nuestra primera vez en Brasil, Arrial un lugar hermoso y paradisiaco, mucha naturaleza y playas hermosas, La Casa Espectacular, muy linda, Completa y muy Comoda, muy cerca de las playas mas lindas, con la naturaleza al alcance de la mano, y todo lo que uno necesita para unas lindas vacaciones! Muy servicial tanto Maria Clara como Roseli, con lo que necesitaramos o con informacion del Lugar.
Sin Dudarlo, volveriamos a Elegir, tanto Arraial como esta Casa a la que Fuimos!
Muchas Gracias Maria Clara y Roseli!
Atte Christian, Juliana, Ramiro y Juana!

reviews.author: Miguel
reviews.description:
Pasamos unos días espectacular en familia 
Lugar tranquilo para relajarse dormir una siesta en la.hamaca y seguro sobre todo

name: BEAUTIFUL APT IN BARRA BEACH, AMAZING SEA VIEW!
description: Best location, modern, clean and fully fitted with all the comforts. This 4th floor apartment/flat was refurbished recently. Looks pristine new. Powerful yet silent air conditioning system with independent temperature per room. Fast WiFi. Large living room open kitchen. 2 large bedrooms, 2 bathrooms. Swim in the best urban beach in the world. Porto da Barra beach at the heart of the city. Best regarded area in the city. Public bikes, skate, jogging, restaurants, buses, taxis. Near shopping mall.

reviews.author: Faik
reviews.description:
No need to mention again, superhost!!
Most comfy and cosy bnb i found so far

reviews.author: Kai
reviews.description: I have little to add to what the other guests have already said. Lis' apartment truely IS a hidden pearl. Just wonderful! Thanks for making our stay in Salvador a great experience!

reviews.author: Naif
reviews.description: It was perfect location for carnaval away from the noise but close enough to walk :)

reviews.author: Alex
reviews.description: You won't get any better in Salvador! Brilliant host and apartment.

reviews.author: Nick
reviews.description: Perfect

reviews.author: Nick
reviews.description: Perfect apartment in a fantastic location. I could not be more pleased. Lis, is an outstanding host. Muito obrigado!!

reviews.author: Kimberly
reviews.description: Lis is a great host!  The apartment is small but big!  and met all needs for a working visit to Salvador.  Although I'm working, its like a vacation spot!

name: Prime 3 Storey Cape Town Penthouse
description: This large & modern penthouse is in a great, central area & consists of 3 floors, all boasting unbelievable views. The top floor has a private plunge pool & magical 360° vistas. Situated on the slopes of Table Mountain & close to everything!

reviews.author: Ryan
reviews.description: Gabriel's place was just like the listing and he himself was excellent. Our flight was late arriving and we did not have cell service, but he was outside the building waiting for us still anyway, gave us a tour of the place, and was very responsive if/when we had questions. The location was great and the views from the rooftop were amazing! We would definitely stay there again.

reviews.author: Chi-Woan
reviews.description: Gabriel is a great host and very helpful and responsive! The flat has stunning views but unfortunately we were a bit unlucky with the heavy winds during our stay that caused some sleepless nights for us...

reviews.author: Natalie
reviews.description: We had an amazing time in Capetown. The appartment is very cool and very good located. Gabriel is a very good host. Always there when we had a question. We would come back every time.

reviews.author: Jan
reviews.description: Such a beautiful and secluded space with unreal views. Only a short walk to a couple or great cafes and breakfast spots, and short drive to the city center. Gabriel was super responsive and checked on us often. Recommended to anyone!

reviews.author: Greetje
reviews.description: It was a great stay in the apartment and Will come back next Year

reviews.author: Marius
reviews.description: Place to be if you want to enjoy the sun rise!

reviews.author: Tessa
reviews.description: We had an amazing stay at Gabriels apartment in capetown, it was a 15 min drive/taxi to the city centre and waterfront. The pool and roof terrace made the perfect relaxing and sunbathing spot for the hotter days and we were so close to beaches and table mountain for other day trips! Lovely, clean and modern apartment that we would highly recommend! Thanks Gabriel!

name: Cape Town City Penthouse
description: Modern 170m2 penthouse in historic Cape Town. Coffee shops, museums, theatres within walking distance.  Best views of Lions Head and city from the 17th floor covered terrace and braai area. 24 hour security and indoor parking included.  10 min drive to beaches and attractions.

reviews.author: Natalie
reviews.description: The views from the apartment are breathtaking. Mike went above and beyond to ensure our stay was exceptional.

reviews.author: Rubem
reviews.description: Awesome place, great view

reviews.author: Seok Wah (Tracy)
reviews.description: Great location. 10 to 15 mins drive to most attractions and great restaurants.  Very clean and love the views from the apt. Did not meet Mike and Sol but they were really responsive. Will recommend

reviews.author: Yash
reviews.description:
The apartment is located in a fantastic location!

Everything that you need is just a small walk away including convenience stores, restaurants, pubs and clubs.

The parking is on the seventh floor and it does sometimes become annoying if you are going to go out in your car several times in the same day. You will have down and up the ramp 7 floors each way.

The collection of books and the games on the Xbox is marvelous and you could spend hours in the house enjoying the view from the balcony.

Table mountain, V&A waterfront, the airport and camps bay are very close from where you are based so those extra few minutes of snoozing alarms will not make a big difference!

reviews.author: Susan
reviews.description: This is a great location in Cape Town! We thoroughly enjoyed staying at 1701 Four Seasons. Be sure to read their recommendations for restaurants as they are absolutely correct...The Cousins and Miller's Thumb were outstanding! And Truth Coffee is a block away with great lattes and breakfast. The views of Cape Town are stunning from the outside patio, particularly viewing the night lights of the city. We walked just about everywhere during the day but took Uber once it was dark. Sol and Mike responded quickly to questions we had and were great hosts. We would stay here again if our travels bring us back to Cape Town.

reviews.author: Erika
reviews.description: Amazing location with fabulous views.  Everything you may need and more are in the unit.  Bus route right there and parking in the building.

reviews.author: Xander
reviews.description: Absolutely amazing place with everything you need! Mike and Sol are great hosts! Would definitely recommend to a friend and will stay here again in the future!

name: Mediteranean style villa apartment
description: Backed up against the mountain with uninterrupted sea views the apartment has a spacious, luxury bedroom, sunny lounge area, small kitchen and shower room en suite.

reviews.author: Julie
reviews.description: She's photos do not do this place justice. The views of Camps Bay, Table Mountain and Lion's Head are spectacular. The flat is cozy and quiet, located in arguably the best area. You will need to take Ubers to dinner or bars, but everything is relatively close (and this spot is worth it). Sue's lab was a welcome addition as we missed our own dog during this trip. Overall, a superb experience.

reviews.author: Niki
reviews.description: If you're going to Cape Town, put this place on the top of your list of places to stay! The most beautiful Airbnb we have stayed in. Gorgeous furnishings and a stunning view. Everything you need for self catering although we ate out every evening with great eateries in Camps Bay and Kloof St only a few minutes drive away. Perfect location, close to the main attractions like Table Mountain and Signal Hill. We loved having Rocker the Lab and Thumper the cat around too.

reviews.author: Greg
reviews.description: We just returned from our stay and had a wonderful time.  Sue's place is fabulous...very beautiful and well appointed.  And the view is breathtaking.  I would recommend this as a place to stay for anyone heading to Cape Town!

reviews.author: Meagan
reviews.description: Christina and Sue were great hosts! The house was beautiful and we were treated exceptionally well! Highly recommended

reviews.author: Alessandra
reviews.description: Beautiful home, amazing views, conveniently located in Camps Bay. Sue was a very responsive host and easy to reach. Tidy and lovely villa. Highly recommend
