reviews.author: Hanna
reviews.description: The photos of Sue's villa do not do it justice. It's a spectacular property, beautiful and incredibly spacious. Equipped with everything you could possibly need and just a short uber ride down to camps bay and the wonderful beach. A great place and we will certainly stay again should we be lucky enough to come back to Cape Town.

reviews.author: Katie
reviews.description: We had a wonderful time staying at Sue's beautiful home. The space exceeded our expectations. It was even more beautiful than what the picture is a lead on. Also, the location was excellent. For not knowing Cape Town well, we were relieved to know just how easy it was to get around from Camp's Bay and into Cape Town, table Mountain, and all of the beautiful beaches.

name: Private room in the  beach suburb Llandudno
description: Our beautiful and homely residence in the beach suburb of Llandudno has a spare room downstairs and we invite you to stay in one of the most exclusive areas of Cape Town. Full access to the main house is included and the beach is a 15 minute slow walk away. Exquisite sea views from all the living spaces. You'll feel like you're on a ship!

reviews.author: Heidi
reviews.description: What I loved my Stay? Everything !What I loved about my Hosts ? They are the most generous people. They made me feel like ' HOME ' . They were always there for me ... gave me Tips and Advice whenever needed ... Their house is as special as themselves. Full of collective things and a very personal touch ( ...that I loved ) The Living Room and Terrace gives you a breathtaking View over the Atlantic  .... and watching the Sunset was the Highlight of my Day. As I traveled alone , it was very important to me to be in a safe Area.Llandudndo is one of the safest Areas around Capetown.Its quiet and guarded 24/7 ...the Beach is beautiful and only a short Walk from the house .... I recommend a car , since the next Supermarket is located in Hout Bay ( a 10 Minute Drive from Llandudno)By the way a wonderful way to practice driving in South Africa on the Left.And now let me finish by saying: Its the most wonderful place to be and the most wonderful people to be with ....and last but not least don't  let me forget ' Max' the Dog.My Soulmate my ' Beach Buddy ' ..... I miss him dearly !

reviews.author: Priya
reviews.description: Cape Town was our last stop before we could head back to our country. Lindy & Gavin's was a perfect place to stay on the last leg of our trip. The location is amazing, view - breathtaking, quiet - away from the normal hustle bustle, lovely view of the ocean and mountains, cozy room, access to the most beautiful deck, kitchen and of course the little pup and the cat. It was great. I'd recommend this to anybody. Thanks Lindy and Gavin.

reviews.author: William
reviews.description: The stay was great and the hosts did a good job of making me feel at home. The neighborhood has great views of the ocean and Table Mountain during the day, and you get awesome views of the stars at night since there are no street lights.

reviews.author: Marius
reviews.description: This location offers great value for money. The room was a bit small but we had unhindered access to the rest of the house and the property which made up for this.

reviews.author: Abhinav
reviews.description: One of the best Airbnb houses in he world. Breathtaking location with amazing views and amazing interior decor.

reviews.author: Lena
reviews.description: We had an amazing time at Lindy and Gavin's! It is a beautiful get away from the city with amazing views on the sea and the mountains in the back. They offered plenty of space to feel comfortable around and we enjoyed lots of time sitting outside on our patio for breakfast, watching the sunsets or enjoying a glass of wine accompanied by the cute dog Max and the cat :) The beach is just a ten minute walk away. Since Llandudno is a quiet neighbourhood and a 25 minute drive into the city (there are shops ten minutes away in Hout Bay though)it is helpful to have a car around. We are very glad that we could spend our last days in Capetown in this lovely home and hope to be back one day! :)

reviews.author: Victoria
reviews.description: I had a wonderful stay with Lindy and Gavin.  The room is lovely and the deck has the most magical views.  Its all very relaxed and Lindy is just fabulous.  Only wish I had longer to stay and enjoy another chat with Lindy

name: Seacliffe on Two - Seacliffe Road - Bantry Bay
description: Seacliffe on Two is nestled on a quiet road between Seapoint and Camps Bay. The luxury Bantry Bay apartment is known as a wind-free location and properties in the area is considered premium with spectacular ocean views.

reviews.author: Nerushka
reviews.description: Beautiful apartment , great value for money!

reviews.author: Auret
reviews.description: What a view, no need to travel around to appreciate Cpt, you can do so right from your own living room.

reviews.author: Sherri
reviews.description: Photos don't do justice to the incredible view and setting with waves breaking nearly under your room.  Good restaurants, shopping and groceries in easy walking distance.  Big Red Bus stop  for comprehensive touring of entire area including Cape Point is nearby.  Tide pools in front of building are fun.  Charl was very helpful when our train from Johannesburg arrived very late;. he sent his driver who helped get us into the apartment.  Excellent kitchen set up with all the dishes and utensils.  Washer and dryer was very appreciated!!!

reviews.author: Alaa
reviews.description: We had a great time, and we enjoyed our stay in this wonderful modern apartment and spectacular view of the ocean. You will find everything you need and more. The apartment location is also very good, using a car you can easily reach a lot of resturants and shops.

reviews.author: Demis
reviews.description: This is the best place you can stay with a big group in Cape Town. The ocean view is simply unbelievable! The place is very clean and nice, and includes everything you can dream to live for a short period in Cape Town. Communication was perfect. 100% recommended.

reviews.author: Jesper
reviews.description: Great spacious place with amazing views. Charl is a very welcoming host and he made sure everything was handled perfectly. We will book this place again next time.

reviews.author: Jenny
reviews.description: In all respects excelent from the first minute to the last.   One lacked for nothing, even to the friendliness of the building manager.

name: Villa Ondine: Cape Town Beach House
description: Luxury beach front villa with direct beach access and sparkling pool. Amazing sea and mountain views with great outdoor entertainment areas protected from the wind. It sleeps 8 people in 4 comfortable double bedrooms, all with sea views.

reviews.author: Roel
reviews.description: Villa Ondine is a beautiful, big villa situated at the beach of Kommetjie. The place itself is so lovely we almost didn't want to leave it to visit all the beauty of Capetown. All major attractions can be reached within 45 minutes driving. We spend 6 nights in Ondine with 3 kids of 10, 12 and 13 and managed to see a lot of the major spots while still allowing time to relax in the villa, enjoying the beach, the pool or the terrace. We got a warm welcome by Tim's father Leon who lives in a house adjacent to the villa. The sunset over the Atlantic can be viewed from the beach or terrace and in the distance you can see Hout Bay and the table mountain. The sound of the waves is ever present in the house. The place itself is very large with 2 terraces, 4 twin bedrooms and a large living/dining with open kitchen which is overlooking the atlantic. We felt at home instantaneously and will for sure be back one day.

reviews.author: Ambre
reviews.description: The house is nice but some things are not acceptable. The lady who came do the cleaning didn't ring at the door she came through the garden and didn't say hello, asking us to finish quickly. same for the men with her.  after was the most that the father of the owner came at 9am (check in at 10) with people (builders) in the garden  and a big big dog who entered in the house!!!  (we have a baby of 5 weeks old who was on seat on the floor and a girl of 3 years old) they didn't say good morning (or sorry) as we were at breakfast!!  the bathroom is open view to the garden and this people came on the bathroom window when my wife was still in the shower !!! Just this feeling you are in their house! Plus for this price please put some lamp/ light on side of the beds and some shampoo/soap in the bathrooms and oil for the kitchen... the house is really nice but some things and services has to be changed for this type of prices.

reviews.author: William & Lizzie
reviews.description: We had such a fantastic stay. The house is great and the views were amazing. We felt very lucky to have stayed here and would highly recommend it.

reviews.author: LeeAnn
reviews.description:
Tim and his parents were great hosts. We loved the house, the views, location and size it great for a large family or extended family. The only down side, is for elders walking to the beach had to bed done on the road. It's a rocky walk. 
Thanks for a wonderful stay.

reviews.author: Jeremy
reviews.description: Wonderful stay right on the beach. Easy check-in, well equipped home, we had a fantastic time.

reviews.author: Rozandi
reviews.description: The house has an incredible view and a lovely living space. We were really lucky with weather and as such could enjoy the outside space. we were 6 adults with children which meant a full house, but the space provides well for a bigger group. parking is limited for bigger groups as the owner and his parents live on the property as well. i did not read the reviews properly and missed this fact.

reviews.author: Gabriel
reviews.description:
The house is really beautifull and well decorated, perfectly integrated in its environment. The outside lightnings are well thinked and beautifull. The main room with its bathroom give a smashing view on the sea and is perfect for a couple Looking for romance and relaxing time. There was enough space for two couples with four kids, the living room is just huge with breathtaking view on the bay. The terrasse around the house is well made, confortable, the outside sofa is perfect for a drink while you admire the sunset on the sea.
Tim's father, Leon, was a very kind host.

name: Room and bathroom in spacious home near the beach
description: A private room and a private bathroom in our huge apartment. Central but quiet, in Hayarkon street, a minute walk to the beach.

reviews.author: Francine
reviews.description: Yoav and Chen are very friendly welcoming hosts who take an interest in their guests.  They live in a historic building on  the coast of Tel Aviv very near the beach and all the restaurants and cafes. There are buses that go towards Jaffa.  It is an excellent location for everything you may want to do in Tel Aviv and for taking a swim in the sea.

reviews.author: Shikse
reviews.description: Yoav is a great guy. It was fun talking with him. They are very flexible with everything. I was just booking a day in advance and he immediately responded. Thanks so much and see you hopefully soon again

reviews.author: Gloria
reviews.description: It was the best Airbnb experience I ever had:) Yoav and Chen are kind, helpful and fun to be around! And the location is very good, as described 2-3 minutes from the beach. The room was neat and artistic! Don't miss the chance to make your stay great in Telaviv!

reviews.author: Shay
reviews.description: Wow, This was a great experience! Chen and Yoav were very helpful in guiding me and helping out while at their house. I found everything to be as promised and above it. The location is amazing and the room and apartment spacious, clean, well organized and comfortable. I would be very happy to come stay again. Keep up the good work and hospitality.

reviews.author: Tal
reviews.description:
Chen and Yoav are the most friendly hosts and will let you feel at home from the first moment.
The listing description is very accurate and the the location is great - 2 minutes walking from the beach.
Highly recommended.

reviews.author: Mattan
reviews.description: Yoav & Chen are extremely friendly and are clearly experienced hosts. Their apartment is exceptionally located; it is nearby the beach, restaurants, and bars. We greatly appreciated their flexibility and restaurant suggestions. My friends and I had a great stay and would highly recommend their apartment.

reviews.author: James
reviews.description: Awesome hosts. Great fun!

name: Spacious Room in a Designed Apartment
description: We'll be happy to welcome you to our beautiful apartment!

reviews.author: Rebecca
reviews.description: Great hosts and great apartment. They were very hospitable and nice. It all very convenient.

reviews.author: Jia-Chuen
reviews.description: Quiet and friendly neighbourhood. Lovely cats. Neat and tidy place to sleep!!

reviews.author: Daniel
reviews.description: Literally the best hosts you can ever ask for. Book ASAP before someone else does. They are the best. A++++

reviews.author: Francesca
reviews.description: Super nice and cozy place, big room with private bathroom in a quiet zone. Lidia and Eyal are super nice and willing to help for anything and also good people to chat with if you want to. Super recommended.

reviews.author: Walt
reviews.description: Both Eyal and Lidia will greet you with big smiles. I would never forget the days staying their home, chatting warmly. We cooked a big meal and had lunch together. Apart from clean, tidy and quiet room, I believe it's the atmosphere of hospitality that will take us back to them next time. Strongly recommend!

reviews.author: Jennifer
reviews.description:
Lidia and Eyal were the most perfect hosts. I could not believe how gorgeous their home was; the bedroom (with a private bathroom) was spacious, clean, and beautiful. They also have a big, tidy kitchen (they are wonderful cooks, too) and a relaxing balcony area. 

They are extremely willing to help out in any way possible (directions, suggestions for places to eat, help with commuting, shopping, etc.). 

The two cats (Charlie and Cece) are very sweet - they made the stay even better!

WiFi is great, the shower has good water pressure, and the place is conveniently located in the city (close to Katznelson and to Herzl Street).

I have never had a better stay at an AirBnB - both the physical space itself and the hosts were perfect. I would certainly stay here again!

name: A small private room in Ramat Gan
description: A 2x3 room with a double bed, drawer and a fan,

reviews.author: Wala
reviews.description:
My stay on Nadav's place was so great and I highly recommend it, Nadav was so polite, he explained to me about the apt and the public transit.
It was a pleasure to meet Nadav and to stay at his place

Thanks,

Wala Goanmi

reviews.author: Tzachi
reviews.description: Super host indeed!!! Very very nice and wellcoming, thr flat is big nice and cozy and nadav is realy graet host

reviews.author: Shai
reviews.description: Great hospitality

reviews.author: Vasily
reviews.description: Nadav provides a perfect hosting. Nadav has a great attitude towards his guest. The room is nice and comfortable. The apartment is very close to Bar-Ilan university.

reviews.author: Mohammad
reviews.description: a very welcoming person, and really trying to help out. a very friendly person. Highly recommended

reviews.author: Omer
reviews.description:
Great host. Kind, nice and informative.
There is not A/C in the room so if you are sensitive to heat and humidity August is not recommended

reviews.author: Miriam
reviews.description: Thanks for the comfortable and clean room! Meet you next time :)

name: Studio apartment in an attic
description: fully equipted, brand new studio apartment on the third floor of the house. the entrance is through your host house. the location is on the north side of the city , 5 minutes walk from road 44 leading to tel aviv.

reviews.author: Renee And David
reviews.description: We always enjoy staying here. Ido's mother is very welcoming.

reviews.author: Alex
reviews.description: Great place and very welcoming and pleasant hosts! Although we stayed only for one night, we enjoyed every moment!

reviews.author: Renee And David
reviews.description: Always nice to stay here!

reviews.author: Renee And David
reviews.description: This studio apartment has become our regular airbnb stay when we need to be near Tel Aviv and the airport. It is comfortable and clean, and Ido's parents are very welcoming.

reviews.author: Renee And David
reviews.description: A very pleasant stay, as always!

reviews.author: Jeremy
reviews.description: המארחים בעלי לב רחב, נחמדים שירשו את מידת האירוח ישר מאברהם אבינו

reviews.author: Renee And David
reviews.description: David has stayed at this attic studio several times and keeps coming back because it is a very pleasant place to stay and is reasonably priced. I joined him on this last stay and I agree. Ido's mother is welcoming and lovely to chat with. Everything about the attic studio is very: very clean, very comfortable bed, very nice shower, very spacious, very inviting. I look forward to staying there again.

name: Absolutely HOME in the NORTH
description: The apt is in a quiet neighborhood but well  situated to main roads and town center.The apt is  light and airy and has everything you could possibly need for couples or families with children. The pool is up in the summer months.

reviews.author: Netta
reviews.description: rina and boky are the best, the house is clean and tidy, they have everything you need and more and they really are the best hosts, i hope to see them again soon.

reviews.author: Ewa
reviews.description: Very nice and comfortable apartment in the middle of quiet neighborhood.  Very clean, spacey, full of light.  Rina and Buki were very responsive, great hosts.  They took care of us and of our little son that got toys, bed, bath tools and so much space to explore.  Plenty of breakfast food provided in the fridge but the hit was home made bread waiting for us every morning.  Thank you Rina and Buki!

reviews.author: Yuval
reviews.description: תודה מקרב לב לרינה ובוקי הנחמדים והלבביים, שארחו את משפחתינו ביחידת הדיור שלהם במהלך חול המועד סוכות. מצאנו דירה חדישה, מוארת, נוחה ונקייה מאוד, עם הרבה אויר טוב ואווירה טובה. הופתענו כל בוקר לגלות במורד המדרגות כיכר לחם, חמה וטעימה, שנאפתה על ידי רינה, אשר שידרגה לנו את ארוחת הבוקר בגדול. השכונה יפיפיה והמיקום המרכזי היה נגיש לטיולים מהנים שערכנו בגליל המערבי ובחיפה. מומלץ בחום!

reviews.author: Annie
reviews.description: Charming hosts, they did everything in order to make us happy in our vacation. we have received more than what is specified in the site. The housing unit is linked to the family's villa located in a small neighborhood. Plenty of nearby attractions for families.

reviews.author: Erez
reviews.description:
רינה ובוקי הם מארחים מושלמים. הם היו זמינים ונתנו לנו מענה מיידי לכל שאלה ובקשה שלנו, ובו בזמן נתנו לנו גם את המרחב והשקט שנדרשים בזמן חופשה.
הדירה שהם מציעים מאובזרת בכל מה שצריך, נקייה, מאווררת ומתוחזקת ברמה הגבוהה ביותר.
הלחם הטרי שהמתין לנו ליד הדלת בכל בוקר שידרג את חוויית השהייה שלנו במקום.
נהננו מאד. ממליצים בחום רב!!

reviews.author: Zorik
reviews.description: We have been at Buki and Rina's house with our two girls at the end of August for a week. We are very happy with our choise.  The house was very convenient, clean and had everything we needed.  The hosters did everything they could in order we feel as comfortable as possible.  Additionally,  there are a lot of attractions to kids in a maximum drive of half an hour.  Thanks to Rina and Buki for a wonderful vacation.  Highly Recommended!

reviews.author: Ronit
reviews.description:
רינה ובוקי קיבלו אותנו בחום ובסבר פנים יפות. הם היו חביבים ונתנו לנו להרגיש בבית מרגע ההגעה. הדירה נראית בדיוק כמו בתמונות. אכן 'בית'  מאחר והוא מאובזר למשפחות עם ילדים בצורה נפלאה. הכל נקי ומסודר ומאוד נעים. נהננו מאוד מהלחם הטרי שרינה אופה כל בוקר. נהננו מאוד מהבריכה ומהנוף הנפלא שנשקף מהחצר. 
תודה רבה! בהחלט נחזור שוב.
Rina and Buky welcomed us very warmly. We felt 'at home' right from the start. The house is well equipped for families with children. It looks exactly like the pictures. It is nice and neat and very clean. The neighborhood is very nice and quiet. We loved the fresh bread Rina baked for us every morning. we enjoyed very much the pool and the great view from the yard.
Thank you! we will be back!

name: Private unit in a antique stone Templer house
description: 100 year old stone country home, in the heart of Aloney Abba Templer village. Recently renovated. One bedroom, living room with pull out double couch. Complete kitchen and dining area facilities. Bathroom with shower. Laundry facilities. Parking available. Beautiful country surroundings. 60 sq. meters. Limited bus service to the area, car recommended.

reviews.author: Moria
reviews.description: This is definitely a place to come back to. Everything from the accommodations to the owners was perfect. I feel very grateful for the chance to get ready foe my own wedding in such a setting. Extremely recommended for couples seeking a quiet, cozy and relaxing vacation!

reviews.author: Ron
reviews.description:
the place is very nice and clean. it is very comfortabe and an impressive design.
We enjoied the stay, and we think that we will come over agine.

reviews.author: Liron
reviews.description: A lovely place with all the amenities needed for a great vacation. private, clean and spacious, and the hosts are helpful and very nice. We hope to come back in the future :)

reviews.author: Zohar
reviews.description:
Our friends stayed in the place for 5 days. the place is clean , cozy, beautifully built and designed. the location is good for traveling in the Galilee and North of Israel, with a rented car. the Landlord is very nice and available.
very much recommended.

reviews.author: Nesli
reviews.description:
This was our second time staying at Eran and Debbi's place. 
A wonderful location, a really great house, well equipped kitchen and great hosts
Eran and Debbi were nice and helpful. they were very attentive and available within just a few minutes.

reviews.author: Assaf
reviews.description: Eran was very nice, the place is well kept and very comfortable. Excellent location. Recommended!

reviews.author: Nesli
reviews.description:
The apartment is beautiful, well equipped and in great location.
Eran and Debbi were really great and hospital.

We would love to come back.

Thank you for a great vacation.

name: quiet room
description: quiet room room in a natural grove . on the top of carmel mount .

reviews.author: Gerrit
reviews.description: What a lovely place! Spacious, clean, bright, comfortable. Sawsan and Maurice make you feel at home and prepare a great breakfast.

reviews.author: Lee
reviews.description: A little hard to find, set back in a peaceful suburb behind the M supermarket. Sawsan met me at the Casablanca restaurant which proved to be a helpful offer. Sawsan and family are wonderful hosts, friendly, educated and accommodating. Recommended.

reviews.author: Farina
reviews.description:
We had a awesome stay at Samsan's beautiful quiet house. She and her children welcomed us very lovely! She helped us in every way. We really enjoyed the stay at her place and wished we could stay longer to discover the nice Carmel-Nationalpark. The house is just 15 minutes by car to Haifa centrum. 
Note: Sawsan will prepare a really good oriental breakfast for you ;)

reviews.author: Ran
reviews.description:
Nice room, own entrance and private garden for the guest. Nearby supermarket, bit walk to restaurant.
 Very helpful hosts.
Almost on the Israel trail.

name: Dreamy Mountain & Sea View Apt
description: Beautiful Mountain & sea view 70 squared meters apartment , a quiet neighbourhood the perfect place for relaxation located on the slopes of Israel's Mt. Carmel, Haifa.

reviews.author: בועז
reviews.description: מקום נעים, נוף מדהים

reviews.author: Elizabeth
reviews.description: The apartment is lovely and clean! The location is prime for hiking.

reviews.author: Tal
reviews.description: I think that the fact this is not my 1st time there, and I will be happy to return, says it all. Quite place, attentive people. Just what we looked for.

reviews.author: Yael
reviews.description: The host was very hospitable and readily available. Thanks!

reviews.author: Dima
reviews.description: Peaceful location, beautiful view, very clean apartment, have all that you need for comfortable stay, super communication with Or. We enjoyed.

reviews.author: Dmitry
reviews.description: The apartment is really cozy and well-equipped. The view on the mountain is pleasant. Everything is really clean and the apartment is quite spacious. I would definitely recommend!

reviews.author: Gilli
reviews.description: Perfect spot - Quiet, clean, beautiful. What else can one ask for... I'll definitely love to visit Or's place again.

name: Beautiful and quiet place
description: Beautiful and quiet place with a private courtyard. Kiryat Tivon pastoral center with cafes and restaurants. Kiryat Tivon is located about an hour's drive from Tel Aviv.

reviews.author: Ravid
reviews.description: The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

reviews.author: EGiulio
reviews.description: Yaron welcomed me friendly upon arrival and showed me the place. He kindly offered to take anything I'd need during my short staying directly for his kitchen, should I need it. The place is fine for a single person though, two people may find it difficult to stay longer than a couple of days. The location is quiet,there is a nice walkway across leading to a river. The centre of Tivon is not far, but not walking distance.

reviews.author: Roneet
reviews.description: Yaron was very accommodating and easy to deal with.  The space was lovely and clean - bedroom, bathroom and small kitchen.  It is a separate building in the back garden of his house.  He was very welcoming. I would definitely recommend staying here.

name: Red Sea - Blue Studio 28
description: Studio completely renovated in an old building of a popular neighborhood of Eilat.

reviews.author: Yevgeny
reviews.description: Clean and comfortable. Has a nice red sea view

reviews.author: Danny
reviews.description: Clean. Small but very comforteble app. Had everything we needed. We will come beck :)

reviews.author: Nir
reviews.description: We had a great stay at vivianes place. Viviane took care of everything we needed. The studio is more than enough for a stay in Eilat

reviews.author: Mika
reviews.description: great

reviews.author: Tehila
reviews.description: As described, cute apartment and communication with host was very good!

reviews.author: Ori
reviews.description: Very Nice appartment and viviane is very wellcoming...

reviews.author: מרדכי
reviews.description:
The apartment is very clean and cosy, well arranged and there is a nice view to the bay.
Viviane was nice and attentive and gave us a great time in Eilat

name: The Cozy Cabin
description: We rent out a fully furnished, non-smoking cabin, perfect for couples. You will have your own private room with a bathroom, mini kitchen, internet and tv.

reviews.author: Benzi
reviews.description: Lovely accommodation. 15 minutes walking distance to beaches and main attractions. Very friendly hosts. Great attention for detail. Quiet location with a great feel of Eilat.

reviews.author: Nimrod
reviews.description: Had pleasent time!

reviews.author: Alona
reviews.description:
הבקתה של בילי וז׳רום חמימה נקייה נעימה ומאובזרת בכל מה שצריך
בילי וז׳רום אנשים מקסימים שגורמים לך להרגיש בבית ובנופש בו זמנית
מומלץ בחום!!

reviews.author: Dror
reviews.description: our stay in the Cozy Cabin was perfect!  Billy and Jerome are perfect hosts! our  stay there was perfect! very cool cabin, beautiful arts by the hands of Jerome.  we got everything we need(snorkeling gear, games etc')! very recommended!

reviews.author: Marina
reviews.description: Nice and cousy place, 15 minutes walk from central from the tourist center and night life. Good waibes and plesent hoost:)

reviews.author: Oded
reviews.description: The place is small but cozy and equipped with necessary amenities.

reviews.author: Yoav
reviews.description: The host was very welcoming and everything was great, except the shower whichever was cold at first.

name: Beautiful studio in eilat /free WiFi
description: a stunning ground floor apartment 10 minutes walking from the beach . Located on center next to supermarket

reviews.author: Muly
reviews.description: Great host, was flexible with checkout time. Walkable distance to beach

reviews.author: Lior
reviews.description: It was great, thanks!

reviews.author: Ariella
reviews.description:
Orel was an amazing host. Helped us in anything we beeded and made sure we were comfortable.
The appartment Is basic, but with everything we needed, comfy and cozy, perfect for 2 people.
Thank you Orel!

reviews.author: Nato
reviews.description: Great place. Very comfortable for a travelling couple. Highly recomend :)

reviews.author: Konstantin
reviews.description: The place is located in a quiet residential area within a walking distance (10 min) from seashore, the mall, and the promenade. Plenty of parking space right next to the apartment. Very nice quite place, very nice host. It was exactly what I needed for a short vacation.

reviews.author: Itay
reviews.description:
Orel is a great guy, who gives a great effort to provide an excellent service.
The apartment is well equipped, clean and in a quiet area.
all and all, it was a wonderful experience, and i'll definitely return

reviews.author: Aviv
reviews.description:
בעל הדירה מקסים! דאג לכל הצרכים והיה זמין לכל דבר.
הדירה נהדרת, בדיוק מה שצריך לאילת. קרובה למרכז העיר ונעימה לשהייה.
תודה רבה (:

name: The couple paradise
description: The appartment is in the private house, in very quiete area, on the second flour, while the host lives on the ground and first flour of the house.

reviews.author: Erez
reviews.description:
Overall a cozy little apartment, matches the description - pretty basic but includes what you'd need for a short stay. 
Comfortable bed, effective A/C, clean sheets, towels, and a small kitchen.

The only two things to notice is that the ceiling is relatively low (sloped roof) so when not careful you might bang your had at it.

reviews.author: Yulia
reviews.description: We actually checked the reviews here and had no mistake: a clean and tidy place for one - two nights stay for divers. (Indeed the ceilings are low, so watch out). At the evening we enjoyed the walk to the center city. There are several grocery stores in the area. And it is quite. So a great stay and totally worth the price.

reviews.author: David
reviews.description:
Very nice private Little loft. Totally private. Kitchen, air conditioning, great shower..nice view. 

Got to Eilat around 9 p.m.. and Ilya was really nice about everything. Great host.. Truly appreciated.

reviews.author: Alon
reviews.description: Very responsive host and quite place.

reviews.author: Ben
reviews.description: The information was accurate an ilya was very responsive and nice.

reviews.author: Tom
reviews.description: We came for one night.  Ilya was very  welcoming,  nice and  very  wanting to  help.   Would  recommend it

reviews.author: Omri
reviews.description:
ilya was very nice and always available when needed
it is very much like was written in here, starts with the place itself and down to the time it get to walk to the beach.
over all i had a good time and would recomend ilya's place

name: Spacious, pretty en-suite, חדר יפיפה +מקלחת ומרפסת
description: A beautiful and charming cottage in the old quarter of Eilat. Double bed and single sofa bed available in spacious light room, with private balcony and bathroom. Free parking available. Shops and supermarket are a few minutes walk away, and a 5 min drive to the main street and mountains. 20 min walk to the first beach, shopping malls, bars, and nightclubs. The house has it's own natural cooling system, built for the desert and is eco-friendly. Simple but pretty, full of character and good vibes.

reviews.author: Noa
reviews.description: Evie's place was exactly as pictured in the description and pictures. Evie was lovely , and Shine is adorable. I'm sorry we didn't have more time to chat with her.  It was great to be in a space that was unique, with lots of character. And, as a book lover, I especially appreciated her full library in the room!

reviews.author: Dahlia
reviews.description: Evie was a lovely host. We came for short overnight visit with our 3.5 yr old son. We found everything we needed, the room is nicely furnished, private and spacious. Breakfast on the porch with great view of the mountains. Highly recommended!

reviews.author: Limor
reviews.description: That host was very nice, and tried to attend to our every need. But, the room was very cold and the hit was not enough (probably happens few times in a year in Eilat ). And there were some odors in the bathroom area. All and all, we got a great value for money

reviews.author: Aharon
reviews.description: the apartment is very nice and clean. Evie hosted me very warmly with lots of fun and good will to help and make me feel comfortable. worth every Shekel :-)

reviews.author: Daniel
reviews.description:
I had a nice time in Evie's house.
Its an old house with a lot of charm. The room is located on the top floor of her house. It has a nice balcony with a nice view and a bathroom next door. There is no AC but the cooling system works quite well. If you are  addicted to  air conditioners with freezing temperatures, it might be an issue but only in the hot seasons. The entrance is shared, but Evie left me with a pair of keys so we came and went at all hours of the day and night. 
Location is great, in a quiet neighborhood, 5 minutes by car to the center.
Evie is really sweet and helpful and was easy to get a hold of.

reviews.author: Benjamin
reviews.description:
Evie was very nice and helpful and she tried to help whenever we encountred with a peoblem. 
The room was clean and tidy. The porch was great. 
It would have been helpful if it was more clear that the third bad is a matress on the flour.

name: Eilat - Family apartment full equipped
description: Lovely Family apartment, ground floor, with 2 bedrooms, living room and large kitchen. Full equipped with all kitchen amenities including clean towels and bed sheets. Free Wi-Fi and Cable TV are included. Air condition in every room. Located 10 minutes walk from the center and the sea. Grocery store just 20 meters from the apartment.

reviews.author: Golan
reviews.description:
Sara was a great host!
We found the apartment very clean, tidy, equipped with everything a family needs, and even more!
Sara was always available for questions about everything concerning our stay, including accurate explanations about the location and about the organization of the apartment itself.

The apartment's location is in a residential area, which makes it a quiet neighborhood, with 2 grocery stores nearby, and about 30 minutes walk / 5 minutes drive to the city's main touristic area.

Golan

reviews.author: Amit
reviews.description: Sarah's apartment is very pleasant and comfortable, quiet and perfectly suitable for two couples or a large family, the kitchen is fully equipped and cozy. 50 meters from the apartment there is a super market, it  is a 3-minute drive to the center. Sarah is a very pleasant and available. We will certainly come again.

reviews.author: Jake
reviews.description: The place is an apartment with everything that a proper stay requires. TV, Internet, fully accessorized kitchen, ACs in every room, etc. Sara is a wonderful and caring host and she made sure nothing is missing.

reviews.author: Geety
reviews.description: Sara's place was in a convenient location, close to stores that are open 24 hours.    The place was very clean and the beds were comfortable.    We loved that the place was close to our pick-up location for our day-tour trip to Petra, Jordan.   Overall, we would consider staying again at Sara's place

reviews.author: Veronika
reviews.description: We were in the apartment 5 people. We are comfortably placed. In the apartments clean and tidy. We liked everything. Sarah is a hospitable hostess.

reviews.author: Yulia
reviews.description: We loved our stay in this apartment. It is spacious, there are lots of tableware and everything for cooking and for the comfortable stay. Sare is wonderful host and very attentive. We were in Eilat with the car and that is why location was not important for us.

reviews.author: Karin
reviews.description: The appartment was clean and had good beds,also airconditioning and a fully equiped kitchen. Its a quiet area. It's old and not very fancy, but ok for 2 couples or a family for a weekend.

name: Trullo aromatic green
description: An ancient trullo  surrounded by  panoramic contryside , away from the noise. Just relax, time taken lying on the hammock or a dip in our cristalline sea and  in the evening a great apulian  dinner in   nearby villages.    simple and authentic things

reviews.author: Ken
reviews.description: This is a beautiful Trulli house in spacious grounds, in a good location between the towns of Ostuni and Cisternino. The house is well appointed and a perfect location for two couples.

reviews.author: Margi And Doug
reviews.description:
Isa was welcoming and helpful, even leaving water, wine, bread, cheese and some fruit from her property.
Having access to a washer was extra great!

reviews.author: Gary
reviews.description:
This is a wonderful Trullo.
In beautiful surroundings. We couldn't have had a better weeks break. Isa is a fantastic host. Her info pack has plenty of information and  her recommendations are spot on. 
If peace and quiet is what you like but lovely places to visit within easy reach this is it. We'll be back.

reviews.author: John
reviews.description: Isa was a good and charming host and most obliging. The fridge was well stocked on arrival. A relaxing,quiet and very private home with views across the vast olive groves. GPS failed us so get detailed instructions for location.

reviews.author: Chafika
reviews.description:
Isa is a nice host. She made everything for a perfect stay! Her place is like a little paradise surrounded by nature, a beautiful garden. We were able to make a fire almost every night, was a great ambiance.

thank you Isa!

reviews.author: Sean
reviews.description: Isa was such a wonderful host - so helpful and welcoming.  This was the highlight of our trip to Italy!  The trullo is beautiful and ideally situated for exploring the region.  We really appreciated Isa's helpful advice and recommendations.  Thanks!

reviews.author: Jade
reviews.description: Isa was incredibly welcoming. She stocked the fridge with cheese, ham and olives along with a basket full of bread, wine, eggs etc. we had arrived late so this was such a welcome treat. The area is amazing with a local town Casalini only 5 mins away. The trullo was so peaceful, no one around, very charming with a lovely hammock and outdoor seating.

name: Unique architecture
description: This cave house, hanging on the cliffs of the caldera, is part of a traditional synthesis of houses owned by a family of architects.

reviews.author: Naomi
reviews.description:
We rented this house for 2 days. 2 adults and 2 kids.

The house is absolutely amazing. nothing we ever experienced before.
It looks exactly as the pictures and we couldn't imagine a better 'local-like'  housing experience.

The location of the house cannot be described in words -- on one hand you're smack in the middle of the busiest tourist location so you are minutes away from all the best restaurants, attractions and shops. on the other hand - you sit in the house (or better yet - on one of the three terraces...) and you feel like you're on a secluded island. just you and the beautiful Santorini views. 

It was like living in a postcard.

Laskarina has been a great host. Arranged for our pick up from and to the ferry and provided a very detailed list of recommendations for shops, attractions and restaurant. Each place we tried based on her list turned out to be a gem and highly ranked in other trusted sites.

Both Laskarina and the housekeeper were quick to respond to every assistance request / question we had even on a Sunday.

I can't think of experiencing Santorini any other way and recommend that you don't pass up the opportunity of staying in this house.

reviews.author: Jennifer
reviews.description: The home was in a great location and very well kept. They had cold water and fruit waiting for us. Laskarina was able to accommodate us a little early then except as we arrived earlier with little sleep from a prior flight. We thank her and her wonderful staff.

reviews.author: Yancy
reviews.description: This is the best place ever! It's located right in the middle of Oia amongst all the restaurants and shops. The view from the house is breathtaking. Laskarina was such a great host and helped us with transfer and tips around the island. The house is flawless. We really had a great time here. Do yourself a favour and stay here!

reviews.author: Dev
reviews.description: It was a perfect stay, great location, best views and proffessional service, book without hasitation.

reviews.author: Jo
reviews.description: Wow what a unique property everything it was supposed to be very handy to Main Street but quiet and secluded. The second bedroom doesn't have a door but very unique in design so wasn't a problem. Host left a bottle of wine and fruit basket and a very kind gentleman carried our luggage down the steps. Would definitely stay there again

reviews.author: Roma
reviews.description: Beautiful view, just spectacular! Clean home, high end amenities, unbelievable front patio space. No sunset views but we thoroughly enjoyed the scenes. Close to everything! The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because the downstairs bedroom was not very ventilated and less comfortable than the upstairs bedroom. Otherwise, no complaints, great space and near cave home!

reviews.author: Sarah
reviews.description: Laskarina's place is one of the most breathtaking places I've ever stayed. I definitely plan on coming back again! Everything was very easy, she even stored our luggage after checkout when we had a later flight out. Very helpful, and a very beautiful home!

name: Hector Cave house (Oia, Santorini)
description: Hector Cave House, carved into the unique caldera cliff for more than 250 years, was originally used as a wine cellar.Then It became a family owned house, which then opened its doors to share its unique character to travelers from around the world.

reviews.author: Sergio Marcelo
reviews.description:
The Hector Cave House was incredible. Although we were impressed by the pictures and the commentaries of the previous guests, the place was beyond our expectations. The cave house is in a great location, about 30 meters from the most popular view of the Santorini's famous sunset. The house itself has a spectacular view of the Caldera, like a picture. We spend woderful time at the terrace looking at this view. 
Inside the house there was everything we needed. The house was tastefully arranged. After the repairs, there is now a comfortable double bed and a nice toilet. 
We enjoyed the small details that made our stay more cosy, like a lot of candles or the discs with music selected by Ioannis. 
We felt in good hands from the moment we arrived to Oia and met Natasha waiting for us. She brought us to the house and immediately Iannis called to explain everything and help us accommodate. He was accessible when we needed help. 
We enjoyed our stay very much and hope we can come again.

reviews.author: Jessica
reviews.description: Worth every penny. Amazing views, gorgeous house and more than enough space for two guests--would even be very comfortable for 4 people. We loved staying in the old part of Oia right in the middle of the action. From the outdoor private hot tub to the superb amenities and gifts, we couldn't have asked for a better stay.

reviews.author: David
reviews.description: We have been renting places for vacation and business travel for several years all over the world and without question the Cave House has been the best in all respects. In fact not just the best but at least twice as good as anywhere else we have rented. Our experience was outstanding: the property, the location and above all the warm welcome and help we received from Dana, Dimitris and Giannis. I hesitate to provide specific details because I feel that if you're looking to stay in Oia you should just click to book and enjoy the experience first-hand. I will say that the view is one of the best anywhere, and that the first thing you will hear in the morning as you sit sipping your coffee on the terrace is the soft click of cameras as the first passing tourists of the day take pictures on the path below. However, they are not taking pictures of the view, but of the steps up to house you are staying in because they look so amazing! Our only regret is that we did not plan to spend longer here. This is an exceptional property and we hope to be lucky enough to return one day.

reviews.author: Gigi
reviews.description: This santorini cave house is absolutely stunning. The house was very clean and decorated nicely. The outdoor patio and cave jacuzzi was an amazing spot to watch the sun go down. You will never want to leave this Airbnb! Giannis was a wonderful host. He was so communicative and gave great recommendations for the island. He and his colleagues went above and beyond and it really shows. A wonderful experience, I wish I could give 10 stars!

reviews.author: Charlotte
reviews.description: Excellent host, helpers, house and also the view! We do enjoy the stay so much, highly recommend all of you to enjoy this paradise.

reviews.author: Ms
reviews.description: Everything here was perfect! near to the sunset view point (Oia old castle) , and you can go to Amoundi Bay by foot. Stunning sunset breathtaking view ! House was big. I'm just enjoyed my stay here. Highly recommend to all of you.

reviews.author: David
reviews.description: Believe all the other reviews. The cave house is a work of art in a fantastic location and Giannis and his team could not have been more helpful. What a great experience.

name: House in countryside (20 min. sea )
description: un luogo ameno

reviews.author: Paula
reviews.description:
Antonio's house is within easy driving distance ( off of a main road) from some of the most amazing sights in Central Sicily. What makes Antonio's house so special is the private setting with an abundance of fruit trees ( oranges, apricots, cherries, plums), frangrant flowers, fresh vegetables and herbs. Many of these ingredients find their way into his fabulous Sicilian cooking . The 35 Euro we paid for these 7 course dinners was well worth it. Breakfast was also a delight with fresh squeezed juices, local pastries/bread and Antonio's homemade jams.
There are two bedrooms, one with a private bathroom and one which has a shared bathroom with the owner.
Antonio and Sammi were delightful, friendly and  fun. Antonio was very helpful with tips about places to visit and safe driving routes. We truly enjoyed our marvelous Sicilian holiday!

reviews.author: Wouter
reviews.description:
Very nice guy, helpful, both speak English. Room is big enough. 

It's a bit remote if you fancy going out for food or to visit Agrigento hkh need a car.

reviews.author: Caspar
reviews.description:
At the moment I met Antonio, I thought of a great soul and heartful character from a novel. A great chef, a doctor (our children had just been sick so he helped us a lot). The garden was amazing and like an adventure for our 3 year old girl.

A great stay and I would love to try it as a winter retreat as well reading books by the cozy fireplace.

Thank you so much!

reviews.author: Yvette
reviews.description:
This is a special place to stay... an experience of the essence of Sicily.
Antonio is a natural host who made us feel very welcome in his lovely home.
DO have dinner with him!
We loved it.

reviews.author: Will
reviews.description: Staying with Antonio was a delight. He is such an enthusiastic person and his hospitality is enveloping. He is a great cook and so proud of the Sicilian produce, which mainly comes from his own garden. We were lucky enough to share meals with two other couples where we shared information about our respective countries and stories of our travels. It was such a relaxing and enjoyable place to stay. Thanks also to Samir who welcomed us at the beginning and looked after us in many ways, including guiding us to the local shops to find supplies.

reviews.author: Antoine
reviews.description: Antonio is a great host, very friendly. Always available to provide good tips. We felt at home imediatly. He prepared us an amazing dinner without notice as we arrived late and our kids were too tired to go to a restaurant. Only comment is that you will need a car, as there is not much around at walking distance. Nice place for a few days of rest, the climate there is fresh compared to the seaside

reviews.author: Erik
reviews.description: Staying at Antonio's house was a terrific experience. The house is beautiful and the garden even more so. Antonio and his co-host Sammi are model hosts: friendly, punctual, knowledgeable of the area, and easy to talk to. The breakfasts with homemade jams, fresh bread and fresh fruit from the garden were a delight. We also spent a day in Palermo with Antonio and Sammi as our guides which was fantastic. I  wholeheartedly recommend staying at Antonio's house!

name: Waterfront with extraordinary view
description: ***** Featured on HUFFINGTON POST and PureWow article: 'Amazing Places You Can Stay Around The World For Less Than $50 A Night' *****

reviews.author: Ellen
reviews.description: This place is even more beautiful than in the pictures. We had a great stay with our two year old. The studio is small but very cosy, the terrace and surroundings amazing. Nela was helpful with all we needed. Don't hesitate to book!

reviews.author: Rosa
reviews.description: I really loved Nela's place! We enjoyed the balcony as it has a great view. The communication with Nela was great and the apartment was very clean. It had everything we needed. Perast is beautiful but very small. Would definitely recommend to rent a car and visit Kotor and Budva. Everything is close and less than 1 hour drive. Nice beaches to go in Budva are: Jaz Beach, Sveti Nikola (island reachable by watertaxi) and I loved Bečići beach (beautiful clear water).

reviews.author: Jill
reviews.description:
Lovely apartment with all you could wish for.We were made welcome by the boatman who ferry people out to the island right opposite the (URL HIDDEN) to feast your eyes on,the view and people watching from the privacy of your own balcony with table chairs and sun loungers.
We swam just off the jetty over the quiet road in front of the apartment.
We had a lovely visit to kotor by bus and thoroghly enjoyed our time in the bay of kotor,
Many thanks Nela.

reviews.author: Chantal
reviews.description: Great location, in a lovely town. Would highly recommend staying here. Nela was quick to respond to any questions and the house was exactly like the pictures and description.

reviews.author: Daniel
reviews.description: My favorite airbnb experience yet. The view from the balcony is incredible and Perast is such a beautiful place. Thanks so much for letting us stay in such a wonderful apartment.

reviews.author: Jennesa
reviews.description:
Perast is a lovely little town set on the Bay of Kotor. The apartment is cozy and convenient for exploring the area. 

Nela decorated the apartment with family artifacts and the stone patio is nop notch. For those who plan to cook in, be prepared to be resourceful. The bathroom is down a narrow spiral case stairway. 

Sit on the patio and watch the hustle and bustle of tourists, boats and cars from 8 am - 5 pm. Quite busy during the day and quiet during the mornings and evenings. Enjoy the view of the islands and the entire scenery of the bay. Lots of places to eat, Dardin was our favorite. If you're lucky, you'll hear live music floating across the water.

reviews.author: Dominika
reviews.description:
Nela's apartment is a great place to stay. Breathtaking view and location, the balcon where you can eat, rest and tan in a beatiful scenery around you. 
Perast in one of the most beautifil places in Kotors Bay. Really. 
And in the neighbourhood you have one of the best restaurants in whole Montenegro - CONTE ( Perast) and Galion ( Kotor). 
Contact with Nela was great, there was no problem with check-in and check-out. 
I really recommend this place to all of you!

name: 80 m² full of charm, flair & light
description: For your booking you get a beautiful large and bright apartment of 80 square metres. It only seems to be not very central, because with the bus coach M41 (bus stop only 2 minutes from the flat) you have a perfect way to get everywhere in the city.

reviews.author: Nurith
reviews.description:
Bernhard flat is just awsome. It is equipped with the highest quality items and you will have everything you need. There's a full kitchen with coffee machines of all kinds, several kinds of shampoos and soaps, lots of towels, great furnitures and even little chocolates all arount the place. The view is beautiful, everything is very clean and tidy and the neighborhood is quiet.
Even though the flat is not in the main center of the city the public transportation is very comfortable and close and there is no problem to move around.
We really reommend staying at Bernhard place, he is very nice and will take care of everything you will need!

reviews.author: Heather
reviews.description: Bernhard was extremely helpful and went above and beyond with meeting us at the apartment much later than planned due to delayed flights. It was a wonderful apartment on a quiet street, close to the city center and very easy access to the bus and S-Bahn. It's also just a short walk to the Estrel. We had a great time in Berlin and look forward to returning in the future.

reviews.author: Colin
reviews.description:
Bernhard was a fantastic host and communicator. He provided us with everything we needed to enjoy our stay.  The flat was great, but with 10 month baby the lounge quickly became out of bounds as there was too many nice things for her to play with and possibly break. We have named a German teddy in honour of Bernhard.

Location was perfect, close to s-bahn and walking distance to some great locations such as the Klunkerkranich bar in Neukölln.

reviews.author: Stephanie
reviews.description: Loved living like a local at Bernhards. Transport is easy from here to all the places we wanted to visit. The living room is a beautiful place to relax. Nice to be able to eat breakfast in.  Thanks for the great coffee.

reviews.author: Jean
reviews.description: Bernhard's place was fantastic. Perfectly clean, very comfortable with a great atmosphere. We managed to find our way from TXL airport easily with his perfect instructions . Getting around Berlin from his house also was simple. We would highly recommend staying here. Bernhard is an instantly likeable man. He was easy to contact and went out of his way to make our stay excellent.

reviews.author: Mark
reviews.description: the flat is gorgeous, and bernhard could not have been more gracious, hospitable, and helpful. his directions were impeccable and he sent us to both a great restaurant and one of the hippest jazz clubs we've ever attended. we cannot recommend this flat and host too highly - don't stay anywhere else in berlin!

reviews.author: Vicky
reviews.description: Bernhards place is a gorgeous, light filled huge and spotlessly clean apartment. It was a welcome refuge at the end of a long day. Bernhard is a kind and warm host who helped us in so many ways. Whilst the location is not in the centre of Berlin it was very easy to access by bus, overground train and subway. Great vegan restaurants also! Do not be put off by the dreary exterior or dark entrance, the flat looks exactly as shown in the photos. A great value for money stay. Highly recommend.

name: Miamo - Amazing view in Imerovigli
description: Mi Amo – Stylish suite at the edge of the caldera with amazing view

reviews.author: Beng Kok
reviews.description: The view from the Airbnb is excellent. Could view the whole of the Caldera. A nice walk to Fira. Excellent place to stay. Will defintely stay again if were to come back to Santorini.

reviews.author: Simion
reviews.description: We enjoyed Stefanos's place very much. The place was clean and comfortable  Stefanos staff were very helpful and provided everything we nedded. Overall another great experience with Airbnb. The best way to see Europe.

reviews.author: Sue
reviews.description:
Stefano' s place is a brilliant location for a quieter stay in Santorini. It is perfect for 2 people and the views are stunning. It is well equipped with high standard of cleanliness Imerovigli has some lovely restaurants and it is convenient to walk into Firostefani or Fira with buses nearby to travel further afield. The staff are very friendly and helpful provided smooth transfers , take care of our luggage give us and helpful suggestions about places to visit etc
Highly recommend to friends who are quite fit and able to manage the seps down .

reviews.author: Yoojung
reviews.description: We enjoyed our stay at Stefano's.  The staff was very helpful and responsive to inquiry, arranged for an easy pick up   At the port and check out with someone helping with our luggage slip and down the winding stairs of imerovigli!  Spacious and gorgeous view.  Great for a couple on a romantic getaway!

reviews.author: Eugenia
reviews.description: This is a lovely apartment. The location is fantastic and the views are amazing. Thank you Yannis for being welcoming and providing a lot of information, Zachos for carrying our bags up and down those stairs and Rosa for cleaning the apartment. A wonderful team! We would definitely stay here again and recommend it to our friends.

reviews.author: Caroline
reviews.description:
Thank you for a wonderful stay at Miamo, Santorini! We had one of the best terraces in Imerovigli, the location was stunning and the apartment was just as the photos showed. 

Everything was fantastic from the ease of initial communication with Stefanos while making our booking to the fantastic welcome we reviewed by Yannis and Zachos  - who kindly carried my bag to the apartment! 

Stefanos and Yannis provided very detailed information on how to get to Imerovigli from the airport, giving us different options depending on budget. We chose to take the airport transfer arranged by Yannis and it was very smooth. Yannis provided a fantastic welcome and showed us around the apartment and gave us tips on places to go around the island. There was even a lovely bottle of wine waiting for us which we greatly appreciated! 

The apartment is simple and comfortable. We felt very at home there. In our opinion, although Fira and Oia are bigger and there is much more going on, Imerovigli is the loveliest of the three towns on that side of the island. It was quiet and tranquil but within very easy reach of Fira - just a 20 walk along a lovely path the a short bus ride to Oia. There is no need to go to Oia for sunset - Blue Note restaurant in Imerovigli is perfect to view it! 

Imerovigli is a very friendly place, be sure to visit Avocado for fantastic food and the best service we experienced and the bar at the Altana boutique hotel for the best drinks ever! 

Check out was just as smooth as arrival and we were sad to leave. 

Thank you to Stefanos, Yannis and Zachos for everything, it was wonderful and we hope we can visit again sometime! 

Best wishes

Caroline & Neil Mathers

reviews.author: Kylie
reviews.description: Incredible view, incredible service and incredible island! I cannot fault Stefano's place and would highly recommend if you are looking at staying in Santorini. We spent a lot of our time actually at the apartment as the view was second to none! Amazing stay and very reasonably priced! We will be back :)

name: In the historical center of Lecce
description: Detached house situated in a quiet area of the historical center: a few steps from the church of Santa Croce, the best example of Lecce Baroque, and a 5 min walk from Piazza S.Oronzo, the heart of the city.

reviews.author: Chen
reviews.description: The stay at Marco's place was just fain. He was very lovely host , explain as everything about the city and help us with all we needed. The flat was just like the photos , cozy and warm. That was the best choice for our trip.

reviews.author: Kate
reviews.description: Beautiful apartment located on a quiet street, a short walk from Lecce old town. We loved it!

reviews.author: Pamela
reviews.description:
Gianluca and Ivana's apartment provides a stunning, extremely  stylish retreat in the beautiful town of Lecce. It is in a perfect location on the edge of this historical town with many delightful cafes, restaurants, shops and stalls just a few minutes walk 

There is parking available directly outside the apartment which is useful for unloading luggage etc and Gianluca, having greeted us on arrival showed us the very cheap parking in nearby streets. 

The kitchen has a good size fridge and is well equipped. 
The shower is very efficient with warm water constantly on
tap. 

Many thanks for an extremely comfortable stay Gianluca and Ivana. We hope to return one day and will definitely recommend your apartment to
friends and family.

reviews.author: Cassandra
reviews.description: Our stay at Gianluca's was perfect. This airbnb had been on my wishList for a long time, and on top of the place being beautiful, Gianluca was a very kind and generous host. Despite us arriving early that he probably had planned for, he picked us up from the train, took us for coffee, and gave us an overview of the city. The house is everything it looks like in the photos and during summer the outdoor shower is a real treat! We'd love to come back any time we're back in Lecce.

reviews.author: Edward
reviews.description: Beautiful place to stay in a gorgeous city with a very helpful host

reviews.author: Edward
reviews.description: We had a really lovely time staying in Gianluca's house, which is well-located, cosy and incredibly stylish. The city of Lecce is well worth visiting if you are travelling around the region, and Gianluca's house offers the perfect base. On top of that, he was extremely welcoming, providing us with tips for where to eat and what to see, and even sorting out parking for us. We would thoroughly recommend!

reviews.author: Michael
reviews.description: Gianluca's apartment is everything we hoped for and more. It's location is perfect just in the old town so you can walk everywhere. The apartment is amazing everything that you need and feels like home. Gianluca is an absolute legend, he met us at the bus station and took us to the apartment and showed us everything and gave us advice about Lecce. He then went above and beyond when I realised I had left my camera bag on the bus and tracked it down for me, picked it up and returned it back to the apartment. He also drove us back to the airport when we left as the buses were either to early or to late. A beautiful apartment  in a beautiful place.

name: SUNSET CAVE HOUSE IN OIA
description: A traditional Cave house, right on the cliff,located on the Caldera in OIA village,carefully & tastefully restored offering a unique experience of Greek summer style accommodation!

reviews.author: Kaie
reviews.description: An amazing place to live out your dream vacation in Oia. This is my second time here, and forgetting the paint smell that was a bit of an downer the first few nights, I'm looking forward to coming back again if it works out. When I remember my vacation from Greece, this place is where my memories drift back to. It is simple but pure bliss and beauty. I hope to visit again soon. Also, the woman who cleans is very nice and does great work cleaning everything. This place is a dream come true.

reviews.author: Kaie
reviews.description: This place is utter Paradise. I can't really say much else than how perfect this place was and that I will remember my vacation time there for a very long time. The only thing that wasn't working so well as the wifi, but not sure if that was a problem somehow with my phone or not. Mostly the wifi worked okay on my laptop. The porter helped with my bags, which really was good and meant I didn't get lost trying to find the place. The woman who made breakfest was so kind and sweet. She really was nice and I enjoyed the simple breakfest. But mostly: the view! The fact that all this space is yours alone. You look above you and see so many people crowding and you have 2 balcony spaces to yourself, a pool, and the best view on the island. This place really is Paradise. The design inside in chic and clean, very nice arranged details. Everything needed and a fruit basket as well. I really hope to stay here again one day, as this place calmed me in a way I haven't been in a long time. Cheers for Panos and all the help from the others.

reviews.author: James
reviews.description:
We definitely recommend staying here if you're looking at places in Santorini. The location is fantastic and the place is beautiful. 

Panos really goes above and beyond as a host to arrange for travel, tours, porters, etc. Great stay!

reviews.author: Robert
reviews.description: This spot is amazing when it comes to basically everything. The sunset view is what you're booking it for, as you have a couple private balconies from which to watch the sunset, instead of lining up with everyone else in Oia to get a good view. Amazing. Panos is also an amazing host, doing whatever he can to ensure you have a great time and make any arrangements you might need. The suite itself is so cute and clean, also!

reviews.author: Lindsey
reviews.description: This is a perfect location. Don't have to travel anywhere for the sunset and it's high enough that cats don't roam up to it (only had 1 on our last night). Panos is very helpful before and during your stay. Would love to come back!

reviews.author: Katie
reviews.description:
Panos home was absolutely incredible. I sell luxury travel for a living, and decided to book an Airbnb instead of one of the 5 star hotels in the area. I am so happy that we did! It was the best location for the sunset every night, easily walkable to lots of great little restaurants and shops, and the home was exquisite. I would highly suggest booking the transfer to and from the airport as well as the Porter with Panos, as getting up and down the stairs luggage would have been really tricky.

The Jacuzzi was lovely, and breakfast every morning was a wonderful treat!

reviews.author: James
reviews.description:
This place was amazing, would definitely recommend it and would stay there again if I was visiting Oia again. Amazing views of the sunset from the apartment, and very clean.  Panos is great.  He made everything very easy and relaxing from arranging transfer to/from the airport and a porter to help with the luggage.  

Would highly recommend  this place.

name: La casa tra li ulivi
description: A cottage made up of stone and timber built on two storeys, with a large living room, glass window, a couch for two people and a bathroom with sauna; on the second storey there is a double bedroom.  Outdoors, there is a large garden with a porch equipped with BBQ and a wooden table. The site is located on the pleasant  hills between Bellegra and Olevano Romano. We have currently added two beds, set up in a wonderful  Indian teepe  available for two extra guests in addition to the four ones.

reviews.author: Yoav
reviews.description:
Stop whatever you are doing now and book a vacation at Pietro's!! 
Now seriously, we can't express our surprise and the experience of spending a few days in this amazing house. Pietro is a generous exceptional person, showed us the way to the house spent time with us and basically let us feel at home away from home, sharing his home grown vegetables, tips around the neighbourhood and places worth visit... The house is no different, it was designed as a team house, very warm and welcoming with everything you could think of. utterly fantastic in every sense of the word. I guess one thing I am not sure people wrote before in older reviews is the fact that this fairytale of a place is just an hour from Rome, which makes it even more accessible and easier to visit. I would love to visit again, hopefully soon

reviews.author: Vlasta
reviews.description: Pietro’s casa is very beautiful, unique and relaxed place, with amazing view; much nicer than in the pictures. We daily discovered new nice details/places inside and outside. Pietro was very welcoming and generous, makes you feel at home, cares for all needed and even more. We enjoyed very much. I fully recommend this place.

reviews.author: Neria
reviews.description:
We arrived Pietro to his great house in the woods in the mountains,
Pietro amazing host, a pleasant and very nice
Cares for us all needs and more
Stunning area to walk around, eat and get to know local farmers.
There is a supermarket close by, there are hiking trails to spend.
It is highly recommended place to stay at!
Thank you very much!

Neria and Anna

reviews.author: Monique
reviews.description: What a beautiful place. Can not recommended it more highly enough. The view is so gorgeous and the house has so much character. And Pietro was a great host.

reviews.author: Maria And Carl (C&M Bunkhouse)
reviews.description:
Pietro was amazing. Friendly, lively, helpful, warm and sweet. We enjoyed his place so much and we're sad to only be able to stay one night. It is unique and beautiful. We made dinner from his garden, played with his cute animals and sat on the deck for breakfast.  

What a treasure and a must see!  You can not go wrong.

reviews.author: Katja
reviews.description: Pietro, is perfect and this place is a Paradise on Earth!! Hope to stay there again.

reviews.author: Tony
reviews.description: Pietro has built the most beautiful cottage overlooking olive groves. You feel like you have stepped into a storybook, my family and I were speechless trying to take in all the custom woodworking and tile work. I feel like I was able to leave the world behind and truly relax . Pietro was so kind he greeted us with a big smile and welcomed us on to his veranda for champagne and sweets. Then so we did not have to go back to town he cut fresh veggies out of his garden so we could enjoy a delicious salad . This is the most amazing place I have ever booked . If you book this place you will definitely make memories that will last a lifetime. Thank you Pietro from the bottom of my heart.

name: TREEhouse/casaBARTHEL
description: casaBARTHEL is a perfect place for a vacation and an artist residency, immersed in the Tuscan landscape only 15' from the Duomo and 30' from Siena. Come and live with us; enjoy our olive trees, the kitchen garden and our family life style away from the working rhythm. By providing wifi only in the communal courtyard we suggest our guests to utilize internet only when is really needed. Taking a break from been connected with elsewhere and enjoy the 'here and now' could be our best present to you!

reviews.author: Loredana
reviews.description: This place is exactly how you would dream of a prefect Tuscan summer. It's close to Florence but far enough to switch of from a busy daily routine and soak up the beautiful countryside of Tuscany. The whole area is very well kept with many details that make you fall in love over and over again with the property of Villa Barthel. We enjoyed as well the pool and tennis court. Everything is well organized an Teresa was very kind and helpful at the reception. The treehouse just beats it all up! It's so so so nice and in the evening even more I would say. I woke up in the middle of the night and could not believe how lucky I was for this experience. It's pricy but absolutely worth the experience. I will go back for sure one day soon!

reviews.author: Gennaro
reviews.description: Exactly as described. Beautiful quiet with all amenities! Hosts are VERY helpful and friendly and provide the ultimate retreat! If your looking for a unique experience with a great locastion and fantastic host this is it! Thanks again!!

reviews.author: Molly
reviews.description:
Had an amazing couple of nights at casaBarthel, the treehouse is a real novelty and was so quiet and relaxing. Everyone was very welcoming and friendly but allowed for privacy and space to relax. 
The property is beautiful and the pool is lovely.
Daniella made us a traditional Italian dinner on one of our evenings and it was a real highlight of our whole holiday, would highly recommend.

reviews.author: Natalia
reviews.description:
Great, very  great!
We spent there only one day of our honeymoon, but it was perfect! Definitely we will return! 
Это волшебное место! Очень уютно, красиво, необычно. Хорошая кухня, удобная кровать, есть фен, отличный вид с постели на рассвете. Есть своя парковка, бесплатная, машину можно временно подогнать к домик чтобы выгрузиться. Также можно купаться в бассейне, наутро приносят 4 больших круассана. Вся территория как маленький красивый парк. Нам повезло - на день выезда там должна была быть свадьба, мы увидели эти украшения, подсветку деревьев, это просто магия!
Всем буду рекомендовать и сами туда ещё вернёмся!

reviews.author: Renier
reviews.description: Beautiful tree house with beautiful surroundings. Very pleasant host. Neat and clean. Spectacular Panoramic view.

reviews.author: Lucy
reviews.description: Absolutely amazing. Must stay. The location is stunning and the home very comfortable. It has everything you need with a few luxury details including AMAZING fresh pastries delivered in the morning. It was fantastic waking up in nature with stunning sunrise and sunset. Beautiful pool and outdoor shower overlooking Florence's duomo.

reviews.author: Alexandra
reviews.description:
It was wonderful, especially waking up in the morning in the middle of the trees. So calm and beautiful. Dinner at Osteria de Milione was also delicious. Still i find the price a bit high and wouldn't have rented another night. 1 night was perfect for us.
Grazie Elena!

name: Live in an historic English Castle!
description: Choose from 15 grand rooms to call home with delicious breakfast in our fabulous relaxed castle in glorious Northern England which is our family home.  Turrets, tudor panelling, gothic windows, it's all here. Evening meals available separately.

reviews.author: Tatyana
reviews.description: Simon and Wendy's place is simply amazing. From the moment you walk in it feels like taking a step back in time to enjoy fine country living, a warm welcome and treatment as an honored guest in their beautiful castle. Very much looking forward to being back!

reviews.author: Nick
reviews.description: Susan was a great host and the boat was beautiful inside and out. Great attention to detail and very accommodating too. A short but perfect stay, thankyou!

reviews.author: Lou
reviews.description: Amazing. We will come back for sure!!

reviews.author: Mariana
reviews.description:
wow, this place exceeds all expectations!!! we stayed only one night, and how we wish we could have stayed longer! We arrived just in time for dinner, which was just fantastic! it was a 3 course meal, which was served at the big table in the dinning room. The place has an honesty bar where you help yourself to any of the great selection of drinks and pay for it at the end of the stay, which is a brilliant idea. 
We stayed in Greystock room and it was huge and beautiful. The big fluffy towel and the bath robes were a really nice touch. Breakfast again was simply delicious and you have a great variety of options you can choose from. The castle is just like a museum with the exception that you can walk anywhere you want and they also have a great library with a lot of old books. Simon and Wendy did a great job decorating this place, really good taste and really makes you feel like royalty. Also fantastic staff! I hope I didn't miss anything. would love to come back.

reviews.author: Alice
reviews.description: Simon & Wendy's home is a fantastic getaway. It was affordable, easy to find and more incredible than we imagined. The castle is quite small which makes it feel cozy and magestic at the same time. The dinners with everyone also encouraged guests to be friendly which I thought was wonderful. It's a fantastic place and I will certainly be coming again.

reviews.author: Anne
reviews.description: The host canceled this reservation 173 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

reviews.author: Simon
reviews.description: Had an absolutely fantastic 2 nights at augill Castle, a truly memorable break away from the rush that is life. Felt at ease and relaxed from the moment we arrived making full use of the bar and relaxing by the fire. Already planning a return for the summer. Thanks to Simon and Wendy and all the staff :)

name: CHARMING, VERY SPACIOUS & BEST LOCATED
description: Very spacious apartment located in a modernist luxury building. Only a 10m walk to Plaza Catalunya and main sights. Fully equipped. 3 double bedrooms + 2 complete bathrooms + Giant living room & kitchen. Luxury details in a unique Barcelona style decoration.

reviews.author: Moshe
reviews.description:
Mar's place is amazing. The flat is beautiful and the location is amazing, from one hand you can feel like you are local and on the other you are very close to everything Barcelona has to offer. 

The place was super clean, Mar recommendations were amazing. 

I highly recommend staying in Mar's flat.

reviews.author: Jony
reviews.description:
We had a fabulous Holliday at Mar's.
It's our second time because it's the best Flat we've stayed in and we travel quite extensively. It's every bit as beautiful as in the pics and then some. She is a terrific host and I'm sure we'll be back:-)

reviews.author: Inbar
reviews.description:
This apartment's design is so beautiful, filled with charming little details.
The space is very clean, cosy, has everything you might need and is very well located. 
The wifi only worked in the living room but I'm sure Mar would have fixed it if we would have asked. Thank you for your kindness, great taste and professionalism, Mar!

reviews.author: Ronen
reviews.description: Great flat in central location ,bright, clean, modern and very comfortable . Highly recommended . Owner very helpful.

reviews.author: Dianne
reviews.description:
We had a great time at Mar's apartment. Mar made special arrangments for us - 2 couples with 2 babies, and made our stay in Barcelona just perfect! She was also very considering with our check-out time due to the bad weather in the last day...
Apartment like this makes you never go back to hotels..
Thanks Mar!

reviews.author: Ifat
reviews.description:
