This is the case where reality bits pictures. Beautiful stylish clean and yet fit for a family .
We did not want to leave the apartment.

reviews.author: Sid
reviews.description: This is a terrific apartment and Mar is a great host. Let's start with the apartment. It is beautifully decorated with ample space. There are three very nice sized bedrooms with additional space in the living room if needed. The kitchen is fully stocked and the espresso machine was a great addition. Bathrooms are very big and nicely done. Cleanliness is excellent. Next up is the location. Very convenient to most major attractions and has the ideal combination of quiet and liveliness. There are many restaurants right in the neighborhood that we dined at. Lastly, Mar was very helpful and we enjoyed talking to her. Highly recommended.

name: Lussuoso. Vista incantevole.
description: Appartamento a picco sul lago nuovo e lussuoso in residence con piscina aperta nel periodo estivo dal 15 giugno al 15 settembre, campo da tennis, campo bocce e parco (utilizzo incluso nel prezzo) . Vista straordinaria. Posto auto di proprietà.  150 metri dal centro del borgo medioevale di  Riva di Solto. Trilocale + bagno + 2 terrazzi. Internet wi - fi: € 1,50 al giorno (Internet wi- fi: € 1,50 for day.

reviews.author: Eitan
reviews.description:
We felt very welcome in this beautiful appartment. Carla are great hostess, thinking along with suggestions for next trips. We felt very at home in their place. 
Beutiful,newly renovated and affordable apartment , in prime location. Clean towels and sheets are provided . Sun terrace in the open air where you can seat and eat outside the apt. It is very quiet and beautiful place. Definitely a place we highly recommend!

reviews.author: Steven
reviews.description:
Lovely setting, quite central with good access to restaurants and Ferry.

Nice home, gorgeous view.  Everything was clean and in good order.

Carla is a fantastic host, very quick to respond, and offered great advice on local attractions.

We will be back!

reviews.author: Allyson
reviews.description:
The views at Carla's place are absolutely stunning!  The pictures don't even do it justice! We loved staying there and sitting out on the balcony every morning and evening.  The town was quaint and perfect for strolling around and enjoying the scenery.  Be sure to take a ferry ride over to the island of Montisola also!

 For those of you visiting in the summer, please know that it gets hot there and there is no air conditioner. The fans helped as did the fantastic swimming pool, but it was still 31c in the apartment in the evenings.  However, overall, we would definitely stay there again, just maybe in the spring or fall when the weather was cooler.

reviews.author: Bryan
reviews.description: Amazing view, clean home, quiet and charming! I would recommend this to anyone looking for a quiet place to relax.

reviews.author: Sue
reviews.description: The apartment has fabulous views as depicted in the photos. For us it was very quiet as nobody else was around and we were just out of season. This was ideal for us. Carla provided a welcome breakfast pack which we thought was a nice touch. The lake and towns around it were lovely and we were pleased to choose Riva di Solto rather than the far busier Riva del Garda. A lovely holiday!

reviews.author: Bertie
reviews.description:
What a wonderful trip we had at Carla's place. Carla met us on check-in and showed us around. The view is STUNNING, even when the rain (warm rain) came down for one morning [don't worry lovely sunshine followed for the rest of the day].  

The place looks out upon a stunning mountain and lake, and is very private. The pool, tennis court and french boules area is lovely, and it's a very short walk into a small town with everything you need.

Our suggestion is to get dinner 250m up the hill at a lovely Italian restaurant, we had spaghetti and then pizza's to go... we were very full, but very satisfied.

reviews.author: Erin
reviews.description: Gorgeous view! Very relaxing

name: Charming gardenroom with woodstove
description: A sturdy cabin with lots of natural light, right in a flowerful garden. It will feel like living outdoors, while inside the cabin there is a lingering aroma of larix wood  and  crackling of the woodstove.

reviews.author: Alex
reviews.description: Bea  and Frans garden room is so tranquil and relaxing. We loved Ermelo and enjoyed cycling in the woods. Such a beautiful place and we plan to come again.

reviews.author: Alberta
reviews.description: Wonderful little hideaway! I highly recommend it and felt so welcomed by Be a and Frans. I arrived much later as I had to work unexpectedly and they were so understanding. I also had to leave a day early due to an emergency and they unnecessarily but ever so kindly refunded the rest of my stay in cash. All I can say is I‘ll be back!

reviews.author: Cindy
reviews.description: It is a wonderful journey. Bea and Frans are very nice and kind people. The garden room is just like the photo showed. It is very cozy and beautiful. We can see the star from the room. My husband and I really like it.

reviews.author: Stephan Und Johanna
reviews.description: We are very happy about the time that we were able to spend in Bea's and Frans' little cosy cabin. For us it has been the most attractive stay in the Netherlands. We had hoped to find some relaxation and actually found a piece of paradise. You have a wonderful garden full of flowers and a little brook burbling along the cabin - the perfect romantic idyll for a couple in love. We always felt safe and sound and unobserved in spite of the big windows. On the contrary - we enjoyed the beautiful sun and moon-view and the spectecular garden surrounding the cabin. The oven gave us a feeling of cosiness on highest level. You as hosts were very friendly, discrete and well organised. Thank you very much for opening your special garden house for us. And thank you as well for offering us your bikes. So we could discover the region around Ermelo - such as the Heideland and its honey scent.

reviews.author: Emma
reviews.description: We stayed in their garden room for two days and we loved it! It's very cozy and pretty in the inside as well as the outside. Bea and Frans provided us with everything that we needed. If it wasn't for the morning light that comes in, I could totally live there! I would recommend this accommodation to anyone who's looking for a relaxing and comfortable stay.

reviews.author: Uli
reviews.description: Our stay at the charming garden room was a very pleasant experience. Bea and Frans gave us a warm welcome and surprised us with a beautiful bunch of flowers out of their own garden. The room is very cosy with a lot of sweet and surprising details. Everything was as descripted in the profile and very comfortable. The atmosphere of the garden was beautiful. Our hosts were also very helpful with information about the area. We really enjoyed our stay.

reviews.author: Christalee
reviews.description: Bea & Frans were away when we stayed so their daughter was there and was the perfect host! Amazing meals and awesome laid back atmosphere. The cabin itself was so lovely and cozy - the wood stove inside was the cherry on top. Would 100% recommend staying here and would love to come back! Thanks so much!

name: the house on the lake
description: Room with private bathroom in an old country house, located on a sunny slope overlooking the Idro lake (on the border between Lombardia and Trentino-Alto Adige regions). The house is renewed, finished with pine wood, and with ceramic wood stoves. The room and the bathroom are located in an independent part of the house accessible through a small hallway. There is a spacious kitchen for our guests to use (shared with us). We also have a nice veranda and a very suggestive living room finished with antique wood and sculptures.

reviews.author: David
reviews.description:
We had a pleasant stay of the first night in our 2 weeks in the dolomites mountains. Your hospitality was very kind. Thanks for serving us at night with a cup of tea and a cake, and the cherry from your garden. The breakfast was fantastic especially with the view to the lake from your home.
Best regards,
David and Mali from ISRAEL

reviews.author: Edgar
reviews.description:
Irene and Carlo are the best hosts, kind people (each evening they politly asked if we eat, even they dont have to)
The staying in the house on the lake was definitly the gem of our trip in north Italy, the whole house is heated using wood burning, its amazing, the whole house is made of wood, like a masterpiece,
Also the breakfast is super, juice, home brewed coffee, home made salami , cheeses, home made pastery and bread, best breakfast in Italy!
The bed and room was great, we had our flight from Malpensa and we decided to stay another night there since it felt like a real home, 
Also very pleasent people, we enjoyed a plesent conversation, that said , they are people who give privacy, we never felt invaded nor something, If i would to return to Italy I would love to visit again, also the house is near a lake which is absolutly beatiful, unlike gaurda which looked like every other populated overated and over touristed, this lake was mind blowingly amazing, this is the real deal, I rank Irene and Carlo as 10/10
Thank you very much from Edgar and Alex

reviews.author: Shani
reviews.description:
The place was great and has a pastorally atmosphere , the hosts were extremely kind and helpful, the  breakfast was amazing and the view from the garden is breath taking.
Very recommended !

reviews.author: Glenn
reviews.description: We had a wonderful stay, thank you Anna for being so welcoming and helpful. Hope to be back again.

reviews.author: Ana
reviews.description: Staying at House on the lake was absolutely wonderful. Irene's parents - Anna and Cezare were our hosts during our staying, available in every time for everything. Wonderful, smart and experienced people, living the inspiring life, worth of admiration. We had our own part of the house, as written. Every morning Mr. Cora made us the best breakfast ever- homemade bread, pancakes, jam, coffee, bruschettes, everything fresh and baked. They gave us reccommendation about places to visit. This whole area is really beautiful. The lake, the nature, activities, restorans and bars. There are things to do on the lake, and, on the other hand, it's not too crowded anywhere. Nights in the House on the lake are so quite and the air is so fresh - so, for the people who want escape from the daily routines and city noise, it's really a perfect place. Definiton of vacation and hospitality. We recommend it to everyone.

reviews.author: Sabine
reviews.description:
We had a great time at Anna and Cesare´s home above  Lago d`Idro. They are wonderful hosts, took their time to give us information about walks and tours nearby, and we felt very comfortable in their house. Every morning we enjoied a delicious breakfast with a view on the lake. It is a place to come back!!
Klaus and Sabine

name: A quiet yurt  in Savoie - Bauges
description: A Big yurt of 50 m2 in the massif of Wallows in Savoy. Calm down in the middle of nowhere. The view (sight) is 360 ° on baujus mountains (Massif of Bauges).

reviews.author: Kimsy
reviews.description: What an amazing place. So happy to have beeb able to stay at the yurt. The location is incredible. Everything exactly as described. Can't wait to come back!

reviews.author: Kara
reviews.description: Jean Luc's yurt was absolutely amazing.  Loved living the simply life and getting back to nature.  Jean Luc provided us with a photo of the yurt's location to help us get there without issues.  The yurt was super secluded and great placed to get away and enjoy great views of the Alps.  The yurt has all the basic necessities for simply life living.  Recommend to all travelers willing to get away from the traditional hotel experience.

reviews.author: Victor
reviews.description: Jean Luc's Yurt accommodation can only be described as wonderful. In the heart of a stunning region, the surprisingly spacious abode provides for an experience both tranquil, relaxing, and enriching. I would endlessly recommend this spot if you seek an experience at-once wild and French.

reviews.author: Joe
reviews.description:
An amazing yurt in an amazing location. We arrived mid afternoon after receiving a detailed picture of how exactly find the track. Jean Luc was waiting at the Yurt after having just lit the fire for us. 
We had a lovely couple of days and will definitely be back!
Merci

reviews.author: Ellie
reviews.description: This place is amazing. Definitely recommend visiting here, it was the highlight of our trip.

reviews.author: Kaila And Taylor
reviews.description: Just like everyone has said, the yurt is magical! It's the perfect retreat to enjoy some quality time with loved ones or to have some peace and quiet for yourself. Our favorite part was building a fire and lighting candles as soon as it was dark and enjoying a meal and playing cards by candlelight in front of the warm stove. Jean Luc was so kind and responsive to us and made us feel very welcome. We would highly recommend staying in the yurt!

reviews.author: Coco
reviews.description: This is a wonderful little place which is something for real adventures. To find the place you gotta take a little place going off a mountain village, there is no electricity and you shower with buckets but that makes this little jem so much more exciting.

name: CHARMING HOUSE Seaside& Pine Forest
description: The Villa Amani is located in Labenne, surrounded by the pine trees, on the edge of the Aquitany' Landes' forest, between Hossegor / Capbreton and Bayonne / Biarritz. Atlantic Ocean 2.5km, watched beach and endless dunes, a Surf Paradise. Numerous Golf Clubs within 30km.

reviews.author: Margaret
reviews.description:
As some of the previous reviews have said this is a great property in a very quiet area on the outskirts of Labenne. We particularly liked the large deck, which always had shaded areas even on the sunniest days, and the wifi coverage - which was excellent. The pool was slightly smaller than we expected but it was more than adequate. We liked the fact that it was one depth (4.5 feet) throughout. The house is quite a distance from both the beach and the local shops so we had to drive to both.

Agnès and Fred were great hosts. They always replied very promptly and sent some very helpful suggestions for local markets and things to do. The property manager (Nadia) was very efficient and after check-in she emailed a detailed inventory which included the things that weren't working and needed to be fixed. These included a broken shutter (which was fixed during our stay) and the automatic open/close mechanism for the gate.

All in all we had a great week and we would definitely recommend this property.

reviews.author: Jens
reviews.description: Wow! The house is super cool and has got everything you need for a perfect holiday in Labenne. The owners are very nice and helped to make our stay unforgettable.

reviews.author: Emma
reviews.description: Wow wow wow! We had a fabulous time here. The Villa was so peaceful yet places to drive to. We walked through the forest to Lebanne Ocean where we hired bikes. There's some lovely places to cycle along side the waterways and we felt safe on the cycle tracks. We drove to Bayonne which is beautiful. The villa is superb and very cosy with everything you need. Nadia was great and Agnes was very informative sending us lots of info before we arrived and messaged us while we were there to see how we were finding the villa which was lovely. The bottle of champagne in the fridge was perfect when we arrived after a long drive from England. We will definitely be back!! We ate well, drank well and slept well :-)

reviews.author: Simon
reviews.description: A really great house in very calm and tranquil surroundings. It felt very private, even though there were houses and amenities very nearby. It was the perfect base for our family to stay at; the kids loved the forest, and the walks to the beach were wonderful.

reviews.author: Neil
reviews.description: Absolutely fantastic property. Very peaceful and tranquil area with the backdrop of birdsong from the surrounding woods. Very enjoyable relaxing stay with plenty of walking/cycling opportunities from the doorstep. Our two little dogs loved the walks in the woods and running on the beaches. Also close enough to take in the delights of Bayonne, Capbreton and Hossegor. Agnes was always enquiring as to how the stay was going and endeavored to make our stay as comfortable as possible. We hope to be back next year.

reviews.author: Andreas
reviews.description:
We stayed at the house for 2 weeks in September. Everything was perfect and I can highly recommend for 4 to 6 persons! It is very calm place at the end of a dead end road, close to a beautiful oak wood. The pool is fantastic and and I personally enjoyed very much to cook outside at the Plancha :-)

Very warm and friendly welcome from Nadia (Property Manager) and after a short explanation we felt like at home from the first minute. 

Although not present in Labenne Agnes and Fred took very much care and were very interested in how anything goes during our stay. 

Thanks for all, this was one of our best experiences ever renting a house. 

Andy

reviews.author: Guy
reviews.description:
Beautiful house 5 minutes drive from Labenne beach. 
Nadia met us on arrival at the house and made us most welcome. The house is perfectly situated for a relaxing week at the end of a quiet culture de sac yet just a short drive from Capbreton and it's magnificent beaches.

name: **CENTRAL** Comfy Artist's Home
description: If you want to experience London at it's best then come to Camden. This area of London is central, safe, and packed full of cafes, bars, famous nightclubs, music venues and the world famous Camden Market along with beautiful parks and Primrose Hill.

reviews.author: Oren
reviews.description:
We had a lovely time at Tessa's home. 
Her house is indeed a home!
So special, full of fascinating objects that are a joy to explore. 
We felt comfortable with Tessa and very welcomed by her. 
We had our privacy and could also get great tips from Tessa.  
The house is right near Camden Lock, at the heart of the neighborhood. 
Thanks for the great time
Oren and Rotem

reviews.author: Rom
reviews.description: We spent 3 nights at Tessa's palace, we really felt at home and she was very helpful and kind in every way. We managed to explore a bit London, she gave us great tips for lunch and breakfast and other activities around the city...we hope to come back very soon again!

reviews.author: ViVi
reviews.description: So special place she has! Tessa also very friendly and carefully.

reviews.author: Kathy
reviews.description:
My friend and I loved staying at Tessa's lovely home. We felt immediately at home in her home full of carefully selected art pieces and decorations. 
The house is located very close to Camden Town and to the tube and bus if we wanted to go into other parts of London. As Tessa and her co-host Ali were very helpful and always easy to contact.

reviews.author: Jill
reviews.description: Tessa's house was warm, bright, and oh so enchanting. Like staying in a storybook house! Tessa made sure that our every question was answered with her little notes. If you are an artist, you will find her place truly inspiring. If not, you will just find it truly cozy.

reviews.author: Alanna
reviews.description: It's really nice and special!

reviews.author: 소율
reviews.description: It's so woderful house. Very clean and specially decorated. Thoughtfully, host has arranged all kind of amenaties. Quiet and clean arond the house, Camden town, and can get reach places like Victoria st. or Oxford Circus bery easily by taking the bus, C2.

name: Fairgrounds (Messe) → 8min // Central City → 20min
description: ☆ Welcome ღ to Hanover! ☆

reviews.author: Jacob
reviews.description: Very good and experienced hosts with a great place to stay.  They were a lot of fun to chat with, but gave us our space when we wanted it.  Access to laundry was very helpful.

reviews.author: Louise
reviews.description: The studio was a lovely place to stop and rest during our travels. Udo and Barbel are excellent hosts.

reviews.author: Jimmy
reviews.description: Such a great stop over for us on our Road Trip. Lovely hosts, great recommendations for food. 10/10.

reviews.author: Benno
reviews.description: Udo and his studio are both very welcoming and overdelivering. We really enjoyed our stay and will return in the future. Highly recommend

reviews.author: Aiden
reviews.description:
This is a great place to stay with a delightful family. Large loft apartment has all the facilities you could need, is modern, well equipped and comfortable.

Udo and Bärbel are great, they have a well thought through concept and have really considered the needs of their visitors.

If you are lucky enough to make a booking here then you are in for a treat!!  

Many thanks to you both for making our trip a memorable and hassle free one :)

reviews.author: Anna
reviews.description: Udo and Bärbel's place exceeded all expectations. It was my first time staying with at an airbnb residence, so I'm not sure if this is the typical experience but I have to say that they out did themselves! The studio was wonderful and they were so very welcoming when I got there, it was fantastic! Plus, the studio is absolutely BEAUTIFUL and very private so I had my own little space for my mini vacation this last week that was fantastic. There was a cold bottle of water and chocolates for me in the fridge, a wide range of different self care products to choose from in the bathroom(I did a pomegranate face mask), and a book showing local stores in the area! DEFINITELY stay with them, you won't regret it!

reviews.author: John
reviews.description: Great place and a great price. Very clean with friendly and informative hosts. The apartment has a very good television with super surround sound which was good to unwinde after sightseeing the city. It's close to public transport and shops and places to eat. It has WiFi and lots of local information, which was presented with a personal touch.

name: Nice room w. balcony in Frankfurt
description: Cozy room in Frankfurt Eckenheim with balcony

reviews.author: Nicholas
reviews.description: Tom was by far the best host I've encountered using Airbnb. He went the extra mile to ensure that we had a pleasant stay and drove us to the train station the day we left. His place was very clean and the bed was comfortable. I have literally no complaints. I would absolutely recommend staying at Tom's if you're planning a trip to Frankfurt!

reviews.author: Anna
reviews.description: If you are a traveler who loves meeting wonderful people, stay at Tom's! I cannot say enough good things about our experience. We got into Frankfurt and to Tom's apartment early evening, got busy talking, and didn't realize how late it was. We went out for food but all restaurants in the area were closed! Tom graciously offered us some leftover pizza when we got back. I don't say this so that you will expect free food! I say this because it demonstrates his kindness. I guarantee that you will feel valued and welcomed if you stay with Tom. My husband and I hope to stay with him again!

reviews.author: Vadim
reviews.description: Tom was an awesome host! The apartment was extremely clean and comfortable with a lovely balcony view of the city. Tom was very gracious in explaining everything, providing us with water and quietness for when we were going to bed early which was much appreciated. Would absolutely stay there again!

reviews.author: Keith
reviews.description: Good location, quiet and peaceful, yet not too far from central Frankfurt. Nice clean place, friendly and helpful host, and a pleasant view from the balcony. We enjoyed our stay here and would gladly stay again.

reviews.author: Molly
reviews.description: Tom was very helpful and friendly! The room was great and we loved having the balcony. Definitely would stay with him again!

reviews.author: Dominik
reviews.description: Tom's place is easy to find thanks to his very detailed description. His responsiveness and communication are excellent. Tom is a great and uncomplicated host, the apartment is very clean and the bed comfortable. We felt at home - thank you!

reviews.author: Kristen
reviews.description: Tom's apartment is clean and as pictured. We did have some miscommunication with Tom at first and struggled to find the apartment despite directions. However, this was fixed and Tom was friendly upon arrival. He also kindly drove us to the train station in the morning. Overall, a nice place to stay for a quick stop and not too far from transportation.

name: UNI / City / fair / super connectio
description: The tastefully furnished apartment north indian city can spend a quiet night.

reviews.author: Bence
reviews.description: It was a great pleasure that we could have spent there our 1st 'airbnb time'. Manizh is really helpfull.

reviews.author: Jose Andres
reviews.description: Clean an decent people

reviews.author: Jacob
reviews.description: Small room but warm welcome and nice neighborhood! Good organized. All in all recommendable.

reviews.author: Prakash
reviews.description: My wife and I spent just less than 12 hours Maniz place. We arrived around 22 hours. This place was al right for a night with  TV und WiFi. Manizh keeps the place very clean, but  we couldn't sleep well due to  noises coming from her neighbours upstairs. Next morning we were reminded that check out time was at 09:00 hrs. We left place at 09:20 hours.

reviews.author: Maxat
reviews.description: Clean and nice place. Comfortable bedroom. Close to university and bus station.

reviews.author: Sabrina
reviews.description: All good.. :)

reviews.author: Peter
reviews.description: Small room with no wardrobe, not convient to hang on clothes. Need to shut down ventilation fan 20 min after shower which is not convenient if people is tired and want to go sleep right after shower. Location is good near U Bahn station, 3 mins on foot. Taking U Bahn, 3 station to city center. As Manizh not polite to us, I have to communicate with her husband to solve problems.

name: Stylish Apartment in Old Building
description: Many thanks for beautiful moments and meeting wonderful people from all over the world. Keep on visiting us in perfect location! Your Superhonks Alex, Tom, Ulrike and Michael (Waldi).

reviews.author: David
reviews.description: The building is indeed old, yet the apartment ist very comfortable and centrally located. Furthermore, Alex and Michael were helpful and proactive in ensuring we have an enjoyable stay in Bamberg.

reviews.author: Jacek
reviews.description: Perfect communication with the host, he was answering straight away, also helped us find a train from Munich do Bamberg. Flat is really cosy and has it's atmosphere. Location couldn't be much better, only 1 min. (sic!) on foot from one of the Bamberg's highlights - Altes Rathaus, and therefore right in the middle of the old town. In the flat there's everything you might need, maybe only the oven could be nicer. To sum up, a great place to sightsee Bamberg from!

reviews.author: Дмитрий
reviews.description: Thanks so much Michael for his hospitality and responsiveness !! Great location, cozy, romantic .. All that you need - available in suites .. Owner Michael was always in touch, and quickly responded to our requests and questions ..We met another guy Tom, who gave us some recommendations .. Thank you for everything! We really enjoyed! We will definitely come again! We recommend these apartments for your stay in Bamberg!

reviews.author: Nicola
reviews.description: Fantastic experience in this amazing apartment in the heart of Bamberg. Everything was good and perfect. Highly suggested!!

reviews.author: Noemi
reviews.description: My stay in Bamberg was lovely, also thanks to this sweet apartment. It is quite, cozy and nice, with a very convenient position in the town center. The hosts were really nice and kind, even though I met only Alex, just for few minutes. However, they managed to make everything perfect for me.

reviews.author: Nidin
reviews.description:
We had a wonderful and relaxed stay at Michael and Alex place. Michael was very responsive to msgs. Apartment is located in central where there is easy access to shops, restaurants and bus stops. Everything was at walkable distance. The room was clean, well furnished and bright. overall it was a perfect and wonderful stay. Check-in and Check-out time was very flexible. Michael took special care to make everything is perfect during our stay.

Thank you.
Nidin, Reshma & Milu

reviews.author: Luís
reviews.description: This was by far our best Airbnb experience. All went very well, check in was quick and easy. We couldn't ask for a better location and the appartment was really cosy with all that we needed. Communication with the Alex and Michael was always fast and helpful. We don't have any complaints and we highly recommend this appartment!

name: Bedroom with own Bathroom (Shower)
description: Big Bedroom with own Bathroom and Door to garden. No problem if you have got a dog. You can park and use Internet (w-lan) . Do you know Baden-Baden? It is a beautiful Town with Casino, Festspielhaus (Opera, Concerts, Ballett) and Horse Race in Iffezheim. Fantastic possibilities for Spa (Caracacca Therme, Friedrichsbad). Our house is 10 min from city by car or 30 min by bus; also ten min from railway station and airport Baden-Baden-Karlsruhe. The bus leaves and arrives from city two times an hour. Black Forest is nearby: 20 min by car to Mummelsee (Lake), Mehliskopf (Mountain) and many possibilities to discover nature. Some good restaurants nearby - so you can taste the local wine and walk back. In the neighborhood: the local wine society with shop with wine testing.

reviews.author: Omer
reviews.description: One of the best Airbnb ever! Michael and his family helped us in everything they could, their house is nice and cosy, our room was wonderful and the area beautiful. Highly recommended.

reviews.author: Hila
reviews.description:
I highly recommend this room! 
We stayed two nights at Michel and anke's lovely house. We had totall privacy. 2 doors seperated our lovely, beautiful unit in their house. Every thing was clean and nice, and even left us music disks in their stereo. 
Anke helped us to decide what to do around, how to arrive Baden Baden and came to pick us up from the train. They are great!!!

reviews.author: Reggie & Penny
reviews.description: Michael and his family will give you a warm welcome. The whole accommodation is clean, quiet, comfortable, very relaxing and private. The wifi was great. The location is a mere 10 mins or so from Baden-Baden. Taking a side road from Baden-Baden was a scenic 10 mins drive passing through the black forest, vineyards and the cute town of Varnhall and Umweg. I definitely recommend and would stay here again. I wish I would have spent more time walking around this quaint and cute residential area.

reviews.author: Ali
reviews.description: He had water ready for us when we arrived. Bedroom was better than pictured. Bathroom was very functional. Friendly family. Quiet place, away from the city.

reviews.author: Angelo
reviews.description: Michael and his family were such friendly hosts and provided a super nice reception.  The room is nice and cozy and is so close to multiple restaurants and vineyards and walking trails while being a really short drive to baden-baden center.  Very cool stay - i would return for sure.

reviews.author: Roma
reviews.description: Michael is warm and helpful. He patiently explained us about attractions in Baden Baden. The place is about 10 km from BB but if someone prefers 100% local feel with no tourist touch then it's a nice place. The kids are lovely and cheerful, and as a bonus - you also get an acoustic piano in your room!

reviews.author: Joshua
reviews.description: Awesome location.  Beautiful house.  Super nice family.

name: 40m² CENTRAL STUDIO - PARKING - INTERNET
description: Located 100m from central station and historical center

reviews.author: Marie
reviews.description: Guillaume was very nice and reliable, the communication with him easy and fast. The studio is super cosy and pretty and he thought of everything you might need. It is located directly between the central station and the old city - couldn't have been more perfect.

reviews.author: Ivan
reviews.description: Guillaume's apartment was extremely clean and looked just as it does in the pictures. It was very easy to park our car and the train station is literally a 5 minute walk from the door. It was also very quiet even for its central location - it's a 10 minute walk to the cathedral. Guillaume was extremely accommodating and dropped off a fan for the unseasonably warm temperatures one of the days. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would happily return again.

reviews.author: C Blair
reviews.description: The flat was very modern and extremely clean. Great location close to the train station and downtown. Guillaume was there to meet us and offered good information about Strasbourg, things to see and.places to eat. Our stay was too brief and we would definitely stay there again.

reviews.author: Eva
reviews.description:
Guillaume's place was great! It was clean, comfortable and he offered everything we needed. Guillaume was very helpful and there weren't any problems at all. Check-in/out is super easy and the apartment is in a great location, you can reach almost everything in walking distance.
I can highly recommend this place in Strasbourg!

reviews.author: Michelle Francisca
reviews.description: Guillaume's place is super clean! It's also aesthetically beautiful. Very simple yet it is all you need. The bathroom is very clean as well! The location is very close with the train station and makes it easier to go everywhere. Although it can be challenging to bring big luggage to the airbnb, I still like the place.

reviews.author: Janice
reviews.description: Very clean and comfortable flat in Strasbourg. Guillaume is really helpful and friendly. We arrived Strasbourg around 21 o'clock but Guillaume still really friendly to received us. Thank you so much. The flat just next to central station. 非常干净整洁。有问题屋主非常友好去帮助。居住大环境都很方便,中央火车站就在路的对面。

reviews.author: George
reviews.description: Wonderful host and a great cozy apartment. Very clean and centrally located. The host was quite helpful during check in and with recommendations where to eat and allowing us to use his parking spot.

name: Charming Guestroom Tübingen
description: Facing the private castle of Bühl, our property is situated in a calm and romantic surrounding apprx 5 miles outside of city centre. On ground floor we offer a cosy decorated, private appartement with kingsize bed, central heating, SAT-TV, free Wifi and ensuite  bathroom/shower. Parking is available directly on the premises.

reviews.author: Kevin
reviews.description: Good sized room, comfortable bed, lovely shower and an amazing breakfast.  Friendly welcome and easy check-in/out.

reviews.author: Angel
reviews.description: We highly recommend Monika's place. It is beautifully presented and looks exactly like the photos. It is also very clean which is very important to me. We arrived on Mother's Day and Monika and her family gave us the warmest welcome. Their beautiful dog, Lassie, loves to say hello and enjoys a pet or two. Having parking on-site was very convenient as we had a car. We just wish we had more than just a day there.

reviews.author: Nancy
reviews.description: A darling bedroom and bathroom suite and a charming little town. Clean and supplied with lovely little extras - coffee, tea, soap...  I really enjoyed my stay.

reviews.author: Annie
reviews.description: Location may be a bit remote but as we are driving and it's along the way to our place of interest so not a problem to us. It's a very warm and comfort room for us to stay over one night and we have a bath room exclusively for us. The host is friendly too.

reviews.author: Henk
reviews.description: We were in this lovely appartment for four days. Clean comfortable and fine beds. Colourful bathroom a perfect place to go wandering in the woods or visit lovely cities. Tubingen with students is lively. Baden Baden rich and Stuttgart modern and old growing in harmony.

reviews.author: Jenna
reviews.description: Monika and Jurgen were fantastic hosts. Their home is lovely and they are very kind and helpful. Make sure to get their delicious breakfast!

reviews.author: Razvan
reviews.description: My daughter and I were on a two day stay in Tubingen to visit the University. Monika's place is very clean, spacious, and decorated with taste. The night after we stayed at the Sheratton in Stuttgart and lets say Monika's place was two stars up from Sheratton's room. The breakfast was delicious with many options, they even offered honey from they're daughter's production. I highly recommend this place. We plan to stay here again as we will visit my daughter who decided to go to Uni Tubingen in the Fall.

name: Sydney City & Harbour at the door
description: Come stay with Vinh & Stuart (Awarded one of Australia's top hosts by Airbnb CEO Brian Chesky & key shareholder Ashton Kutcher. We're Sydney's #1 reviewed hosts too).  Find out why we've been positively reviewed 500+ times.

reviews.author: Niall
reviews.description: I was in town for an event so spent most of each day out - but to have such a comfortable house and bed to come home to was a treat.

reviews.author: Wang
reviews.description: Stuart's place is traditional house in Sydney and near to darling harbour!

reviews.author: Joanna
reviews.description: Vinh was an amazing host! He made me feel very comfortable to stay there also the location Was pretty good! Easy walk to darling harbor and Star casino, with plenty of nice restaurants nearby too. But, I have to mention the carpet in the house and our room was a bit smelly, my mom barely slept for the first night in addition the quality of the bed & linen wasn't very good.

reviews.author: Kristin
reviews.description: A very friendly and comfortable home away from home. Very nice to be able to share the kitchen and bathroom. In warmer weather to sit outside and look out at the water would be wonderful. We felt very safe and welcome.

reviews.author: Pintian
reviews.description: The house is located near the harbor and the view is great. You can easily walk to the park outside to enjoy the scenery. Besides, the house is near the Fish Market where you can enjoy local fresh food. You can take public transport in the John Street Square Station to anywhere. If you want to explore Sydney deeply, Stuart's place is your suitable choice.

reviews.author: Jennifer
reviews.description: Perfect location and very friendly host. Felt welcome.

reviews.author: Joe
reviews.description: The hosts were exceptionally knowledgeable and hospitable to us. Additionally the location was perfectly close to the city while having a little distance from crowds.

name: Luxury Gold Coast Hinterland Villa
description: Stunning views over the hinterland. Luxurious villa sleeping 10 persons in a loft style room.  Property spreads over 10 acres.  Horses and dogs are welcome.  Hot tub with open fireplace and 25m lap pool equipped with a pavillion for dive in movies

reviews.author: Mike
reviews.description: The pool combined with the view are stunning.  Great BBQ and eating area.  Can't recommend it enough.

reviews.author: Zhai
reviews.description: This place was a lovely spot. Incredible views from the pool area. Would recommend this place in future. Wish i could stay longer.

reviews.author: Samantha
reviews.description:
Thank you so much Kerri-Lea.
This was my first experience on Air BnB and I absolutely loved it. I booked the Villa for myself and my family so we could spend some time together, relax and celebrate birthday's. The accommodation, view, pool, spa and everything about this booking was better than I thought it would be. Everything exceeded my imagination. 
Kerri-Lea was a wonderful host, the check in and check out was easy.
The Villa and pool/BBQ area is all well equipped. A wonderful place to stay, relax and take in the serenity. Could not recommend this place highly enough.
We also fell in love with your dog Jirra, who was just absolutely beautiful and so loveable.

Thanks again!

reviews.author: Rheannon
reviews.description: The location was absolutely fabulous! The loft room fit us 10 girls perfectly  The pool is amazing, so peaceful. You do have to share the outdoor area with the main house and king suite occupants but that was still fine! Had a great Hens weekend! Kerri-Lea is a fabulous host- great communication and always there to help when you need. Thankyou very much for a great weekend!

reviews.author: Rachael
reviews.description:
What can I say? It was truly a weekend to remember. The photos don't even do it justice. The view is breath taking and the facilities were phenomenal. I wanted a place that felt away but was easy to get to and I got exactly that! Couldn't have asked for a more wonderful host. Easy to communicate with, always happy to help and she does everything to make your stay about you. I couldn't recommend this beautiful place highly enough! 
Rachael x

reviews.author: Natalie
reviews.description: Absolutely incredible house! Kerri-Lea was the best host ever. I had a hens weekend that I will truly never forget! Thank you for everything - hopefully one day we will be back.

reviews.author: David
reviews.description: The house consists of a open plan living room/kitchen, single bathroom and a large upstairs room where all the beds are. There is AC throughout. Please keep this in mind if you're a large group of adults as privacy is limited. The places really shines when your outside. With a covered area including coffee table, bar, huge BBQ and ipod dock overlooking the mountains and that splendid pool, outdoors is where you want to be. There is a large 9 seater table with umbrella closer to the main house and a 9 person hot tube built into the deck for when the nights are colder. Kerri-Lea was a fantastic host getting us settled in and then leaving us to it.

name: Designer Suite in Central Deco Icon
description: Commanding views across historic City Hall and Paris End Skyscrapers, this centrally located apartment sits within the famous 1924 early modernist/Art Deco Capitol Theatre Building, designed by Frank Lloyd Wright trained architect, Walter Burley Griffin. Griffin is renowned for his design for Australia's capital city, Canberra.

reviews.author: Kellene
reviews.description: Donna is a wonderful host, she really helped me out with practical solution when I had to collect  a lost backpack and had no idea how to collect without incurring a high fee! The apartment is really well maintained and feels like home everyday so much so that we didn't feel like leaving it to go out. However, if we do go out, it is really in a perfect location especially if you don't drive,  right in the middle of CBD and free tram zone.  Donna provided juice, milk, croissants and fruits too, and had a really well stocked pantry of coffee and teas. The toilet has all the amenities we needed, and the bed is super comfortable. Thanks for being such a wonderful host!

reviews.author: Charissa
reviews.description: A fantastic airbnb experience with Donna - nothing to fault.  Exceptional on every level.

reviews.author: Michelle
reviews.description:
We really enjoyed this location, big window overlooking the Melbourne Town Hall, leafy trees along Swanston Street. A compact apartment that delivers what you need for a CBD stay in Melbourne.
Donna was great in taking the time to orientate us and left us some goodies to get started. 
An excellent choice at a good price.

reviews.author: Yating(Bridget)
reviews.description: very good location, close to everything. The first day we arrived we went out for food at 12am, only took us 5-10mins walk to restaurants.

reviews.author: Gavin And Simone
reviews.description: Donnas apartment is really central in the cbd, wonderfully furnished and equipped and Donna couldnt be a better host she really looks after and anticipates her guests needs. Gorgeous view of the two  hall feels like you are in a European city. Spotless too.

reviews.author: Carmen
reviews.description: Donna is wonderful and experience host. She takes great joy and pride in sharing her beautifully appointed flat and her marvelous city.  Our stay exceeded our expectations with a perfect location. Donna's impeccable attention to providing a perfect stay complete with lovey morning treats made for a first rate stay. Most impressive was Donna's mini tour guide invites as she shared her location and historic building and local sites . Fantastic ! We highly recommend your stay in Donna's lovely flat.  Kenn and Carmen

reviews.author: Courtney
reviews.description: Perfect central location in the city.  Lovely apartment and Donna was very nice and helpful showing us around when we checked in.  We would love to stay again if we come back!

name: The Designer's Den: Spacious 1BR Perfect Location
description: Beautifully stylish, unique and thoughtful design in the most trendy location in Sydney. A short stroll to the hippest cafes, shops and transport to anywhere in the city (5 minutes walk from central station).

reviews.author: Nava
reviews.description: what a lovely apartment. clean, spacious and welcoming with lots of little touches to make it feel like a home away from home including a super comfortable bed. our apartment in Erskineville was let out to other guests on airbnb and we needed a quick stopgap. really enjoyed exploring the neighborhood as well. highly recommended!

reviews.author: Marnie
reviews.description: Stunning place to stay. Very central for a stay in Sydney yet in a quiet street where there's hardly any traffic or pedestrian noise outside. Loved the decor and the Netflix subscription was a nice added bonus.

reviews.author: Yongkun
reviews.description: Very nice location and quiet suburb. The accommodation is very stylish and nicely designed.

reviews.author: Kanittha
reviews.description: Walking distance from Central station, exceptionally clean, friendly service and extremely pleasurable ambiance this place has. Shame we only booked one night! Highly recommended.

reviews.author: Andy
reviews.description:
Noa's apartment was the perfect spot for our stay in Sydney. It is close to so many great cafes, bars, and restaurants, as well as a nice walk into the city center. It felt like coming home at the end of the day, which was a much nicer experience than any hotel could provide. 

Noa met us early on our check in day and was able to hold our bags while the apartment was prepped. She provided tips on a cafe to try nearby and was so kind through the whole process. 

I definitely recommend Noa's apartment if you want a cozy place to stay in Sydney. I'll certainly book again the next time we're in town.

reviews.author: Isabella
reviews.description: Beautiful apartment that I would happily stay in over and over again.

reviews.author: Antonio
reviews.description:
A really breath-taking and tastefully designed studio, ideally located smack in the middle of Surry Hills. One of the best Airbnbs I've stayed at, and a steal for the price. 

While strictly speaking a studio as the bedroom isn't walled in, this is more spacious than your average one-bedroom. The design details, from the towel racks to the interesting wall and roof lights (a literal sheet of light from behind a table-size canvas), are interesting and ubiquitous in the apartment. A shame that I only spent a night there, as it's the sort of place one could easily spend a week or more.

name: FUNKY AND BRIGHT STUDIO APARTMENT
description: Top floor balcony apartment with sparkling city outlook and harbour glimpses from the balcony. Easy access to rooftop terrace with excellent BBQ facilities and stunning views of Harbour Bridge and Opera House. Metres from bustling Crown and Oxford Sts, stroll to town, bus to Bondi Beach!

reviews.author: Francis
reviews.description: Bert's place was great, as was Bert. It was completely as advertised and then some. Place was clean, well-appointed, and in an incredibly great and bustling location (although not noisy in the apartment). Bert was really nice and helpful, even taking me on a little tour of the neighborhood and building. Would definitely book again. Thanks Bert!

reviews.author: Johnson
reviews.description: I would highly recommend this place. Bert is a fantastic host and found him helpful beyond what I expected. His place is in the perfect location for a mix of nightlife, culture and food. Nothing lacking in amenities and over and above helpful host.

reviews.author: Lee
reviews.description: Great place. Nice rooftop for photos.

reviews.author: Mark
reviews.description: Excellent location. Compact and tidy. Super balcony and rooftop. Great shower. Stayed a week and it was great.

reviews.author: Alice
reviews.description: Bert is a experienced and thoughtful landlord, so  everyone who choice his apartment is so lucky.

reviews.author: Rob
reviews.description: Thank you very much! We had a gret time. The place was perfect for us and we appreciated you're help on arrival and all the nice touches in the place (milk, fruit etc). Thanks again Lie & Rob :)

reviews.author: Ian
reviews.description: A comfortable and well-located base for a stay in Sydney,  with walkable access to the City Centre and main tourist sites and very convenient access to public transport. The views are great. We enjoyed our stay. Bert was a good host.

name: Waterfront Paradise, Awesome Views
description: Our place is the best of two worlds, offering you the wonderful peace and quiet of our harbourside property and being only 15 minutes from the city. Perfect for relaxing after a busy day sight seeing. Great walkways and fabulous views of the city

reviews.author: John
reviews.description: Gerry & Jeanette were very welcoming and we feel we have made friends for life - our stay was very enjoyable and we would highly recommend this property for location, value and overall experience

reviews.author: Dora
reviews.description: The sea view here is awesome. Kind Jeannette & Gerry make us feel warm and sweet. Strongly recommend!

reviews.author: Anne
reviews.description: We arrived at Gerry and Jeanette's at 10.30 at night, much later than expected after experiencing a number of unexpected communications problems. Gerry and Jeannette were still waiting up when two frazzled travellers arrived. They were calm and helpful at all times. They have a lovely house on the water front and are charming hosts. Just a warning to other travellers to watch the high kerb driving in -if you hit the wrong place you could damage your car. No permanent damage to ours, luckily, and Gerry was very helpful in that regard too. Highly recommended to other travellers.

reviews.author: 思敏
reviews.description: Perfect!!!

reviews.author: Weichao
reviews.description: Jeannette and Gerry are the best hosts we have met. The house is located on Te Atatu Peninsula with the awesome views. Everything in the house is clean and tidy. We feel so cozy just like home. We cannot wait to eat Jeannette's muesli breakfast every morning, that is amazing, we love it! Thank you guys, we really enjoyed staying with you.

reviews.author: John
reviews.description: We do agree that Jeannette and Gerry are super hosts. The discription of the target was honest. The apartment was cosy, bright and super clean. The terrace was huge and the views scenic. We got every morning Jeannette's tasty fresh fruit muesli or porridge breakfasts on their sunny terrace with scenic views according to our own wish. We had wonderful 3 weeks with them.The hosts were friendly and helpful with the attractions. We had many cheerful moments together. Thank's a lot. Wish you all the best!

reviews.author: Hans
reviews.description: Gerry and Jeannette are terrific hosts! While their home is far from the city center (renting a car is highly recommended as Auckland is very big city), you won't regret staying with them. I couldn't think of a more beautiful spot that is peaceful and overlooking the city and harbor. More importantly, both of them embody what hosting should be. They ensured that our stay was comfortable and were attentive even to the little details. Jeanette prepared wonderful breakfast everyday and we enjoyed talking with them, sharing our views and backgrounds. Lastly, they gave us a lot of tips and suggestions to help us navigate around Auckland. I would definitely stay with them again should I ever visit Auckland in the future!

name: The Treehouse!! (yes, it's warm!)
description: Unique backpacker accommodation! Stay in our tree house, made from all recycled materials and overlooking the hills of the Akatarawa... It's warm and cozy with a heater and electric blanket for a warm bed. Free WiFi and power in the hut,  and a firebath below! Perfect place to unwind!

reviews.author: Tasha
reviews.description: A really unique experience ! The surrounding scenery is stunning too! Would highly recommend :)

reviews.author: 吳
reviews.description: This is a very special house, we have a special experience!

reviews.author: Taylor
reviews.description: The treehouse is super warm and cozy and the surrounding area is beautiful. Natalie and Sean are very friendly and hospitable and their dog is so sweet. I had a lovely time, I would definitely stay again.

reviews.author: Paul
reviews.description: This is an very cool place to stay if you want something else I loved it!

reviews.author: John
reviews.description: This was the perfect spot for a pleasant night stay during our honeymoon trip. Natalie was kind and the accommodations were exactly as described.

reviews.author: Adam
reviews.description: Wonderful place!

reviews.author: Zach
reviews.description: What a magicool place! We only stayed a night & enjoyed it that much, we'll definitely endeavour to stay again, only next time for at least a couple of nights!

name: Stunning views from warm cosy yurt
description: 'The Chocolate Yurt' is a fully insulated 6m yurt with a skylight to gaze at the stars at night.

reviews.author: Franziska
reviews.description: One of the best Airbnb experiences ever! A great way to explore a different way of living. The yurt was cozy and warm during the late autumn/ early winter days. We had the pleasure to stay for an entire week. Our 6 year old son totally loved it. In the morning we were woken up by the sun that shone into the yurt and kind of kissed us awake. Taking a warm shower in the open bathroom (with 9 degrees Celcius outside) and making dinner in the open kitchen during a little storm added to the adventure. Tessa, Remko and the kids were absolutely lovely and shared their experiences and parts of their journey with us. We also got great tipps how to explore in the region. Highly, highly recommended.

reviews.author: Kati
reviews.description: Booked on behalf of a friend. They loved it here and had a lovely time.

reviews.author: Sarah
reviews.description: Great place to get away and relax!!!

reviews.author: Matthew
reviews.description: Well worth a stay!

reviews.author: Rick
reviews.description:
An utterly wonderful place, we felt instantly relaxed and had a short-but-sweet time in the fantastic yurt. Tessa and family were wonderful to chat to, very helpful and welcoming. The set-up is brilliant, both for tourists like us and for more practical life. Unrivalled views across the valley to the sea, glass of wine as the sun sets, cosy up by the fire, morning shower with a view. Perfect. A great part of our honeymoon, thanks!

Rick and Sian

reviews.author: Richard
reviews.description: You must experience Yurt Life! The Yurt was just awesome, clean, warm and with the most stunning views. It was a great pleasure to have a hot shower overlooking the valley below, wow, what an experience. Tessa and family have a little bit of paradise; thank you for letting us share in this. You were most welcoming, and understanding when we checked in late. Thank you so very much for your warm hospitality.

reviews.author: Emily
reviews.description: Tessa and Remko's place was incredible - more than we could have imagined! This was our first yurt experience and it was absolute luxury - such stunning, beautiful craftsmanship from the furniture to the outside kitchen and by far the most stylish long drop we've ever experienced! The outdoor bath was a real treat and the views from the deck were amazing. Such a beautiful place we didn't want to leave. Couldn't recommend it more!

name: Grey Gables, Pokeno - city gateway
description: Come and enjoy our lifestyle block, nestled on the southern slopes of the Bombay Hills, 1km from the motorway, 45min to Downtown Auckland and 35min to Auckland International Airport. The perfect environment to catch your breath.

reviews.author: Chani
reviews.description: This was our last stop before flying out of Auckland and it was just perfect! Karen and her husband were amazing hosts and made us feel most welcome. The room was really comfortable and their home is simply gorgeous (we definitely enjoyed playing a game of pool in the evening). The location couldn't have been more perfect and we had maybe a 30min drive to the airport. Would highly recommend!

reviews.author: Loic
reviews.description: Very nice host, great  house, welcome to new zeland

reviews.author: Jas
reviews.description: LOVED Karen's place-very clean, spacious and modern!

reviews.author: Regina
reviews.description:
Karen and Stewart are great hosts. They have separate fridges for their b&b guests so everything seemed so clear. She provided us with butter, milk, and jams in the fridge. Towels were clean and shampoo and shower gels were available along with shower caps, etc.  The bedding was really nice. Electric blankets were a really nice touch.

The best above all was the hospitality we experienced with them! We carelessly left some food at Karen and Stewart's and they gladly allowed us to go back and pick up our stuffs a few days later.

Overall, this is my first AirBnB experience and I am so glad that I stayed with Karen and Stewart.

reviews.author: Leon
reviews.description: What a wonderful stay!  Karen and Stewart are gracious, kind, and welcoming hosts.  Their home is spacious, beautiful, and so comfortable.  Only a short drive from Auckland Airport, it was the perfect place for our family to stop for a night before continuing our drive south.  Our children had a wonderful time and loved having the space to run around outdoors after a long flight, feed the friendly sheep, and use the pool table indoors later that evening.  We all slept so well and really enjoyed the homemade breakfast before heading out the next morning.  Thank you, Karen and Stewart, for a truly fantastic stay!

reviews.author: Marcus
reviews.description: great accommodation with everything we required for our stay

reviews.author: Jessica
reviews.description: Beautiful, spacious home. Our family of 6 thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Karen was very timely in her communication and she and Stuart were gracious hosts.

name: Lucky #8 Penthouse
description: Right on the lake in Central Queenstown sits this newly renovated three bedroom penthouse with sweeping 180 degree views of Lake Wakitipu and the Remarkable Mountains! 6 minute walk to the center of town. Perfect for a luxury escape to the mountains!

reviews.author: Alexander
reviews.description: The place has great views right next to the lake and a short walk to town. There is also a nice trail for jogging or walking around the lake. Robert and Charles responded quickly to any questions we had.

reviews.author: Jesus
reviews.description: This place is great, amazing view, one of the best airbnb I've stayed at.

reviews.author: Zachary
reviews.description: Thanks for a great time! Beautiful house with an amazing view :)

reviews.author: Ellen
reviews.description: We had the best time staying at the penthouse for our honeymoon. It was so comfortable, clean, and warm. A perfect place to come home to at the end of a long day out and about in Queenstown. The views are spectacular and it was so easy walking into town. Would recommend this place to anyone and will hopefully be back one day!

reviews.author: Jacqui
reviews.description: Fabulous location & everything excellent.  Small issue when we arrived which was very promptly attended to. Very happy & impressed. Strongly recommend & would very happily rebook.

reviews.author: Lei
reviews.description: Cozy apartment,10 mins away from Queenstown mall.

reviews.author: Juliani
reviews.description: The apartment is modern, well-maintained and clean. The view is simply amazing. However, there is a house under construction next to the apartment so it gets quite noisy with hammering and drilling from 9am to 5pm on weekdays. It would have been perfect without the noise as we love to just relax and enjoy the view. Other than that everything is great. Check-in was simple and Charles and Robert replied to our emails very fast.

name: Waikite - 180° Water View Cabin
description: Unique compact cabin attached to the main cabin in a stunning environment, capturing spectacular harbour views.

reviews.author: Gal
reviews.description:
Viv is a great host, very friendly and welcoming. It was really fun to talk with her and get useful advices on the area.
The apartment is well equipped and was everything we needed after a long journey. 
The sunsets will leave you speechless.

reviews.author: Alice
reviews.description:
What a great little cabin to stay in, It was super clean and warm.
Viv has made this into a safe, cosy and welcoming place. I hope you enjoy it as much as we did. Viv had everything and more.

reviews.author: Jaimi
reviews.description: Viv was lovely! The place was gorgeous and very clean

reviews.author: Zsolt
reviews.description: Nice little cabin with an awesome view, and a really nice and friendly host.

reviews.author: Lindsey
reviews.description: Great place to stay along our trip in Coromandel. Viv was very helpful before, during and even after our stay on the way out! It's a great location with a short hike or walk to town. We will most definitely be back!

reviews.author: Ben
reviews.description:
Thanks Viv.
Had a fantastic time in your part of the world. Loved your wee place.

reviews.author: Rebecca
reviews.description: My partner and I stayed in Viv's cabin for one night whilst exploring Coromandel. The cabin was just what we needed to relax, and the views were incredible both at the cabin and on a trail just behind the house.

name: Old Folk Housen
description: This house is an old Japanese traditional house built in 1948.

reviews.author: Amos
reviews.description: We are a Family of three on our first travel to Japan. Akanene and Mitsu  where very responsive and friendly. The place is very comfortable to a family of three and has all the features one would need.  It takes about 15 minutes to get to the station another 20 minutes to get to the center of town. But the neighborhood is lovely and there are many local stores and restaurants to enjoy. We recommend it!

reviews.author: Jesus
reviews.description:
The house was clean and nicely decorated, we were able to experience a traditional Japanse house that enhance our visit.. Akane's house was so beautiful but specially Akane's and her husband's kindness and help. Akane's instructions to get to her house were spot on.  They even gave us a ride to the closest subway station when we left. 
We would love to go back in the future . It was our first experience with Air BnB  and it was awesome.

reviews.author: Stefano
reviews.description: Akane and Mitsu the best host ever, the house is beautiful well equipped and close to public transport. Highly recommended.

reviews.author: Jasmine
reviews.description: There is not much to add to what has already been said about Akane and Mitsu's home that has not already been said. The home was wonderful and had all the amenities that we needed. Akane and Mitsu are an absolutely adorable couple and they are kind, considerate and extremely helpful. They went out of their way and helped my friend whom has deathly allergic shellfish allergies which was deeply appreciated. Don't hesitate to stay here and make sure to reserve in advance! We had to reserve a couple months ahead but it was entirely worth it.

reviews.author: Karli
reviews.description: Akanene and Mitsu have such a wonderful place. It exceeded our expectations in every way. It was easy to find and they provided everything we could have needed. Also It was close to a grocery store and several convinence store. Akanene and Mitsu were even kind enough to let me use their phone when I was having a problem with my credit card. Would love to stay with them again!

reviews.author: Sammy
reviews.description: It is a wonderful house,Akane&Mitsu are very friendly and sweet,we love it!!!

reviews.author: Jérémy
reviews.description:
Great location. Very quiet and typical neighbourhood. The apartment is awesome, we love the architecture and the atmosphere. mitsu and akane are great hosts. We had an amazing time with them when dinner at their house. Cook was great. 
I highly recommand this location

name: Yui Valley-Traditional House (easy to Tokyo/Kyoto)
description: Between Tokyo and Kyoto in Japan`s country side, in Traditional farmers village. Surrounded by Green  Mountains, Bamboo forests, Rivers and Green Tea Fields.

reviews.author: Or
reviews.description:
Consider yourself very lucky if you manage to book this place. Don't think twice!!! We cannot recommend high enough! Staying in Hila & Dai's place was the best experience of our trip! They are exceptional hosts full with love & care. The house is just AMAZING, and the village is so quiet & authentic that it's nothing short but a great pleasure to feel a part of it even for such a short period. We are grateful for the superb experience and the good times we spent in Tamatori and wish we could have just live there and help Dai chop bamboos forever. 

Seriously, cut all the tourist mambo jambo and go to chill between the bamboo forests and the green tea fields with the coolest hosts around.

reviews.author: Dan
reviews.description: Hila and Dai were really lovely hosts! Their ryokan is cozy and comfortable, and it's very clear a lot of thought went into each detail of its design. We spent two nights there and during the day we didn't even leave - we just relaxed and read our books to the sounds of nature. Their home is nestled between green tea fields, a bamboo forest, and a gushing river.  Both the dinner and breakfast they made for us were fresh and delicious, made with local ingredients - some made by their neighbors, like the honey, cheese, and tea. We came with so many questions after 2 weeks in the Japanese countryside, and Hila happily answered all of them. We would definitely come back!!

reviews.author: Erez
reviews.description: This is the best experience I ever had. These exceptional hosts, Hila and Dai, let me feel a part of their familly. Hila picked me up from the train station and then droped me after check out. I was also invited to their friends for a nice authentic evening meal. The house was amazing ! Real wooden traditional Japanese house. Toilets are modern ' Sitting' and very clean. I could really relax with full privacy. Breakfast service was perfect. In addition, I when up on a hill and saw mount Fugi and went to a top tea house ceremony in the near village.

reviews.author: Omri
reviews.description:
Hila and dia host like u are one of their family.
They explain us everything on the area with patience and took care of everything we need during our stay.
The house is  very clean and the view from it is beautiful ,There is a gorgeous river just below the house.

Its very nice to see the area with the quick and comfortable bicycle of the flat.
The breakfast is rich  and delicious with lots of food.

I recommend this apartment to anyone who visit in japan.

reviews.author: Yoni
reviews.description: Not only was our stay the perfect antidote to Tokyo's urban overload, Daisuke proved to be the ideal host and overall nicest person you'll ever have the pleasure of meeting. His authentic home is comfortable and enchanting, while the surroundings are serene with plenty of exploring to do nearby. Our only regret is that we didn't have more time to spend up there and that Hila wasn't around while we were staying.  I am counting on returning some time in the future to really chill and hopefully meet her, too (they live on the same property just next door). While fairly outback and up in the hilly, more remote countryside, the car navigator brought us to the door, just be sure someone types the accurate address in Japanese (driving instructions are voiced in English). Don't Miss!

reviews.author: Claire
reviews.description:
My friend and I spent an utterly magical three days at Dai & Hila's beautifully traditional country home. Dai was kind enough to pick us up from Yaizu station and drive us to the house, which was situated among gorgeous greenery and next to a little river. Hila came by every morning to chat and make sure we had everything we needed, but otherwise we were left alone to enjoy the house and its surrounds. Everything was simply perfect; if you're looking to experience rural Japan in a singular way, I would definitely recommend Dai & Hila's place. 
** N.B. - beware spiders and creepy-crawlies!! We're Australian, so we didn't have much trouble with them, but if you're not a fan of many-legged creatures, Shizuoka's countryside might not be the place for you! **

reviews.author: Nigel
reviews.description: One of the most beautiful, peaceful, welcoming, magical places we have ever stayed.

name: off-grid tiny cottage in nature
description: In Ohinata, Sakuho-town, Nagano-pref.

reviews.author: Rob
reviews.description:
I can't rate this place highly enough. It is in a completely beautiful area and Daigo has created a very comfortable lovely cabin. He's put a lot of thought into it and I didn't really need anything that wasn't there. Daigo and his wife are lovely and do whatever they can to help. They went above and beyond for me and im super thankful for that. 
You will definitely want a car so you can explore the surrounding areas. I drove from Tokyo an it's an easy drive. Just need an international license
Thanks heaps Daigo mate love your work x

reviews.author: 睿菲
reviews.description:
The cottage that the host provided overall was excellent in various aspects. For location, it is just between the forest and the village, which ensure the safety of the cottage as well as provide excellent scenery of the countryside. The cottage was warm and quiet. The host is very warm-hearted, taking us from the railway station way up to the cottage, introducing specifically how to use every detail of using the house. Villagers are very welcome, a villager even drove us around the village just because we did not know where the shrine was. The host also drove us to the hot spring in the local town and introduced us with several recommended restaurants around that place. Food was overall great and as there is a big supermarket with all kinds of food and necessities, and that the cottage itself has all the equipment needed to cook, the food can also be prepared by guests themselves. 

As a traveler who has never been to Japan before and for most of the time lived in the urban areas, the cottage, together with the Japanese-style countryside living experience, was really impressive for me. I appreciated the beauty of nature in this village and also experienced the local culture. It was an unforgettable part of my Japanese trip!

reviews.author: Georgia
reviews.description: This experience is so different to the bustling feel of the major towns. It is beautifully built, tranquil witb amazing views. We were here in june but you could still see snow on some of the surrounding mountains near by. It's close to many great walks and also close enough to great food . However, if you want to seclude yourself you can. Daigo was an amazing host and full of knowledge. He is willing to help you with anything and has gone to a great effort to make the place a special experience.

reviews.author: Debbie
reviews.description:
The cottage was sweet, comfortable and had an amazing view.  I loved sleeping with the window open so I could hear the stream flowing nearby.  Daigo, Keisuke and their team put so many lovely touches in building the home.  I especially liked the 'window' over the bathroom sinks. There was some construction equipment nearby, so I wonder if more cottages are being built.  Please, if you go (and you should go), watch out for the little black and white kitten.  She is very loving and very hungry.  It seems she does not belong to anyone.  If I had known about her before arriving, I would have picked up some food at the supermarket.  As it was, I gave her cheese, the insides of my gyoza, tofu skin and some of my bottled water.  Please pick up some cans of food when you visit. I regret that I was unable to take her to a rescue group or vet during my short stay (I only met her in the afternoon of my one day there), so if you have the opportunity, please do.

I have already recommended the cottage to my Japanese and American friends and I would love to go back and explore.  I spent my day inside, as it was raining, but thoroughly enjoyed myself by coloring in the guest book at the desk and looking out the window.  I'm inspired to build my own back in California. :)

reviews.author: Anthony
reviews.description: Daigo's place was amazing. Hands down. If you are interest in the amenities of a resort, this place is not for you. If you are looking for a calm, serene respite from the busy city life of Japan...if you are looking to be inspired, for your creativity and flow to be activated...then this is your place. Hands down indescribable experience.

reviews.author: 哲宇
reviews.description: Staying at Diago's cottage is definitely one of my favorite Airbnb experience. We built campfire (with extreme cautious) and enjoyed the astonishing night sky full of stars. This is the place for nature lover. Since it's in the wild, some inconvenience or little insects are unavoidable, this is no cozy hotel in the city, but an experience you should try.

reviews.author: Dean
reviews.description: This magical mountain cabin is everything for those who want to go a bit slower and to appreciate the simpler things. Daigo and his mates have worked hard to create a very unique cabin which is both comfortable and stylish. It has made our holiday very memorable

name: Historic and Elegant Suite in a Former Ryokan
description: NEW OPEN ANNOUNCEMENT: Our machiya townhouse annex space is newly renovated and now accepting reservations.  Please check under 'other listings' in our host profile or send us a message for more information!

reviews.author: Dan
reviews.description: We enjoyed our stay here - the hosts were warm and welcoming. The house is beautiful and spacious, and has an interesting history. Downstairs is a cute cafe, and the coffee is great and super fresh. The cafe hosts different bands, and activities like board game days. We took a flower arrangement class with Seanacey, which was really interesting and made us see this part of Japanese culture differently. We really enjoyed it. Highly recommended!

reviews.author: Amanda
reviews.description: Beautiful and spacious--we really enjoyed staying here. 5 adults traveling and there was plenty of room for us. The neighborhood is great with tons of little restaurants and close to public transportation. We also did an ikebana class with Seanacey and really enjoyed it. Would stay here again and happily recommend to friends.

reviews.author: Teresa
reviews.description: It really was a great experience! Kojiro is very helpful, hospitality and easy to communication. Seanacey is very pretty and kind. The location is a bit hard to find. But the defects cannot obscure the virtues, we think we will have opportunities to meet each other in the future. 本当に楽しかった!

reviews.author: Marc
reviews.description: This is a great place to slow down to Kyoto pace, and a genuine 200 year old mashiya building. Kojiro and Seanacey roast their own coffee, have great suggestions for an original approach to see Kyoto, know great restaurants and serve great whiskey at their bar. The one downside is the location which is a bit far from downtown, but it will allow you to get to know the non touristy side of town.

reviews.author: Joan
reviews.description:
We thoroughly enjoyed our time with Seanacey and Kojiro and the glimpse into old world Kyoto, while maintaining modern conveniences.  Having the second floor all to ourselves was spacious and relaxing.  The location was an easy walk to the JR train station, just one stop from Kyoto station. 
Seanacey and Kojiro couldn't have been more helpful with recommendations on tourist sites, restaurants and trolley car train lines (unknown to us).  
We happened to be there during two 'events' - board game day and an evening concert, which were both fun to attend.  
Coffee bar and whiskey were fun add-ons!
Highly recommend!

reviews.author: Shabrina
reviews.description:
Kojiro and Seanecey are wonderful hosts. They are so responsive and kind.

The house is very unique and full of history. It feels unique and special to be able to stay in a place like this.

All the recommendations were great and enabled us to enjoy the neighborhood.

reviews.author: Tina
reviews.description: Kojiro and Seanacey's Inn is simply fantastic. It's in a nice peaceful residential area, so it's quiet at night. Every room in the inn is dripping with charm and history. Also, it's HUGE, there is so much space. Nice cozy bedroom (there are multiple for large groups), a living room, bathroom, and a neat shower. Downstairs is an adorable cafe that serves some seriously tasty coffee and whiskey. It's in a very convenient location, about a 6 minute walk to the nearest JR Station, and a quick train ride to Kyoto Station. Kojiro and Seanacey are so kind and helpful, they did everything they could to make us feel welcome. In short, if you really want a great experience and to step back in time (with modern conveniences) stay here!

name: Antique MachiyaHouse JR kyoto Toji
description: ★There is an antique shop in the guest house.

reviews.author: Garth
reviews.description: What a trurely wonderful home and such incredible hosts!

reviews.author: Rosie
reviews.description: Beautiful traditional house full of art and antiques. We enjoyed relaxing upstairs and drinking tea. Also very close to Kyoto station . We were treated at the station and communications were great.

reviews.author: Susanna
reviews.description: This was a great place to stay. A beautiful home in a quiet area of Kyoto. Has more than everything you need to ensure a comfortable stay.

reviews.author: Andy
reviews.description: Yukie was a great host- very helpful and accommodating. The place is huge and an easy walk to Kyoto Station. All around great experience.

reviews.author: Amy
