reviews.description: Daisuke and Yukie were such generous hosts :) Their house is a little bit of a walk but easy to navigate, and Yukie is kind enough to offer to pick us up. The house is as they advertise and full of the traditional Japanese style house experience. It's a quiet neighbourhood even during the daytime so perfect for families wishing to relax. The stairwell in the house is a little steep, however you have the option of sleeping either upstairs or downstairs so it's not a big problem at all. Everything is well furbished and extremely welcoming. If I'm ever in Kyoto again I'll be sure to come back. Thanks!

reviews.author: Adrian
reviews.description: Great venue- lovely house and hosts. They lent us bicycles so we were able to see Kyoto on 2 wheels! A great place to base yourself in Kyoto

name: Urban Tokyo House
description: A very well-located, modern, 3-story house with very easy access to the best places in Tokyo. Experience our version of the Japanese concept of hospitality (omotenashi) as you use our well-designed house as your home base for your Tokyo adventure!

reviews.author: Nancy
reviews.description: Wonderful place to stay in with perfect location and lovely neighbourhood!

reviews.author: Ashley
reviews.description: Alfie's place is fantastic. Not too busy so there never was any issue trying to get any sleep. But still relatively well located - very easy to travel to major hub areas of Tokyo. His home is very clean, well kept, and very consistent to what was advertised. His instructions and tips for places around the neighborhood were super helpful and sent promptly. Would definitely recommend

reviews.author: Jennifer
reviews.description: Alfie and Kenji were great hosts! We appreciate the pastries they provided in the morning and it was a great location with easy access to the subway. There was some pocket wifi trouble on the first day, but Alfie fixed it for us the next day. The room was very clean and the amenities listed were accurate. Definitely a great place to stay.

reviews.author: Marcela
reviews.description: Very wonderful place and wonderful hosts. Excellent location. Quiet neighborhood. No complaints. :)

reviews.author: Mallory
reviews.description: This was a lovely place to stay, even better than we expected from the pictures & listing here on Airbnb. We stayed at another Airbnb in Kyoto for 6 nights prior, and while that studio was great, it made us appreciate how spacious and nice Alfie's place is even more. The bed was comfy and our bedroom had plenty of space. We had a fancy Japanese toilet right next to our room (my boyfriend was obsessed with it) and they provided coffee/tea and fruit & pastries for breakfast each morning which was wonderful. It's close enough to the subway stations & major train lines to feel centrally located, but the neighborhood is wonderfully residential and quiet. We realized that the trains stop running fairly early each night (we usually needed to catch the last train back by 12:30am), so if you plan to party late into the night, you may need to find someplace closer to the nightlife action. There are plenty of shops & restaurants nearby Alfie's place though, including a 7-Eleven just a couple blocks away.

reviews.author: Prasong
reviews.description:
Alfie and Kenji are hospitable.  The apartment is very clean and comfortable with tasteful minimal decor. Alfie's description on the apartment location is precisely to the dot; one does not need taxi to get to the apartment and can simply follow his instruction. 

The review by the other guests is also completely accurate.

reviews.author: Sukjin
reviews.description: Alfie's place was spotless as it was shown in pictures. Didn't get a chance to talk to him enough but he was kind and friendly. The logic was perfect. It was very quiet and pretty neighborhood. I think, certainly for me, I felt a bit far from city center and tourist attractions, it wasn't a huge problem though. Highly recommended.

name: J's APT, 2 Bed Rooms + Free Portable Wi-Fi
description: All Natural&Mud-Wall apt

reviews.author: Kristian
reviews.description: I've never used AirBNB before and initially just wanted a good location. I ended up getting that, along with some amazing hosts who were more than helpful regarding any questions I had about the area or things to do etc. The place was amazing, it was kept incredibly clean, we had amenities, the location was right next to a train station, and the food around there was great. I couldn't have wished for better hosts and a better place! Definitely would recommend, and will definitely be using when I return to Japan! If you're looking for a great place with some incredibly friendly hosts look no further.

reviews.author: Carly
reviews.description: This was a very clean and comfortable place to stay. K's family were wonderful hosts and were available to clear up any confusion we had. They had great instructions and suggestions on which passes to buy for our stay and gave great instructions on how to get from the airport to the airbnb. This was very helpful to us as the Tokyo metro system was overwhelming initially! The Tokyo subway pass does not cover a small section between the station by the airbnb and the main subway system (about 160 yen extra everytime we travelled that section), but we were still able to make great use of the 3 day pass regardless. There are also many places within walking distance to get food and it is great to take some time to explore the surrounding area. Overall, we really enjoyed ourselves and this location is a good value!

reviews.author: 雪雯
reviews.description: Everything is perfect! The house is just like the photo, and the host are very nice! Thanks a lot for driving us to the Aoto station and the cool juice! We would like to stay more time if available!

reviews.author: Asser
reviews.description:
Great place , great location , very Japanese, neighborhood is very safe and friendly 
K- family are super super host

reviews.author: Tiffany
reviews.description: This place was absolutely perfect for our first few days in Tokyo! Four of us stayed here and it was clean and comfortable, pretty small but all you need! Close to good food and marts and super easy to walk to the train! It's a bit out of town so lots of transferring but allowed us to see a lot of tokyo!

reviews.author: Alice
reviews.description:
Very good place and very kindness host. The house is as large and clean as the photos.Follow the route provided by the landlord,we finded another (URL HIDDEN) a wonderful travel,thanks Koji and Nami!!
房东人非常好!房子很大而且干净,很适合家庭入住。葛饰区充满风情的小街和电铁,可以让人感受到一个不一样的东京。

reviews.author: Miguel
reviews.description: This is what a Superhost is all about! We saw the hosts everyday, they brought delicious apple juice and helped us by driving us to the station to pick up the rental car. The house is amazing and extremely clean! The neighborhood is very nice and reachable through the JR Line. Not the most central but we never felt it to be troublesome and the overall quality surpassed this minor issue.

name: New! KYODO HOUSE for Art of Living
description: Hi, this is Hide.  Welcome to our new home & share house for 'Art of Living'.  Designed and built by leading artist and enviroment designer in June, 2015.  Located in west Tokyo leafy area, Kyodo station(15-20 min train to Shinjuku & Harajuku).

reviews.author: Carlos
reviews.description: Breathtaking place in lovely Kyodo. Hidenori and his family are very hospitable and made me feel at home. If you want a really distinctive stay where you can relax, this place is perfect for you

reviews.author: Hardwi Satrio
reviews.description: This is probably one of the most beautiful properties that I've ever come across to in Airbnb, perfectly set in the charming residential neighborhood of Setagaya. Charming, bright, and comfortable. I would recommend anyone to stay at Hidenori's property with his lovely family (his daughter, Sora, is just the cutest). Hope you can find the chance to stay there!

reviews.author: Becky
reviews.description: The house is mostly as you see in the picture, thoughtfully built, eco and bright. Hide San's family is warm and lovely.

reviews.author: Foster
reviews.description:
An extraordinary place. I can recommend to anyone who is curious.

I stayed for 10 days and did not yet begin to learn from the library, from Hidenori, who is deeply connected to this place, this time, what is possible, what should be seen, what is invisible.

The experience of being there is being at home. Warm, comfortable, friendly, engaged.

It will be a great joy to return.

reviews.author: Yuko
reviews.description:
This is the second time for me to stay is Kyodo house.

For sure, this is a great experience for me again. Kyodo house is a very unique building, if you like design, here is a great place to stay. I chat quite a lot different things with Hide and Ayumi and Sola is a cute and happy girl haha:)!

No worry, Kyodo house is a good choice for you haha!

reviews.author: Phyllis
reviews.description:
It's a wonderful experience staying with Hide, his lovely family and mates. We can't thank you enough for letting us be part of the lovely house for the past week. We appreciate how you guys have involved us in everything - art events, yoga (too bad we've missed that), and the homemade breakfast that had made our day. 

My personal favourite is finding everyone at the dining table when we came back, discussing the creative projects being worked on, with toothbrushes in the mouths. We appreciate all the recommendations you guys have given, and every little detail (from the morning music to the flyers to art events in the washroom to the little worms that generate natural fertilizers) has made our vacation exceptionally unforgettable. 

We surely hope to return in the near future, if you let us :) And I'm already missing little Miss Sola!

reviews.author: Alex
reviews.description: Hide and his family are the ultimate hosts. There home is an impressive work of design. Staying in Setagaya really makes you feel like a local. When you stay with them you feel like part of the family :)

name: 2 Bed Room + 2 Toilets + Free Pocket Wi-Fi
description: Tateishi Tokyo,Quaint Neighborhood around the Station.

reviews.author: Ofra
reviews.description:
We stayed at K&N 8 nights and we loved it!!!!
K&N and Mr. T are the most generous host we met.
The house is comfortable and roomy, very clean and pleasant
Very close to the train station and there are very good restaurants in the neighborhood
We got 5 star service and it was a pleasure

reviews.author: Marrion
reviews.description: Perfect place to stay and come back to after a busy day exploring Tokyo. We loved it. Easy acces, clean, super friendly hosts. Could not ask for anything more.

reviews.author: 晶
reviews.description:
Why I can't choose seven stars! It's the best experience I've ever been at AIRBNB's house!

The room is even better the picture shows, and the house owner is so warm! He prepared coffee, tea and juice, he cleaned the house everyday, he drove us to the subway station very early in the morning!

No doubt, I'll choose here again the next time!

reviews.author: Jason
reviews.description:
Mr Koji is a very nice host. He was so helpful that he helped us in the check in process even it is in late night and drove us and luggage to the station on the date we checkout. 

The house is also very fancy which includes most of the necessity and the things inside are all kept very clean. 

Thank you so much for hosting. I would definitely recommend my friends to come to your place.

reviews.author: Matthew
reviews.description: Super clean and convenient place to stay. They labeled everything in English to make it easier for us foreigners. The location is just a quick walk to a local station and most of Tokyo is easily available in minutes. Will definitely book again on the next trip.

reviews.author: Tatiana
reviews.description:
We had a fabulous stay in K&N's house. It was a truly native experience. The location is not central and that gives the house some added charm. It helps one immerse into the local atmosphere of cafes and shops, offers a walk along the river and challenges  to negotiate the local metro/train system. Try out a local hot spring place which is only about 15 minute walk from the house. What a great experience!

The house was clean and comfortable. Communication with K&N was very efficient. The hosts were very welcoming and accommodating. We forgot our glasses on departure for Kyoto. K&N very kindly sent them to our address in our new home there. What an amazing gesture!

Thank you K&N. We would certainly stay again and recommend this place to anyone with an adventurous streak in them ;-)

reviews.author: 紗代
reviews.description:
It was the 2nd time to stay at their property. 

This time was the different house but it was also very cool place!
Now we would love to try all different rooms!
It's always stylish, clean, cosy, and very considerate.
They know very well what guests would need and give us informations in advance or it's all prepared.

Thank you so much for having us and our family.
We hope we would be lucky enough to stay with you again!!!

name: Maison à Kyoto Amanogawa
description: This is a nice place to visit Kyoto, just near the river Shirakawa, a really nice place sometimes used for movies or series. The house is near Chioin, Kodaiji, Higashiyama, Yasaka shrine. Just near the house, there is an old market where you can buy and eat Japanese food.

reviews.author: Nicola
reviews.description: Great place, great location! We very much enjoyed our stay! Thanks Seiko

reviews.author: Leah
reviews.description: Seiko's home is the best of the best. With so many places to choose from in Kyoto, we decided to splurge a little and stay here for 3 nights, and it was definitely worth it. Excellent location right near a beautiful little river, tons of shops and restaurants nearby, close to main tourist attractions but also quiet and removed enough that you feel like a local. The experience embodied everything I hope for in an Airbnb, and I hope to return again. Seiko was even kind enough to call us a cab on our departure, she was always quick to help and as kind as can be.

reviews.author: James
reviews.description: Seiko's rental home is charming, well located, compact, and comfortable.  She is an excellent host.

reviews.author: Jo
reviews.description: Nice house

reviews.author: Alain
reviews.description: Great little place super located in Kyoto and great welcome from Seiko. Do NOT miss the fabulous Japanese steak restaurant immediately opposite the street entrance.

reviews.author: Erica
reviews.description: Seiko is a very nice and helpful host. Her traditional Japanese apartment is cozy and tidy. It is located at a very quiet and nice neighbourhood where you can see the beautiful river Kamogama 鴨川 while at the same time it is close to many tourist spots in the city centre. It takes only 1 minute walking to the temple Chion-In 知恩院,5 minutes walking to Yasaka Jinja 八坂神社 and Gion 祗園. The apartment can be easily accessed by bus 206 or trains 電車. I will definitely stay in Seiko's apartment again in my future trips to Kyoto. :)

reviews.author: Emily
reviews.description: Seiko's home is wonderful. It's got the old charm of Kyoto, and the pictures are accurate. It's that beautiful in person. The stairs are quite steep, but we didn't have a problem with them. There's plenty of additional padding if you aren't used to sleeping on the floor (like me). Seiko let us drop our bags off early, and she showed us around the home personally. It was so nice of her! The location is great, close to bus stops, and a 15 minute walk to the major train station. It's a quiet residential area, which is a little further from the busy part of Kyoto with shops and restaurants, but that's what we were looking for. It felt like home to us. Thank you again Seiko!

name: 大理洱海门1号酒店星空房
description: 可观苍山,洱海门,晚上观星空无比美妙的感觉。

reviews.author: Hill
reviews.description: Amazing place ❤️Love it alot

reviews.author: Claire
reviews.description: The staff here are super welcoming, and the star room is lovely, indeed, without a bathroom is a bit suffering at night, while the roof top is quite like the extension of our little glass room. And the location is quite close to the old town, like 2 mins walk. And it also has a pretty petit garden to dine in. A very nice stay in Dali.

reviews.author: Gary
reviews.description: Very beautiful room with amazing views! Can get a bit hot during the day and cold during the night though.

reviews.author: Chris
reviews.description: Must come and experience it by yourself. I guarantee it will be a memorable place to you.

reviews.author: Qiyu
reviews.description: Location is good: close to the old city, small shops restraurants are around. There is no washroom in the top, have to share with others.

reviews.author: 明玉
reviews.description: The living conditions in this hotel are fantastic with such a beautiful view of the ancient architecture and the company of those adorable cats and a dog. I felt warmly welcomed by the hosts because of the nice meals and information they kindly offered. If possible, I really would like to stay in this hotel again.

reviews.author: Dora
reviews.description: fang w

name: 【华章】法租界独门花园Loft古典新中式洋楼@FFC
description: 整套房子为独门进入loft结构,进门便是阳光精致小花园,可在小花园内high tea静静享受午后的阳光。大落地玻璃窗使整个房间拥有超棒的采光。配备全地暖,大冬天只要脚踩到的地方都是暖暖的。各种宽带,网络电视,厨房餐具,浴缸洗漱用品一应俱全,是您放松休憩的理想居所。

reviews.author: Lena
reviews.description:
Beautifully decorated traditional laneway house in great location! Our host was very easy to communicate with, connected with us via we chat straight after booking with the address and detailed instructions for how to access the flat. 

Unfortunately, a few hiccups with checking in. We asked if we could drop our bags off at 1pm. Our host agreed, but we couldn't actually check in until 3pm as the flat needed to be cleaned. We ended up arriving around 3pm anyway but found that the cleaner was still there, and didn't finish until almost quarter to 4. This was annoying as we were extremely jet lagged and were hoping to get some rest before dinner. The bedsheets had also not been dried properly due to the lack of time so they were still damp on the bed for the first night.

One thing that bothered us was although the garden gate locked, we couldn't lock the front door of the actual house. Not sure if it was maybe broken but we felt a bit insecure leaving the house! Luckily nothing happened but people could easily hop over the fence and break in.

reviews.author: Prem Kumar
reviews.description: Cute place, designer furnished but needs a bit of maintenance.

reviews.author: Jordan
reviews.description: Our stay here was a wonderful experience and we recommend it to anyone.

reviews.author: 春梅
reviews.description: Nice

reviews.author: Skye
reviews.description: We had a great stay at the property. We look forward to our next stay :)

reviews.author: Max
reviews.description: Overall this place is great - the interior is better than the photos and it's super stylish.  You have to enjoy a hard bed to sleep here as it is very firm.  The location is excellent and close to public transport.  I'd recommend this place.

name: ANTIQUE HOUSE w/portable wifi & Bikes
description: Close to KYOTO station. The price is including one mobile WIFI and Bikes. Very quiet and close to Kiyomizudera, Fushimiinari shrine,Sanjusankendo. The house has some antique works. Enjoy real old Japanese house! You could stay at the house like KUROSAWA movie. You may meet with NINJA. :)

reviews.author: Nadine
reviews.description: Great apartment. God location. Ryo provided us bicycles which was amazing. Great to explore Kyoto by bike! We would definitely stay there again.

reviews.author: Tali
reviews.description: Great! Thanks

reviews.author: Tali
reviews.description: We really liked this old and full of charm house. It was comfortable, the location is good and The bicycles where a great thing to have, the record player and records made us happy and the portable wi-fi was great to have around town but  it does not work inside the house which was not so great. The host is very kind and responsive,and although we did not get to meet him he was very helpful with everything we needed. Thank you for that .

reviews.author: Benjamin Peter
reviews.description: Ryo's place is amazing. It is tucked away in a small back street so super quiet, yet close to everything. A short walk or ride to pretty much anything. Amazing little record collection to flick through too. Thanks again 5 stars

reviews.author: Alasdair
reviews.description:
This house is a fantastic little place in a nice area of Kyoto. There are some fantastic restaurants nearby as well as a very close subway station to get to the rest of the city. The house has a very authentic feel with the tatami mats and sliding doors. Ryo had placed down anti-mosquito incense so we did not have any problems with them at all. 
Ryo was a very helpful host, always kept in touch and there to help if we needed it. Everyone in our party agreed we would definitely go back to this house if we came to Kyoto again. He even gave me a little Japanese lesson too!

reviews.author: Giovanna
reviews.description: Great little place in a central part of town. Place is hidden away from the hussle but close enough for yummy food and the bikes were especially handy. instructions to access the place were great and the place was super cosy and clean :)

reviews.author: Rebecca
reviews.description: It was only a night, but it was great! The place is super cute. Just be aware that the loft area has low ceilings. Definitely hit my head a few times.

name: 2 Takase RiverSide  Gion Area
description: This apartment is upper floor of the other  apartment 'Sakura River View APT'.

reviews.author: Tiffany
reviews.description: The apartment is in a beautiful location, easy to get to many of Kyoto's iconic areas. Furnished like a traditional Japanese apartment. Andrea and Mayumi were SUPER helpful with a very detailed check in that included suggestions on what to do not only in Kyoto but also in the surrounding areas as well.

reviews.author: Ryan
reviews.description: Andrea & Mayumi were very helpful checking in and giving suggestions on where to go and see. Beautiful and elegant Japanese style home. It is in an area around bars and restaurants so it does get a little noisy outside in the later hours of the night. Other than that great experience! Thank you again.

reviews.author: Kathleen
reviews.description: Andrea was absolutely wonderful and the house was perfect for us. The location is great for exploring and it is tucked away on a side street next to the river so is also very relaxing. In the mornings we sat on the patio with our tea and watched the ducks. It was easy to forget you were in the middle of a bustling city.

reviews.author: Katie
reviews.description:
Our group of 3 adults loved staying at Andrea and Mayumi's place. They went above and beyond to make our stay comfortable and easy.  They sent clear diectuons so we didn't have any trouble figuring out how to get there from the train station. Andrea met us at the bus stop and spent a long time orienting us to the apartment and the city. He provided nice recommendations on where to eat and how to get to the local sites easily. 
The apartment location is great and we loved sitting out on the small balcony over the sweet little stream. The description online is accurate, but to be clear this is a traditional Japanese home with two rooms and futons for sleeping on the floor. We loved the experience if staying in a traditional apartment. 
Would definitely recommend this place if you can get a booking!

reviews.author: 灵
reviews.description: Location is very good, quiet and easy transportation.

reviews.author: Jordan
reviews.description: Andrea & Mayumi's place was exactly as described. We really loved staying in a more traditional dwelling instead of a modern hotel. Their apartment was clean, well-situated for walking to points of interest/public transit, and comfortable for hanging out. We loved the river view and the proximity to local bars and restaurants. Mayumi gave us a great walk through of Kyoto and gave us a lot of useful tips for things to see, which came in handy. We'd definitely recommend renting their home!

reviews.author: David
reviews.description: This was the second time my girlfriend and I stayed at his lovely apartment in Kyoto.  The location is perfect for all the things we want to see and has all the amenities we'd need.  Andrea & Mayumi are the absolute definition of the perfect host.  Very friendly, responsive before and during our stay, and super helpful.  We would stay here again in a heartbeat!

name: Very close Shin-Osaka、Clean、WIFI、JR
description: Clean&modern room♪

reviews.author: Ky
reviews.description: Apartment is conveniently  located and directions was clear. We did not have any issues locating the place. Apartment is also clean. Overall it is a good experience!

reviews.author: Evie
reviews.description: Very good

reviews.author: Jess
reviews.description: Fantastic location - quiet apartment with enough space to comfortably fit 4 adults. Yui kept in contact and even left us a Japanese treat upon our arrival! Would stay here again!

reviews.author: Nicholas
reviews.description: Yui is super friendly and response to our queries extremely promptly. The place is minutes to Shinosaka station and metro station. Room is perfect for 3-4 people and have all necessary amenities one could ever wants. Yui also left us with yummy food for our stay. The accommodation is very clean and airy. All in all, highly recommend for everyone who is coming to Osaka!

reviews.author: Stephen
reviews.description:
A great home away from home. Yui's check in process was extremely easy  and finding her place was a breeze with the information provided after booking.

The house itself was very clean when we arrived and all amenities were provided along with a few extra snacks from Yui! 

There are many local restaurants and convinience stores in the area. Some even within a minute from the apartment and Shin-Osaka (a major transportation hub) around 5 minutes away! 

Yui was always readily available to help us if we had any questions regarding anything in and around the apartment 

I would highly recommend Yui's place to anyone wanting to stay in the Osaka area. Transportation, restaurants and a quiet neighbourhood make for an amazing stay.

reviews.author: Melvin
reviews.description: We stayed with six adults and an infant.  A little tight, but very comfortable.  Our stay was great.  Conveniently located to the Shin-Osaka station, I enjoyed our short little walks before our excursion each day.  Very accurate and clear directions to the home were provided, which allowed this first time traveller to Japan to arrive without issue.  Would definitely consider staying again.

reviews.author: Melissa
reviews.description:
The location is great. Near JR Shin-Osaka Station and railway line (Midōsuji Line) Nishinakajima-Minamigata Station, which save a lot of our time travelling around Osaka.
The place is clean and spacious. One must be careful with the low ceiling dining hall light to avoid hitting your head.

name: TRADITIONAL HOUSE:TATAMI ROOM
description: This house is a full house of Japan that my grandparents built before more than 70 years. Mother, and over to me and parent and child three generations I lived here. Revived it at the time you enter the house, it is very memorable important house. Jo

reviews.author: Gretchen
reviews.description: Korin house was exactly as we had hoped.  It is an old traditional Japanese house with charm in a quiet family neighborhood. Mariko provides maps to restaurants, subways and attractions, two bikes to ride, and the house is well stocked with pretty much anything you need. She met us when we arrived, served us tea before we all hopped on bikes and she showed us to the grocery store. She even provided little snacks and small gifts. If we ever return to Osaka we would love to stay here again.

reviews.author: Tony & Sharyn
reviews.description: Mariko's house is a lovely old, tastefully furnished Japanese house. It provided us with a good base to explore Osaka as it is only 5 minutes walk to the train station from where you can go anywhere.  There are many cafes and restaurants in the local area, Mariko has a good list provided.  Be aware that the steps to the sleeping area are steep.  Mariko was a great hostess to us and is very kind.  Her place is highly recommended.

reviews.author: Tiffany
reviews.description:
This house is absolutely breathtaking! It was our first time visiting Japan and staying in a traditional tatami house was definitely one of the highlights of the trip.

The house is a very old house, apparently about 70 years old, but it is well maintained and well loved. Although it was very different that the Canadian homes we're used to, it felt familiar and homely after setting foot in the door.

Our favourite part of this house was the 2 bikes that are included in the rental. This made commuting to the subway (3-5 minute bike ride) so much quicker, and we even cooked a meal on a couple of nights since the baskets on the bikes allowed us to carry groceries home.

Mariko was extremely helpful and a wonderful host. Upon arriving, we found a letter wishing us a good stay, along with a small gift. She left many pamphlets and guide books in case we needed to find something to do in Osaka, and was quick with her replies when we messaged her.

One of the main reasons we decided to stay in Osaka was so that we could dedicate one of our meals to eating the renowned Kobe Beef. Unfortunately, many of the top rated restaurants we wanted to make a reservation at didn't have websites available in English. We contacted Mariko and she happily assisted us in calling the restaurant to book a reservation. Upon discovering that the restaurant was closed on the day we were hoping to book, she found another restaurant for us and made the reservation! It was one of the best meals we've ever had, and we have Mariko to thank for helping us get there.

The house itself is located just across from an elementary school where we could hear the school bell chime between periods, and there were many families in the area. We felt very safe and very comfortable.

One thing you HAVE to do is visit the fried food shop that Mariko recommends in her instructions - we bought some tempura shrimp, octopus, and croquettes, and they were so delicious that we went back for seconds!

There is a supermarket and cheesecake store nearby, and being so close to the subway (10-minute walk) was great.

All in all, a great trip in a BEAUTIFUL house, provided by an amazing host. We'd recommend to anyone!

reviews.author: Mike
reviews.description: Great place to stay, would recommend to anyone. Beautiful home in good location. Mariko was extremely welcoming and helpful.

reviews.author: Laura
reviews.description: My level of satisfaction with korin house is not very high for two reasons. First, the location is not good. It is very far from the center and not very pleasant at night. On the other hand, the kitchen and toilet (which by the way, not shown in the photos) did not seem right. In conclusion, if I returned to Osaka, I would not repeat my stay in this house.

reviews.author: Xiaoying
reviews.description:
译文
Very clean, and it is a characteristics house. Children enjoy here very well. Mariko reply message very quickly. Thanks Mariko give us a good memory

reviews.author: Sabrina
reviews.description: Really nice and beautiful house. Will book again.

name: #8 4FREE bicycles cozy House Namba!
description: To Shinsaibashi

reviews.author: Remco
reviews.description:
The best is the location and the bicycles. Also Tom communicates clearly and prompt. 

For 2-3 people the place is fine, but certainly not for more people as it is tiny (not small, tiny). 

The overall state of the house is OK, but not great. It needs a lot of TLC and some deco to feel comfortable. Most important it was not clean - dirty black hairs everywhere. Even the washing machine was dirty on the inside. 

The house is heavily used in a highly commercial way, and it shows. 

Needless to say it was not our best Airbnb experience...

reviews.author: Wu
reviews.description: The apartment is wonderful!

reviews.author: Louise
reviews.description: Very good house, you can have a very good time here with your friends or family

reviews.author: Cassie
reviews.description: Everything  is  great,convenient  and easy to go anywhere,supermarket  jus around the corner,and ramen and Chinese restaurant along the road,Dotonburi 10 min walk,good for 6 to 8 people, Tom n jo will respond to u as soon as possible if there any problems.

reviews.author: Sela
reviews.description:
The location is perfect. There are plenty of convenience store and 24 hr restaurants.
It's near the station and 15 minutes walk to dotonburi.

reviews.author: Ludovic
reviews.description:
A cosy and quiet place to leave near Dotonbori.
And Tom is very helpfull.

reviews.author: Jawa
reviews.description: Great Place, stay here.

name: White Breeze Pool 1BD Apartment
description: FREE: Fiber Optic Internet Connection!

reviews.author: Ai
reviews.description:
AMAZING place!!!
But you definitely better to rent a scooter! Easy access to the city, big mall, beach and nice local restaurant ;) the place is little hilly, quiet and dark in the night, so if you don't rent a car or scooter, then it's gonna be a little inconvenient.

Pool was always clean, great kitchen and nice and huge bed (even enough for 3ppl if you're girls) 

The owner is super nice friendly guy and his kitty was adorable xx

I'll come back with my family next time ;))

Definitely good value!!


Thank you Manut and Zokson to make our trip amazing!

reviews.author: 程
reviews.description: Great stay at white villa! The house managers are very helpful and kind, especially you have any specific questions. Though it is a little far away from the hub city, you can still reach any places within 50 minutes rides. Hope to stay here once again!

reviews.author: Facai
reviews.description: It's a very nice place clean and quite. You can enjoy your time with your family in the villa or go to the nearby beach within 10 minutes riding motor bike.

reviews.author: Ivan
reviews.description:
Beautiful villa. The area is far from noisy places. Therefore, to live there very comfortably. Feel free to book, will not regret.
We liked everything, happy to be back!

reviews.author: Mohamed
reviews.description:
I've been in White pool willa for ten days and the place where living up to my exeptations. Very beautifull House and super cool staff who are so Nice and helpfull. The cap was Ready to Pick up and I enjoyed every single bit of my stay.
I higely recommend this place

reviews.author: 晓庆
reviews.description: When we go is the rainy season, so often encountered rain, to travel has brought a lot of inconvenience. But the house is very clean and tidy, the swimming pool is very clean, the environment is very good, the air is fresh. Is a little too partial, go to eat have to go very far, car rental places are also very far away, travel is not convenient, the other is good

reviews.author: Sophia
reviews.description: The white breeze villa apartments is super, it has been designed and decorated in great taste and the minimalist decor provides a calming retreat in the more upmarket part of Phuket. Would certainly recommend it.

name: The Mustang Nero/No.5 The Zebra Song
description: This cozy room,The Zebra, is 35 sq m.

reviews.author: Martin
reviews.description: We loved every minute of staying at the mustang nero with our 11 month old daughter. The people who work there are extremely polite and helpful. We already miss the charming atmosphere, the staff and tasty breakfast. If you like the vintage decoration and wanna feel like you went back in time, this is the place to stay. We will definitely stay here next time we visit Bangkok. Thanks you for a great experience mustang nero.

reviews.author: Lingruolan
reviews.description: The whole building is very well decorated, I stayed in room 5- zebra room. It feels like living in a rain forest, I tried to keep everything neat and same as the first look I saw it, just because it is so nice I don't want to even leave any dust in it. The specimen room is awesome, you will definitely be surprised if you go. Highly recommended!

reviews.author: 芷菁
reviews.description: good

reviews.author: 舒敏
reviews.description: This is an interesting book to the hostel, but only one night, the room how to shoot beautiful, for self love girls is really very good, five cats are very lovely, breakfast is also particularly rich, the next opportunity to stay in front of a hat, especially handsome boys

reviews.author: Yun
reviews.description: Good place to stay in Bangkok!

reviews.author: Ding
reviews.description: Nice position Nice room Nice staff ! U have to stay in this hotel when traveling in bangkok!

reviews.author: Ku
reviews.description: It was a great experience to stay here

name: 3BR Suite 146sqm BTS Thonglo
description: 3 Bed Rooms Apartment 146 sqm, 1.8 km to BTS Thonglor by walk 20 mins by taxi 5 mins for 4 pax (USD 1.5/way/car)

reviews.author: Josh
reviews.description: so here's a checklist for you... 1) travel as a group 2) love to stay in an apartment which feels like home 3) a foodie loves local foods 4) exploring local night life; if you got all ticks, then Mew's place is the one you're looking for :)

reviews.author: Kendrick
reviews.description: A very spacious and clean space for big groups, with plenty of restaurants and bars nearby, 2 convenience shops, and a hospital. The 24 hour reception allows for easy check in and check out, and the host is easily contactable for any enquiries. 10/10 will stay again.

reviews.author: Somchai
reviews.description: Living environment is a family, very warm. Suitable for a family living in a superior apartment! Very much like here too beautiful!

reviews.author: 준형
reviews.description:
It was so wide house

Very good place to stay

reviews.author: Takumi
reviews.description: Nice place with friends! Convenience store is near it takes 5minutes to walk. Great.

reviews.author: Hamish
reviews.description: Would stay again!  Great place!

reviews.author: Hun Jin
reviews.description: Good lovely

name: J. No 14 Amazing Antique B&B_6
description: Family owned antique design B&B , 300 meters from BTS station , 600 meters to Chaopraya river pier, located in the middle of old city and new city .You can touch the Thai life and Thai hospitality here.

reviews.author: Michal
reviews.description: J No. 14 was a very unique and artistic place to stay for one night in Bangkok! The room was comfortable with a private bathroom and great view from the window. The cats and dogs in the building were wonderful and sweet. It is too far to walk or taxi to many of the tourist spots, but taking the BTS is a good solution for the location.

reviews.author: Joy
reviews.description: This space is incredible. Tucked away in a nice, quiet, residential neighborhood with endless charm. You are never more than a ten minute taxi/tuk tuk ride from most attractions. There are three little dogs and two cats welcoming you to breakfast and coffee in the morning. The space truly feels like a home. Decor is beautiful with interesting taxidermy, books and plants. Cold AC for those hot Bangkok nights and a nice clean bathroom. This airbnb made us fall madly in love with Bangkok. Book it!

reviews.author: Yani
reviews.description: OMG, if you are an animal person, definitely check this place out!! This place is amazing because of the elaborated decor alone, all the animal paintings, skeletons, plants, etc, you need to check this out! Plus the real animals are adorable: 2 cats and 2 dogs. They are super friendly and lovel, definitely enlighten my trip! The place is close to BTS( skyline subway), probably take 5 mins to walk there. And this is a great neighborhood, you can even find some decent local vendors when you walk in/out. And the breakfast the host made is amazing too. I would definitely stay again if I came to Bangkok the next time!

reviews.author: Sophie
reviews.description: Wonderful and unique accommodations. We arrived after midnight and I worried about checking in but everything went incredibly smooth. We were given the door code and directions in advance and there was a key waiting for us upon arrival. The breakfast each morning was delicious and the management and staff were very friendly and warm. It was a great experience in a charming setting, I highly recommend!

reviews.author: Leo
reviews.description: The place is so cute! If you are a cat lover or a dog lover, this is the right place you should go! the landlord is quite nice and considerate. and they cooked very nice breakfast.

reviews.author: Brian
reviews.description: A very nice boutique-hotel feel accommodation with unique rustic furniture and taxidermist attractions. Room was simple and clean. A good place for those looking for a peaceful alley way Airbnb.

reviews.author: In_Diesel是我的大大大男神
reviews.description:
Wow!that's a wonderful world!!! Full of plants can make you feel relaxed. And there're two cute cats and two cute dogs. I love them!!!! The house is very close to BTS. So don't worry! Recommend you to live here! Importantly, the breakfast the made is very delicious!
超级推荐这家民宿,交通很方便,到大皇宫可以坐船去,去市区可以做轻轨。房间很整洁,工作人员也非常热情!最重要的是早饭好好吃!里面有两只可爱的猫和两只可爱的狗,喜欢小动物的朋友们不要错过啊!

name: Chic Studio of BKK+BTS+River+Wifi
description: ###Sign up with this Airbnb link  www.airbnb.ca/c/btymko and you will get US$37 for your future travel credit. Why pay more when you can save some money right!! ###

reviews.author: Leong
reviews.description: Great apartment. Clean and Organised. Location is a bit far from the nearest BTS, more than a 1km walk, best to take a taxi or Uber. Nearby has small pushcarts selling local Thai food, nice for supper. Bee and her father are also very prompt with replies and helpful!

reviews.author: Pj
reviews.description: Bee's place was perfect for our stay in Bangkok. It is a short walk away from the sky train station, making it easy to get around. Bee and her father were wonderful hosts and worked with our early morning check-in, even showing us a place to eat at 1 in the morning. I would highly recommend staying here. 5/5, would love to come back.

reviews.author: Lucas
reviews.description: bee's father is really kind ,help us buy food and help us Call taxi to airport

reviews.author: Ben
reviews.description: Superb accommodation, we met Bee's father who helped us check in. An incredibly helpful gentleman who even ran out to get us breakfast. So good that we decided to stay another night at Bee's other apartment which is equally as good. Responded to all of our messages very quickly and was very helpful every time. The apartment os located in a lovely area of the cutynwith a nice community feel. Transport into the city is easy and cheap using the sky train. Can't recommend this place enough, brilliant!

reviews.author: Kan
reviews.description: Everything is as photos, clean and tidy. We enjoyed our stay. Thank you!!

reviews.author: Jasmine
reviews.description: Bee was very kind and informative. The condo is in a great location and we were able to walk just about everywhere. We walked to the MBK center, which is a huge mall, in about an hour. The walking isn't bad at all because there is always so much activity on the street. The famous sky bar is only a short 15 minute walk away. Bee's father was also very helpful, he saved us a ton of money by telling us the best way to get to our next location. The place is so cute and cozy. I would recommend staying here

reviews.author: Lim
reviews.description: Perfect

name: Jomtien Chic BBQ Pool Villa 7 Beds + kids
description: Modern, stylish interior design, comfortable, beautifully furnished, fully equipped kitchen with dishes and everything you need, elegant living room and a private garden with a gazebo in Thai style - that's all 'advantages' of the villa does not end

reviews.author: Maxim
reviews.description: The villa was very good very new . the kitchen was very clean  so we could leave  bottles for our babies without problem. there is a laundry machine-a huge asset  Lidya was very very helpful. all in all satisfying experience. Please be careful if you are with small kids there as stairway is pretty hard for them

reviews.author: Jason
reviews.description: Absolutely lovely villa. Very clean and much bigger than what it looks on the pictures. Alex was really lovely and was quick to sort out any issues. The only thing that was a little frustrating was that Alex seemed to appear several times during the day. Had we have know that the host would be around constantly while we were sunbathing and enjoying ourselves we maybe would have chosen another villa for privacy. However, on a whole it was wonderful.

reviews.author: Kelly
reviews.description: The house is beautiful and spacious with a nice swimming pool. Excellent choice for big families.

reviews.author: Deep
reviews.description: Good place for friends and family, but quiet far away from the city

reviews.author: Xinxiong
reviews.description: The villa was very large and the experience was great. Alexander was a great man, and he described the whole villa in detail. But only downside is that the water in the swimming pool is dirty, and chlorine water is heavy, our eyes are uncomfortable after swimming, additional electricity is really expensive, please must pay attention to save electricity.

reviews.author: Anchalee
reviews.description: Here is good for big family to have great time together.

reviews.author: Chaiyapol
reviews.description:
Nice place.
Easy check-in.
Always response promptly.
Highly recommended.

name: St Pancras Clock Tower Guest Suite
description: A mini apartment within the clock tower apartment at St Pancras Station, with its own en suite bathroom and kitchen and sitting area.  It sits in Sir George Gilbert Scott's gothic revival railway hotel building from 1868.  Ideal for 1 week holidays.

reviews.author: Meyrav
reviews.description:
My daughter and I stayed at Peter's flat 7 nights in August. Photos are far from describing his amazing flat. Since Peter was away on a business trip, his friend, Tim, greeted us. 
During the first evening a Pop-up-Restaurant even was held in the flat and and kindly enough Peter invited us to participate. Not only that the company was pleasant, but the the meal that the young chef, Rachel Karasik prepared was nothing but delicious.
The guest room was spacious, clean and tidy, fully equipped kitchenette with all the necessary tools for cooking. The bathroom was large and included shower and bath. There were many other goodies in the apartment which made our stay most comfortable.
The apartment centrally located with many subway lines, buses and EuroStar. Easy access within minutes to main attractions.
Peter's place is far and beyond a 5* hotel and definitely we shell be back.

reviews.author: Veronica
reviews.description: The location is perfect, in the gorgeous St Pancras building across from King's Cross Station with a 24-hour concierge and everything you need just steps away in terms of shops, pubs, and trains. Peter is a great host, always asked about our day and recommended different things based on what we might like. Truly felt as though we were staying with friends. Highly recommend and hope to stay here again!

reviews.author: Danyang
reviews.description:
Peter is very nice. Great communication. Though he is in Mongolia so that we didn't meet, he contacted us days before we arrived in London about how to check in. We lived into the guest room on June 6, when the terrorist attack happened, we were sleeping in the apartment after exhausting wedding photography in the daytime. When I woke up in the middle of the night, I received Peter's message asking whether we are OK.
The apartment is fabulous. St. Pancras tower itself is an amazing architecture, just can't believe we live in it.
At first I wanted to book the master room but it was already booked. The guest room is also great, my husband likes it even more. It has a small kitchen and clean bathroom. My husband's toenail was hurt so we had to stay in the apartment most of the time during 3 days. It feels like home.
Oh the location of the apartment can't be better. Very close to the king cross station and the library of London, one mile away from the British museum. Bus stop and subway station are just super close to the building. Love it!

reviews.author: Linda
reviews.description:
The clock tower is just in incredible. 
My husband and I stayed here on the night before and the night of our wedding, and it was the perfect place to get ready. Lots of space and beautiful light streaming in from all sides. You can really feel that this is someone's home and not just an empty shell rented out to Airbnb guests - it makes it more of a magical and welcoming place to stay.
Peter was lovely and really easy to communicate with despite being on the other side of the world for a short trip. We felt at home and would love to stay here again for our anniversary some time! :-)

reviews.author: Jodi
reviews.description: We stayed in the studio apartment. Everything one needs for a longer stay is there in the flat. The kitchen is well equipped with excellent quality appliances. The bathroom is enormous with a tub separate shower and loads of storage. The view is beautiful and the location perfectly central. At least 5 tube lines run through Kings Cross and it is a straight shot to and from Heathrow on the Piccadilly line. Just remember to book early as it is often booked! For good reason!

reviews.author: Alex
reviews.description:
The first thing to say is that this place is enormous. We just stayed one night and, being local, were able to bring some food to eat in and share with a couple of friends.

We stayed in the Guest Suite which is, as the description says, a large studio flat which takes up half of the lower floor of the larger apartment. The Guest Suite has its own kitchen and table that easily seats four people. There is a double bed and a sofa bed/seating area with TV, and it has its own bathroom.

We were free to roam around the rest of the apartment (excepting the master bedroom which was also booked) and enjoyed sitting in the clock tower room on the upper floor with its double (treble? quadruple?) height ceiling and views out into area around King's Cross. 

We could have used the main kitchen/dining space on the upper floor for our meal as there was nobody else around for most of the time we were there but the Guest Suite was just fine for our purposes.

We would recommend Peter's apartment to anybody visiting London. It is very comfortable (it is five stories above the noise of the streets), is in a great location (particularly if you are arriving at St Pancras or King's Cross!) and the area has great facilities (try the Spiritland Bar for some cool music).
 
Alex and Gail

reviews.author: Rebecca
reviews.description: We had a fantastic short stay in the clock tower guest room and loved it. The location and views can't be beaten. It's not an area of London that we've visited before, the British Library is well worth a visit as are the stations of St Pancras and Kings Cross. Would love to stay again!

name: Stylish house close to river thames
description: Lovely warm comfortable and stylishly furnished house. Private bedroom and bathroom with shared living areas.

reviews.author: Naomi
reviews.description:
Vicky was extremely helpfull and welcoming hostess, helping us in every way and and being very pleasant and gracious. We enjoyed our stay!
The house is about 10 minutes walk from Barons Court tube station which is very convenient.
Highly recommended!

reviews.author: Simone
reviews.description: It's a great place to live. Beautiful house. All was perfect.

reviews.author: Ward
reviews.description:
Vicky's place is really cosy. Everything was perfect from communication to arrival and instructions. We got a (unexpected) breakfast, so that's also really nice. We met Vicky as a warm, friendly and funny person. 
Our stay couldn't have been better!

reviews.author: Anita
reviews.description:
Vicky's place is very nice, comfortable and decorative, she has its own style of design, and the place is almost the same in what you find in the photos. I like the beautiful flowers put in our bedroom and kitchen too. 

Her place  is located in London zone 2 area, so quite good a location to go to Central London. 

Her home is near to Baron's court underground station (5 to 8 mins walk) which is very good.  But one thing at night time is a bit of walking distance and also need to pass through some quiet places when walk back home in the night time from both Barons court or Hammersmith station (12 to 15 mins walk), as the quickest way of Baron's court is being closed in the evening time, so need to walk a bit further more.  

Vicky is a very good and nice host,  quite helpful and detailed minded, she will provide you many information before your trip and also caring for us attentively. 
However,  we have not much time to meet each other as she is also out for vacation a few days during our 6 days stay , otherwise I think we can talk to each other a lot. 

Thanks Vicky

reviews.author: Brenda
reviews.description: A modern, safe, comfortable, and conveniently located place to stay with a hostess who made us feel at home with her clean home, tasty breakfast foods, and tea. She offered just the right balance of privacy and engaging conversation. I knew I would adore Vicky the moment I waked in and saw art by Banksy! An intelligent, thoughtful, and tidy hostess who was very generous and also knowledgeable about where to eat - Thanks Vicky, Poppies Thai food was like Alice In Wonderland with Great Thai food! The near by cemetery and quick walk to Barons Court Station made this an easy stay. Also, there are some great shops right near by if one is keen to do some shopping for groceries, fashion clothing, stationary, you name it. This area was safe to stroll in, so bring your walking shoes. Our favorite near-by museum to visit was the house of the famous Pre-Raphielate Brotherhood Artist Sir Frederick Leighton. This was a real treasure and only a 25 minute stroll from Vicki's with lots to see on the way. We hope to see Vicky again, ~ Cheers!

reviews.author: Kathryn
reviews.description: Vicky is great. It was nice and clean and she even left a list of things to do around town.

reviews.author: Mary
reviews.description: Vicky's house is cozy and quiet. The rooms are very clean and comfortable with lovely bedding. The bathroom is modern.  Short walk from Barons Court tube. Vicky was an accommodating host and very easy to communicate with. Highly recommend.

name: Designer Flat Kensington Olympia
description: Stylish raised ground floor flat within a quiet neighbourhood just to the west of the city centre (Zone Two).   A great base from which to explore London and close to the exhibition centre of Olympia.

reviews.author: Noam
reviews.description:
Staying at Will & Emilia's place was great. The appt is as nicer or even nicer than what it looks in the pics, with everything  you need including wifi etc. 
Will was great, very helpful and considerate of my late check in (around 22:00).
Overall - a highly recommended stay!

reviews.author: Amy
reviews.description: Perfect London flat! We loved the location, and everything was just wonderful!

reviews.author: Injung
reviews.description:
I stayed for two nights during my first visit to London by myself and this flat was just great!
I'm terrible with directions so I had to always rely on (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) Map and I found out the app wasn't reliable. This flat is 5min away from Kensington station but it took me 40min to get to this flat eventually with the help of nice lady. ha ha! 
Anyway, I enjoyed myself during staying at Will & Emilia's flat.

reviews.author: Louise
reviews.description: Everything was great in this place. Location: perfect as exhibitors in Olympia. Just 5 minutes walking. The flat is very clean and well organized. The bed is comfortable, but the futon in the living room was a bit hard for me but it depends on people.

reviews.author: Sally
reviews.description: Amazing flat in a very central location , close to excellent public transport. Will and Emilia are fantastic hosts, very responsive and flexible. A real treasure of a place in London. We love it !

reviews.author: David
reviews.description: Great hosts. Very comfortable.

reviews.author: Rainer
reviews.description:
The flat is great and has enough space for 4 people (our kids are 15 and 18). Everything is very clean and we found everything we needed. We even made use of the DVD collection watching a film together ;-). 
The next overground/underground (Kensingtion Olympia) is only a couple of minutes away, still the flat is in a very quite area. We enjoyed our stay and the flat's location is ideal for London sightseeing.

name: Stylish Garden Cabin in Camden
description: Stylish interior designed garden cabin leading to beautiful garden. Interior is compact and stylish with wood panelled walls, a small wet room and basic kitchenette. Short walk to Camden or Kings X. Secure private access. Suit couple or single person

reviews.author: Mark
reviews.description: Lovely little place - would stay again

reviews.author: Rachel
reviews.description: For a single person or couple looking to stay in the one of the coolest parts of London, this is the place for you. Perfect host, location, and space to getaway. Leah was an amazing and attentive host, with a book of great recommendations in the cabin. Can't wait to get back to the U.K. and I look forward to staying at her place again!

reviews.author: Brooke
reviews.description: Leah's place is perfect for a solo traveller. There's plenty of room for one, the bed is insanely comfortable and I loved all the small details. The garden is glorious and makes it the perfect summer base for a london stay.

reviews.author: Irwan
reviews.description: We stayed at Leah's place for 3 nights and the place was really nice, clean and comfortable. It has all things that we need for our stay and couldn't ask for more. The place is strategically located and very close to a bus stop. This place is absolutely recommended and we look forward to stay here again in our next visit!

reviews.author: Jordan
reviews.description: Leah's place was great! Very small, but it did the job and had everything we needed.

reviews.author: Amanda
reviews.description: Cozy cabin with everything you need. Perfect location for exploring London. Leah was very responsive and provided excellent recommendations for the local area. Would definitely come back and would recommend!

reviews.author: Andrea
reviews.description: Leah is a very kind person. She supported us in everything and the cabin is very nice. Cabin's location is strategic and very close to Camden Town metro. Absolutely suggested
